column5: 0.026#TD4091E.TXT.r#756230#756230#TD4091E.TXT.r_11144;TD4091E.TXT.r_11145# rgyun du zad par khyab par byed pa'i phyir zad par gyi skye mched ni bcu ste / / +zad par sa dang  chu dang  me dang  rlung dang  sngon po dang  ser po dang  dmar po dang  dkar po dang  zad par nam mkha' dang  rnam par shes pa'o // /
column6: 0.026#TD4095E.TXT.r#104216#104216#TD4095E.TXT.r_8090;TD4095E.TXT.r_8091# zad par gyi skye mched ni bcu ste / / +zad par sa dang chu dang  me dang  rlung dang  sngon po dang  ser po dang  dmar po dang  dkar po dang  zad par nam mkha' dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched do // /

column3: 'on kyang rab kyi sgra dang sgrogs na byed par lta ste / / +skad dbyings don gyi  stobs ldan yang // /
column4: 0.0#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2702190#2702190#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_126# gzugs med pa'i khams na nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched na ni rgyu tshad med pa'i dmigs pa can no // /
column5: 0.0#TD4039E.TXT.r#1876729#1876729#TD4039E.TXT.r_7186# rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la  ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi phyi rol du bltas pa'i dmigs pa'i gyo ba tsam las dben pa'i phyir mi gyo bar rig par bya ste / /
column6: 0.0#TD4049E.TXT.r#2288516#2288516#TD4049E.TXT.r_192# gang gis nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched shes pa'o // /
column7: 0.0#TD4054E.TXT.r#1024647#1024647#TD4054E.TXT.r_5578# 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan dang po dang  gnyis pa dang  gsum pa dang  bsam gtan bzhi pa dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye    mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched de / /
column8: 0.0#TD4066E.TXT.r#2106365#2106365#TD4066E.TXT.r_602# tshad med pa ni nam mkha' mtha' yas dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dag ste / /
column9: 0.0#TD4086E.TXT.r#1282113#1282113#TD4086E.TXT.r_338# nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye    skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la ni kha dog med do // /
column10: 0.0#TD4091E.TXT.r#754197#754197#TD4091E.TXT.r_10739# ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi mjug thogs su rang gis pa dang  rnam shes mtha' yas dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas kyi skye mched kyis pa'i dag pa dang  zag pa med pa / /
column11: 0.0#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1416502#1416502#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_1877# zad par nam mkha' dang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dag dang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pa bzhi po ste / /
column12: 0.0#TD4095E.TXT.r#65631#65631#TD4095E.TXT.r_492# zad par nam mkha' dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dag dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pa bzhi po dag ni phung po bzhi'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir yid dang chos kyi skye mched dag gis bsdus so // /
column13: 0.0#TD4099E.TXT.r#116898#116898#TD4099E.TXT.r_2419;TD4099E.TXT.r_2420# nam mkha'  mtha' yas skye mched la ma yin / / +rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la ma yin / /
column14: 0.014#TD4068E.TXT.r#589330#589333#TD4068E.TXT.r_2309;TD4068E.TXT.r_2310# gzugs med pa'i khams na skye mched pa rnam pa bzhi ste / / +nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched  dang ; /
column15: 0.029#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2638208#2638208#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_12799# rang gi sa pa dag pa pa dang zag pa med pa dang gnyis dang  nam mkha' dang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi sa pa bzhi dang  bsam gtan gnyis pa dang gsum pa'i sa pa bzhi'o // /

column3: nye bar bsgyur bas zil non 'gyur // / +gang g'a'i chu ni mngar mod kyi // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920175#920192#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3785;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3786;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3787;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3788;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3789;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3790# thams cad skye mched bcu ni sa dang  chu dang  me dang  rlung ste 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang  sngon po dang  ser po dang  dmar po dang  dkar  po ste kha dog bzhi dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched gnyis kyis bsnan te bcu'o // /

column3: rgya mtsho'i chu ni ji bzhin no // / +zhes bshad do // / +bde gshegs nyid skyes zhes bya ba ni / /
bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang  shes bya'i sgrib pa las mi gnas  pa'i mya ngan las 'das par shin tu gshegs pas bde bar gshegs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920193#920202#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3789;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3790;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3791;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3792# theg pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dpag tu med pa    rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yin te / / +de yang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang  nam mkha' mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa ste / /
column5: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#936810#936810#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6046;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6047# des ni ldan    pa'i don bstan pa'o // / +de la ting nge 'dzin ni theg pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang  nam mkha' mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin dang  dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa'o // /

column3: de yang bag chags kyi sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa / / +chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thugs su chud pa'i rang gi ngo bo 'byor ba thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920201#920215#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3790;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3791;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3792;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3793;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3794# de yang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang  nam mkha' mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa ste / / +'di ni mthu rnam pa drug go // / +brtan pa thob pa'i mthu zhes bya ba la / /
column5: 0.027#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3104976#3104978#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_1895;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_1896# gzhung khyad par du 'phags pa 'dri bar 'dod pa'i phyir slong ba la ma byin na ni kha na ma tho ba dang bcas par rig par bya'o // / +'di ni byang chub  sems dpa' phan 'dogs pa'i sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa'i mtshan ma'i rjes su 'brang zhing zang zing bcas pa'i sems dang phyogs yongs su gzung ba'i tshul gyis mdza' bshes kyi bsam pa skyed par byed na kha na ma tho ba dang bcas par 'gyur ro // /

column3: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che  ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mthu mnga' ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920214#920223#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3794;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3795# byang chub  sems dpa' rnams kyis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i mthu yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.022#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2068727#2068727#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_13120;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_13121# stobs kyi don ni mngon par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa'i don to // / +mi 'jigs pa'i don ni mi zhum pa'i don to zhes zer ro // /
column6: 0.024#TD4050E.TXT.r#1114814#1114814#TD4050E.TXT.r_2437# gang  gis chos la longs spyod pa myong ba dang  lhan cig tu chos dang ldan pa'i don dang  sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i don yang ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par gzhag pa yin no // /
column7: 0.026#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2722405#2722406#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_2856# bstan pa dang mi  mthun pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don dang  de mthong na rnam par dag pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i don ni bden pa'i don to // /

column3: sems can thams cad kyi don thams cad lhun gyis grub par mdzad par spyod pa / / +rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi khyad par gyi bdag nyid ni bde bar gshegs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#281904#281907#TD4026E.TXT.r_1187;TD4026E.TXT.r_1188# de ltar rnam par dbye ba'i mtshan nyid kyi don drug gis mthu bshad nas / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920222#920232#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3794;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3795;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3796;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3797# byang chub  sems dpa' rnams kyis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i mthu yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // / +don rnam par dbye ba'i mtshan nyid kyi don drug gi mthu bshad nas / /

column3: de'i bdag nyid ni rnam par dag pa'i deb zhin nyid de / / +de las rnam  bar mi rtog pa'i ye shes rab tu byung ba'i phyir de las sam / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920233#920245#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3796;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3797;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3798# de'i che ba bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la / / +mthu rnam pa drug tu phye ba'i sgo nas  mthu rnam pa drug gis byang chub sems dpa'i mthu ni drug yin no zhes bshad nas / /

column3: der skye bas na bde gshegs nyid skyes so // / +yang na bde bar gshegs pa nyid du skyes pas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920246#920254#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3797;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3798;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3799;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3800# mthu rnam pa drug tu phye ba'i sgo nas  mthu rnam pa drug gis byang chub sems dpa'i mthu ni drug yin no zhes bshad nas / / +da mngon par shes pa drug gi yon tan che ba bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom ste / /

column3: bde gshegs nyid skyes te / / +mdo gzhan las de'i bdag nyid kyi chos rab tu rnyed pas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920255#920264#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3798;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3799;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3800;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3801;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3802# da mngon par shes pa drug gi yon tan che ba bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom ste / / +che ba yang rnam pa gsum mo // / +gang zhe na / /

column3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung du skyes     // / +pa yin no zhes ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o // / +de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu pa la rab tu gnas pa ni / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920263#920273#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3801;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3802;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3803# dbang gi che ba dang  dga' ba'i che ba dang  srid pa ni  mi 'jigs pa'i che ba'o // / +de ni dbang gi mchog rnams thob pa'i blo // /
column5: 0.019#TD4020E.TXT.r#2522007#2522012#TD4020E.TXT.r_436;TD4020E.TXT.r_437# de ni dbang mchog thob pa'i blo dang ldan // / +'gro ba dbang med rang dbang bkod rtag tu // /
column6: 0.019#TD4026E.TXT.r#281918#281923#TD4026E.TXT.r_1189;TD4026E.TXT.r_1190# de ni dbang mchog thob pa'i blo dang ldan // / +'gro ba dbang med rang dbang  bkod rtag tu // /

column3: shes bya'i dngos po'i rnam pa thams cad sgyu ru ra lag mthil du gzhag pa / / +dar lva srab mos gyogs pa'i mig la snang ba bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920274#920287#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3803;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3804;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3805;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3806;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3807# 'gro ba dbang med rang dbang bkod rtag tu // / +zhes bya ba la / /

column3: bcom  ldan 'das kyi ni mig gi sgrib pa bsal ba bzhin te / / +'di ni khyad par ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920285#920295#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3806;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3807# mngon par shes pa drug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de zhes bya ba'i don to // / +mthu rnam pa drug thob pa'am dbang  rnam pa bcu thob pa'am ye shes rnam par dag pa la dbang thob pas na dbang gi mchog thob pa'i blo zhes bya ba de / /

column3: 'dir ni bde bar gshegs pa'i bdag nyid las skyes pas / / +bstan bcos mdzad pa de kho na thugs su chud pa phun sum tshogs par bstan pa dang  rnyed pa dang bkur sti la mi lta bar bstan bcos  mdzad pas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920296#920310#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3807;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3808;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3809# mthu rnam pa drug thob pa'am dbang  rnam pa bcu thob pa'am ye shes rnam par dag pa la dbang thob pas na dbang gi mchog thob pa'i blo zhes bya ba de / /

column3: thugs rje phun sum tshogs pa dang  shes rab phun sum tshogs par bstan pa'o // / +'chad pa ni bshad par byed pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920311#920321#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3809# sems can rnams las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang du song nas tshe 'dir yang las dang nyon mongs pas gar drangs par 'jug  pas na rang dbang med pa dang  tshe rabs gzhan du yang las dang nyon mongs pas gang du 'phangs par mi 'dod bzhin du 'gro dgos pas na rang dbang med pa ste / /

column3: mngon par mchod ces bya ba dang sbyar ro // / +kha cig na re bde gshegs nyid las skyes pa zhes kyang bya'o zhe'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920319#920330#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3809;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3810;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3811# sems can rnams las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang du song nas tshe 'dir yang las dang nyon mongs pas gar drangs par 'jug  pas na rang dbang med pa dang  tshe rabs gzhan du yang las dang nyon mongs pas gang du 'phangs par mi 'dod bzhin du 'gro dgos pas na rang dbang med pa ste / /

column3: de ni 'phags pa thogs med do // / +de la ni 'phags pa byams pa'i byin rlabs kyis na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920331#920346#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3810;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3811;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3812;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3813;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3814# rang dbang med pa'i sems can de dag rdzu 'phrul bstan te / / +dad pa skyes nas dge ba la bkod pas na rang dbang  bkod pa zhes bya ste / /

column3: chos kyi rgyun gyis bstan bcos 'di mngon du gyur cing bshad do // /
su la 'chad pa zhe na / / +bdag sogs la zhes bya ba ste / / +bdag thog mar byas pa gang yin pa de dag ni bdag la sogs pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920347#920358#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3814;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3815;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3816;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3817# rtag tu gzhan la phan bya gcig tu mngon par dga' // / +zhes bya bas dga' ba'i che ba bstan te / /

column3: 'di ni bdag nyid kyi mi slu ba las  lung mnos par ston to // / +yang zhes bya ba ni bsdu ba'am // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920359#920367#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3816;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3817;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3818# bdag gi don du mi sems par dus thams cad du yang sems can gzhan la     // / +phan pa dang bde bar bya ba 'ba' zhig la mos shing de 'ba' zhig sems pas na gzhan la phan par bya bar rnam par dga' ba zhes bya'o // /

column3: rtsa ba bskangs pa'am / / +lhag pa'i tshig ste / / +mdzad pa dang  'chad pa nyi tshe la ma yin gyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920366#920376#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3817;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3818;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3819# phan pa dang bde bar bya ba 'ba' zhig la mos shing de 'ba' zhig sems pas na gzhan la phan par bya bar rnam par dga' ba zhes bya'o // /

column3: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' gang yang rung ba dag la mchod par bya'o // / +mngon mchod ces bya ba ni rjed pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920377#920386#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3819;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3820# ces bya bas srid pa na mi 'jigs pa'i che ba bstan te / / +dper  na seng ge nags dang nags kyi 'dab na phug dang ri la sogs pa na gnas shing rgyu ba'i tshe / /

column3: mngon  par zhes bya ba ni mdun nam mngon sum dang 'dra bar gnas pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920387#920401#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3820;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3821# dper  na seng ge nags dang nags kyi 'dab na phug dang ri la sogs pa na gnas shing rgyu ba'i tshe / /

column3: mchod pa ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyis rjed pa'o // / +bstan bcos mdzad pa dang 'chad pa la mngon par mchod nas ci zhig bya zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920401#920409#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3821;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3822# ri dags gang gis kyang mi 'jigs par gnas pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' brtan pa thob pa rnams sems can gyi don du khams gsum la gnas pa'i tshe yang bdud dang  mu stegs la sogs pa gang gis kyang mi 'jigs shing / /

column3: don rnams dbye phyir 'bad par bya // / +zhes bya ba smos so // / +don dbye ba'i phyir  ram ; /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920410#920426#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3821;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3822;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3823;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3824;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3825# ri dags gang gis kyang mi 'jigs par gnas pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' brtan pa thob pa rnams sems can gyi don du khams gsum la gnas pa'i tshe yang bdud dang  mu stegs la sogs pa gang gis kyang mi 'jigs shing / / +'dod chags dang zhe sdang la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pas gos su dogs pa'i 'jigs pa yang med par yod do zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: don dgrol ba'i phyir ram / / +so sor dbye ba'i phyir bsgrim par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba 'di ni rgyu'i don te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918192#918196#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3523;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3524;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3525# de kho na'i skabs bshad pa  rdzogs so //// / +de kho na'i skabs bshad pa'i rjes la / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920420#920434#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3822;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3823;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3824;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3825;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3826;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3827# 'dod chags dang zhe sdang la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pas gos su dogs pa'i 'jigs pa yang med par yod do zhes bya ba'i don to // / +mthu'i skabs bshad pa rdzogs so //// /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920490#920497#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3836;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3835;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3837# de'i phyir yongs su smin pa'i skabs bshad pas ni mthu'i rjes la yongs su smin pa'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // /
column7: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920558#920561#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3842;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3843# yang na gang la bslab par bya ba'i  rnam pa bdun bshad pa las mthu'i rjes la bdag yongs su smin pa dang  sems can yongs su smin par bya ba smos pas na de bshad pa'i skabs su bab pa'i phyir / / +mthu'i rjes la yongs su smin pa'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // /
column8: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#943875#943878#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6922;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6923;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6924# chos yongs su tshol ba'i skabs las zhes bya ba la / / +mos pa'i skabs bshad pa'i rjes la / / +chos yongs su tshol ba'i skabs bshad par 'brel pa ci yod ce na / /

column10: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#937996#937997#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6206# sku gsum gyi skabs bshad pa'i rjes la ye shes kyi skabs bshad par 'brel pa ci yod ce na / /
column11: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912360#912363#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2754;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2755# bskyed pa lhag par bya ba'i skabs rdzogs so //// / +sems bskyed pa'i skabs kyi rjes la sgrub pa'i skabs bshad par cis 'brel zhe na / /
column12: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#915092#915093#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3123;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3124;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3125# bam po dang po'i 'grel pa rdzogs so //// / +sgrub pa'i skabs bshad pa'i rjes la / /

column14: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#941134#941135#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6608# byang chub kyi skabs kyi rjes la mos pa'i skabs bshad par 'brel pa ci yod ce na / /
column15: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907021#907025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2110;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2111# sems bskyed pa la sogs pa la yang rigs yod na 'dod pa 'byung ste gang la rigs yod pa de  gdon mi za bar bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed bar 'gyur bas na rigs kyi skabs kyi rjes la sems bskyed par 'gyur ba'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // /
column16: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#951518#951519#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_7863# de kho na tshol ba'i skabs kyi rjes la de kho na la sgyu ma lta bur yongs su tshol ba'i skabs bshad par 'brel ba ci yod ce na / /
column17: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#951600#951604#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_7874;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_7875# de'i phyir de kho na nyid tshol ba'i skabs kyi rjes la de kho na nyid la sgyu ma lta bur yongs su tshol ba'i skabs bshad par  'brel to // /
column18: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925978#925978#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4528;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4529# yongs su smin pa'i skabs bshad pa rdzogs so //// / +yongs su smin pa'i skabs bshad pa'i rjes la / /
column19: 0.023#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#936026#936026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5945# chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag ba la tshigs su bcad pa bzhi'o zhes bya ba la sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i skabs kyi rjes la chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i skabs bshad par 'brel ba ci yod ce na / /
column20: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#946198#946198#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_7203# dmigs pa yongs su tshol ba'i skabs kyi rjes la dmigs pa rnyed pa'i skabs bshad par 'brel pa ci yod ce na / /
column21: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#951061#951064#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_7799# mdo las sems mnyam par gzhag pa thob na de kho na nyid khong du chud par 'gyur ro zhes 'byung bas yid la byed pa'i skabs kyi rjes la de kho na'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // /
column22: 0.026#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2905843#2905843#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_5315# yang dag pa'i spong ba'i skabs kyi rjes la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i skabs bshad pa 'brel ba ci yod ce na / /
column23: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906908#906910#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2097;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2098;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2099# rigs kyi skabs bshad pa rdzogs so //// / +rigs kyi skabs kyi rjes la / /
column24: 0.029#TD4029E.TXT.r#2128178#2128178#TD4029E.TXT.r_1058;TD4029E.TXT.r_1059# mthu'i skabs rdzogs so //// / +mthu'i 'og tu yongs su smin pa'i skabs yin te / /

column3: don rnam par dbye ba'i rgyur zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +don ni 'dir bstan bcos kyi lus yin te zhes bya ba don bdun po 'di dag bstan bcos 'di las 'chad do zhes 'byung ba'i    phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#276005#276008#TD4026E.TXT.r_192;TD4026E.TXT.r_193# rgya che'i phyir dang zab pa'i phyir // / +yongs su smin dang rnam mi rtog / /
column5: 0.0#TD4029E.TXT.r#2128191#2128194#TD4029E.TXT.r_1062;TD4029E.TXT.r_1063# rgya che'i phyir dang zab pa'i phyir // / +yongs su smin dang rnam mi rtog // /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896999#897005#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_993;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_994;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_995;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_996# rgya che'i phyir dang zab pa'i phyir // / +yongs su smin dang rnam mi rtog / /
column7: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920435#920453#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3826;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3827;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3828;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3829;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3830;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3831;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3832# gong du theg pa sgrub pa'i skabs su / / +rgya che'i phyir dang zab pa'i phyir // /
column8: 0.027#TD4020E.TXT.r#2520079#2520079#TD4020E.TXT.r_55;TD4020E.TXT.r_56# de phyir de ni de yul min // / +rgya che'i phyir dang zab pa'i phyir // /

column3: ci'i phyir bstan bcos 'di bshad ce na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes bskyed pa'i phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920450#920463#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3829;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3830;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3831;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3832;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3833# 'di la gnyis ni bstan pa'i phyir // / +de ni bla na med pa'i thabs // / +zhes bshad de / / +mthu rgya chen po bshad pa mthong bas ni sems can yongs su smin par 'gyur te / /
column5: 0.010#TD4029E.TXT.r#2128206#2128208#TD4029E.TXT.r_1066# zhes bshad pas mthu  rgya chen po bstan pa mthong bas ni sems can rnams yongs su smin par 'gyur te / /
column6: 0.018#TD4026E.TXT.r#276026#276027#TD4026E.TXT.r_197;TD4026E.TXT.r_198# mthu rgya chen po bstan pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de / / +mthu la mos pa'i sgo nas 'bad pa'i phyir ro // /
column7: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1148169#1148169#TD4047E.TXT.r_3967# 'dun par byas pa'i sgo nas sems can rnams bstan pa la 'god par byed pa ni las dang po'o // /

column3: chos la bdag med pa bstan pas rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes bskyed pa dang  de goms pas bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs  pa dang  shes bya'i sgrib pa ma lus par spangs pa thob par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920460#920475#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3832;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3833;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3834;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3835# mthu rgya chen po bshad pa mthong bas ni sems can yongs su smin par 'gyur te / / +byang chub sems dpa'i sgo nas mthu mthong ba dang  de la tshogs pa skyes nas thob par bya ba'i phyir 'bad par byed de / /

column3: chos la bdag med pa yang chos thams cad med pa nyid chos la bdag med pa dang  nang na byed pa'i skyes bu med pa nyid chos rnams la bdag med pa'o zhes mi mthun par smra ba de dag bkag pas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920476#920489#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3834;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3835;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3836# de ni mthu nyid kyi skabs su bshad zin to // / +zab pa bshad pas ni rnam  par mi rtog pa'i ye shes skyes pa'i sgo nas bdag nyid sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su smin par 'gyur te / /
column5: 0.022#TD4048E.TXT.r#1691901#1691901#TD4048E.TXT.r_1129;TD4048E.TXT.r_1130# gnas gyur nas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par 'grub pa'i sgo nas / / +thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir  'jug go // /

column3: chos la bdag med pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan par bya ba'i phyir bstan bcos brtsam mo // / +gzhan dag na re mtshan nyid dang sgrib pa la sogs pa ma rtogs pa dang  log par rtogs pa rnams yang dag par rtogs pa skyed pas ma rtogs pa rnams dang  log par  rtogs pa bsal ba'i phyir ro zhe'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920498#920512#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3836;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3837;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3838# de'i phyir yongs su smin pa'i skabs bshad pas ni mthu'i rjes la yongs su smin pa'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // / +yang na byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi don la  skyo ba med pa'i thabs yin par bshad / /
column5: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918195#918196#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3523;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3524;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3525# de kho na'i skabs bshad pa  rdzogs so //// / +de kho na'i skabs bshad pa'i rjes la / / +mthu'i mtshan nyid kyi skabs bshad par cis 'brel zhe na / /

column7: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#951061#951064#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_7799# mdo las sems mnyam par gzhag pa thob na de kho na nyid khong du chud par 'gyur ro zhes 'byung bas yid la byed pa'i skabs kyi rjes la de kho na'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // /
column8: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#978180#978180#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11252;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11253;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11254# chos bshad pa'i skabs bshad pa rdzogs so //// / +bshad pa'i skabs kyi rjes la / / +bsgrub pa'i skabs bshad par ci 'brel zhe na / /
column9: 0.021#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2869113#2869113#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_130;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_131# thabs dang ldan pa'i las kyi skabs bshad pa'i rjes la / / +pha rol tu phyin pa'i skabs bshad pa'i 'brel ba    ci yod ce na / /
column10: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912446#912446#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2769# sgrub  ba la gnas nas gdod bdag dang gzhan gyi don 'grub kyi sgrub pa med na mi 'grub pas sems bskyed pa'i rjes la sgrub pa'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // /
column11: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912561#912561#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2779;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2780# bla na med pa'i byang chub la ni 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid lta bur dmigs pas / / +sems bskyed pa'i rjes la bsgrub pa'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // /
column12: 0.022#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2898309#2898309#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_4251# brtan pa de yang ngo tsha shes pa las  'byung zhing 'grub par 'gyur bas na ngo tsha ba'i rjes la brtan pa'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // /
column13: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#915093#915093#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3123;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3124;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3125# bam po dang po'i 'grel pa rdzogs so //// / +sgrub pa'i skabs bshad pa'i rjes la / / +de kho na'i skabs bshad pa  cir 'brel ce na / /
column14: 0.023#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918265#918265#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3533# de bas na de kho na'i rjes la mthu'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // /
column15: 0.023#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#936026#936026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5945# chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag ba la tshigs su bcad pa bzhi'o zhes bya ba la sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i skabs kyi rjes la chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i skabs bshad par 'brel ba ci yod ce na / /
column16: 0.023#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918298#918300#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3536;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3537# de bas na sems can yongs su smin par bya ba skyo bar mi 'gyur bar thabs bstan pa'i phyir / / +de kho na'i rjes la mthu'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // /
column17: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#978280#978281#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11267# de bas na bshad pa'i skabs kyi rjes la bsgrub pa'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // /
column18: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#978222#978222#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11260# de bas na bshad pa'i skabs kyi rjes la bsgrub pa'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // /
column19: 0.027#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2912841#2912841#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_6303;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_6304# smon lam gyi 'og tu ting nge 'dzin gsum rnam par dbye ba'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // / +yang na smon lam dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams lus kyi las sam / /

column3: yang na 'jig rten gyi khams dang sems can dang chos dang 'dul ba dang  thabs kyi bdag nyid de / / +shes bya rnam lnga re re la yang rab tu dbye ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir shes par bya dka'o snyam du / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920511#920528#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3838;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3839;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3840# 'khor ba na gnod pa dang  sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis skyo ba med par dus ring por byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su smin par byed pa dang  sems can yongs su smin par byed bas na / /
column5: 0.028#TD4029E.TXT.r#2128252#2128253#TD4029E.TXT.r_1072# 'khor  ba'i log par bsgrub pa dang  sdug bsngal dag gis mi skyo ba'i dus ring por sangs rgyas kyi chos dang  sems can yongs su smin par byed pa na dag pa'i chos rnams kyis 'phel bar 'gyur bas de'i 'og tu dge ba 'phel ba'i thabs yongs su smin pa'i skabs yin  no ; / /

column3: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi  sems zhum pa gang yin pa de bstsal ba'i phyir / / +mtshan nyid dang sgrib pa dang  de kho na zhes bya ba dag smos so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920529#920539#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3840;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3841;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3842# de bas na dge ba'i chos rgya cher 'phel bar byed pa'i thabs yongs su smin par byed pa'i skabs bshad de / /
column5: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918318#918320#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3538;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3539# yang na gang la bslab par bya ba la rnam pa bdun du  gzhag pa las de kho na'i skabs kyi rjes la mthu smos pa bzhin te bshad dgos pa'i phyir / / +de kho na'i 'og tu mthu'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // /
column6: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912446#912446#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2769# sgrub  ba la gnas nas gdod bdag dang gzhan gyi don 'grub kyi sgrub pa med na mi 'grub pas sems bskyed pa'i rjes la sgrub pa'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // /
column7: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912561#912561#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2779;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2780# bla na med pa'i byang chub la ni 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid lta bur dmigs pas / / +sems bskyed pa'i rjes la bsgrub pa'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // /
column8: 0.025#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2898309#2898309#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_4251# brtan pa de yang ngo tsha shes pa las  'byung zhing 'grub par 'gyur bas na ngo tsha ba'i rjes la brtan pa'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // /

column3: de la thog ma kho nar bstan bcos kyi lus rnam par gzhag ste zhes bya ba la / / +de la zhes bya ba ni bstan bcos kyi don rnam par 'byed pa de la'am / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920538#920551#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3841;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3842# de'i phyir mthu'i 'og tu yongs su smin par byed pa'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // / +yang na gang la bslab par bya ba'i  rnam pa bdun bshad pa las mthu'i rjes la bdag yongs su smin pa dang  sems can yongs su smin par bya ba smos pas na de bshad pa'i skabs su bab pa'i phyir / /

column3: bstan  bcos la'o // / +thog ma kho nar zhes bya ba ni / / +dang po kho nar ro // / +bstan bcos ni bshad par zad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918298#918299#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3536;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3537# de bas na sems can yongs su smin par bya ba skyo bar mi 'gyur bar thabs bstan pa'i phyir / / +de kho na'i rjes la mthu'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // /
column5: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918195#918196#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3523;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3524;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3525# de kho na'i skabs bshad pa  rdzogs so //// / +de kho na'i skabs bshad pa'i rjes la / / +mthu'i mtshan nyid kyi skabs bshad par cis 'brel zhe na / /
column6: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912610#912610#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2786# rnam pa lnga po de yang sgrub pa la gnas pa rnams kyis 'grub par nus kyi sgrub pa med pa rnams kyis 'grub par mi nus par bstan pa'i phyir sems bskyed pa'i rjes la sgrub pa'i skabs bshad bar 'brel to // /
column7: 0.026#TD4019E.TXT.r#2407883#2407883#TD4019E.TXT.r_75;TD4019E.TXT.r_76# de las mdo sde la 'jug par 'gyur ba dang  yang gzhan dag mdo sde 'di ni nye bar dgod par bya ba ma yin te / / +dgos pa  med pa'i phyir zhes skabs 'gog par byed pa'i log par rtog pa sel bar byed pa yin no // /

column3: de'i lus ni mdor bsdus pa'am / / +don bsdus pa'o // / +gnas kyi don ni lus so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920561#920569#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3842;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3843;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3844;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3845# yang na gang la bslab par bya ba'i  rnam pa bdun bshad pa las mthu'i rjes la bdag yongs su smin pa dang  sems can yongs su smin par bya ba smos pas na de bshad pa'i skabs su bab pa'i phyir / / +mthu'i rjes la yongs su smin pa'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // /

column3: dper na phyi dang nang gi skye mched kyi gnas ni khog pa ste / / +lus zhes bya ba de  bzhin du / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920568#920577#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3844;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3845;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3846# byang chub sems dpa' yongs su  smin par bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la / /

column3: don gang dag la gnas te / / +bstan bcos la 'jug pa'i don de rnams ni de'i lus so // / +de dag kyang don bdun po dag ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920578#920588#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3845;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3846# yongs su smin pa rnam pa gnyis la bdag yongs su smin pa 'chad de yongs su smin zhes bya ba ni / / +dper na nam shing tog bza' bar rung ba'i dus na yongs su smin pa zhes bya ba dang  kha zas bza' bar rung ba'i dus na  yongs su smin pa zhes bya ba / /

column3: mtshan nyid la sogs pa dag go // / +rnam par gzhag ces bya ba ni bcas pa ste / / +bshad ces bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920587#920604#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3846;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3847# dper na nam shing tog bza' bar rung ba'i dus na yongs su smin pa zhes bya ba dang  kha zas bza' bar rung ba'i dus na  yongs su smin pa zhes bya ba / /

column3: bstan bcos khong du chud     // / +pa nyid kyis de'i lus shes par mi 'gyur ram / /
de bas na thog ma de rnam par gzhag pa ni don med do // / +slob ma rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir don med pa ma yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920605#920613#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3847;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3848# de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nam dga' ba dang dad pa la sogs pa yon tan du shes pa chen po dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su smin par 'gyur ba zhes bya'o // / +de la yang dang po'i tshigs bcad gcig gis ni yongs su smin  pa'i don mdor bstan pa'o // /

column3: slob mas don khong du chud na rgyas par brjod kyang bde blag tu khong du chud par 'gyur te dkyus  kyis bstan pa'i rta thags thogs med par rgyug pa bzhin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920614#920623#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3848;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3849# de la yang dang po'i tshigs bcad gcig gis ni yongs su smin  pa'i don mdor bstan pa'o // / +grogs mchog ces bya ba la sogs pa tshigs bcad lhag mas ni gong ma'i don gnyis zhib tu 'chad pas na tshigs bcad dang po ni bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920624#920631#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3849# grogs mchog ces bya ba la sogs pa tshigs bcad lhag mas ni gong ma'i don gnyis zhib tu 'chad pas na tshigs bcad dang po ni bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: gzhan du ma yin no zhes bya ba don bdun po 'di dag bstan bcos 'di las 'chad do zhes bya ba la zhes bya ba ni / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920630#920640#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3849;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3850;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3851# grogs mchog ces bya ba la sogs pa tshigs bcad lhag mas ni gong ma'i don gnyis zhib tu 'chad pas na tshigs bcad dang po ni bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: bstan bcos kyi lus rdzogs so zhes bya ba ni tha tshig go // / +shes par bya ba yin pas don de khong du chud  par bya ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920641#920654#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3851# theg pa chen po'i chos zab cing  rgya chen po 'byung ba bdag dang gzhan gyi don du bstan pa de 'ba' zhig la dga' zhing de la 'dod pa yod kyi nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'dod pa med na byang chub sems dpa' de yongs su smin pa yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: bdun po zhes bya ba ni grangs so // / +'di dag ces bya ba ni mtshan nyid la sogs pa smos pa gang yin pa rnams so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920655#920664#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3851;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3852# theg pa chen po'i chos zab cing  rgya chen po 'byung ba bdag dang gzhan gyi don du bstan pa de 'ba' zhig la dga' zhing de la 'dod pa yod kyi nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'dod pa med na byang chub sems dpa' de yongs su smin pa yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: bstan bcos 'di las zhes bya ba ni dbus dang mtha' rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya'o // / +'chad ces bya ba ni bstan pa'am gtan la  'bebs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920662#920675#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3851;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3852;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3853# theg pa chen po'i chos zab cing  rgya chen po 'byung ba bdag dang gzhan gyi don du bstan pa de 'ba' zhig la dga' zhing de la 'dod pa yod kyi nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'dod pa med na byang chub sems dpa' de yongs su smin pa yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to // / +dad BA ZHES BYA BA LA  theg pa chen po'i gang zag dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la 'di ni bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam ston par byed ba yin pas na dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin no snyam du sems pa ni dad pa zhes bya ste / /

column3: 'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni de'i don khong du chud par byed pa'i tshig gi phrad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920676#920683#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3852;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3853;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3854;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3855# dad ba zhes bya ba la  theg pa chen po'i gang zag dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la 'di ni bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam ston par byed ba yin pas na dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin no snyam du sems pa ni dad pa zhes bya ste / / +de lta bu'i sems yod na yongs su smin pa'i mtshan nyid do // /

column3: mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni / / +'dis mtshon par byed pas mtshan nyid do // / +de yang rnam pa gnyis te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920684#920692#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3853;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3854;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3855# de lta bu'i sems yod na yongs su smin PA'I MTSHAN NYID DO // / +rab zhi zhes bya ba la     // / +nam rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug shas chung bar gyur la nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa spong nus pa'i mthu dang ldan pa ni rab tu zhi ba zhes bya ste / /

column3: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid dang  rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid do // / +de la kun  nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid ni rnam pa dgu ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920693#920703#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3855;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3856# nam rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug shas chung bar gyur la nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa spong nus pa'i mthu dang ldan pa ni rab tu zhi ba zhes bya ste / /

column3: yang dag ma yin kun rtog yod // / +ces bya ba nas bzung ste / / +rnam bdun yang dag min rtog las // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920704#920713#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3856;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3857;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3858# de lta bu'i mthu yod na yongs su smin pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur par rig par  bya'o ; / /

column3: zhes bya ba'i bar du'o // / +lhag ma ni rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid du bstan to // / +gal te 'dis mtshon par byed pas mtshan nyid  ces bya na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920714#920727#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3858;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3859;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3860# sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong nas sems can de dag gi sdug bsngal ji ltar bsal bar bya snyam du sems pa ni snying brtse ba zhes bya ste / /

column3: de lta na ni mtshan nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa dang  rnam par byang ba dang tha dad par 'gyur ro zhe na / / +de ni de lta ma yin te dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin nyid mtshan nyid de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920726#920737#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3859;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3860;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3861;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3862# snying rje de lta bu yod na yongs su smin pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya'o // /
column5: 0.007#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#910778#910778#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2568# rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes lhun gyis grub pas bdag nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su smin par bya ba dang  sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la 'bad rtsol med par rang bzhin gyis lhun gyis grub par byed pas na chu bo'i klung dang 'dra'o // /
column6: 0.015#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2935266#2935267#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_9277# gzugs med pa'i khams su skyes nas bdag nyid sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su smin par bya ba dang  sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i mtha' med pa'i phyir te / /
column7: 0.021#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2768228#2768231#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_9462# de dag gis de na sems can la phan gdags pa'i bya ba dang  sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su smin par bya ba dang  sems can yongs su smin par bya ba rgya chen po ma mthong ba'i phyir te / /
column8: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#910983#910984#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2589# sa brgyad pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams rnam par  mi rtog pa lhun gyis grub pas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su smin par bya ba dang  sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la lhun gyis grub pa nyid du byed par 'dra ste / /

column3: dper na sa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid ni sra ba ste / / +sra ba nyid las sa'i khams gud na med pa lta  bu'o ; / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920738#920748#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3861;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3862# bdag nyid sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su smin par bya ba dang  sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i tshe / / +mgo dang rkang lag la sogs pa gtong ba dang  grang ba dang tsha ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal byung yang nyams su len nus na ni bzod pa zhes bya ste / /

column3: yang na des mtshon par bya bas mtshan nyid de // / +de ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa dang  rnam par byang ba yang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang  rnam par byang ba'i bdag nyid kyis mtshon par bya bas mtshan nyid du 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920749#920766#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3862;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3863;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3864;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3865;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3866# mgo dang rkang lag la sogs pa gtong ba dang  grang ba dang tsha ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal byung yang nyams su len nus na ni bzod pa zhes bya ste / /

column3: yang na kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba gnyis    las mtshan nyid rnam pa gnyis te / / +rang gi mtshan nyid dang spyi'i mtshan nyid do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920765#920782#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3864;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3865;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3866;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3867;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3868# yid rno ba zhes bya ba la / / +chos rnams bshad pa'i dus na yang / / +dang po nyan pa'i dus na yang don dang tshig 'dzin nus la / /

column3: sgrib pa zhes bya ba ni dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa'am / / +'dis dge ba'i chos rnams bsgrib pas sgrib pa ste / /
skye ba la bgegs byed pa'i phyir sgrib pa'o // / +de yang lnga bcu  rtsa gsum mo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920783#920791#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3868;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3869;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3870# don rnams ni ma nor bar rtogs nus pa ni yid rno ba zhes bya ste / /

column3: de kho na zhes bya ba ni 'di nyid de yin pas de'o // / +de'i dngos po ni de kho na ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920792#920800#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3869;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3870;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3871# de lta bu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongs su smin par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o // / +mthu yod pa dang zhes bya ba la / / +bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs shas cher bsags pas nyon mongs pa  rnams kyis zil gyis mi non cing stong pa nyid kyi don rtogs pa ni mthu yod pa zhes bya ste / /
column5: 0.020#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2628982#2628986#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_11593;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_11594# bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen pos yang dag par 'grub pa'i phyir RO ZHES BYA BA NI / / +bsod  nams kyi tshogs chen pos yang dag par 'grub pa'i phyir dang  ye shes kyi tshogs chen pos yang dag par 'grub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste / /

column3: phyin ci ma log ces bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +de yang rnam pa bcu'o // / +mi mthun pa'i phyogs spangs pa'i phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920799#920809#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3871;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3872# bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs shas cher bsags pas nyon mongs pa  rnams kyis zil gyis mi non cing stong pa nyid kyi don rtogs pa ni mthu yod pa zhes bya ste / /

column3: phyogs ni gnyen po ste de ni lam mo // / +de goms par bya ba ni bsgom  pa'o ; / / +gnas skabs ni de nyid rgyun gyis skye ba'i khyad par ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920808#920819#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3871;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3872;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3873;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3874# bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs shas cher bsags pas nyon mongs pa  rnams kyis zil gyis mi non cing stong pa nyid kyi don rtogs pa ni mthu yod pa zhes bya ste / / +de 'dra ba dang ldan pa yang yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid do // /

column3: de yang rnam par bcu dgu ste / / +rigs kyi gnas la sogs pa'o // / +'bras bu thob pa ni 'bras bu rnyed pa'o / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920820#920830#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3874;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3875# byang chub sems dpa' de byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa'i  dus na bdud la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su sprul te / /

column3: de yang rnam pa bco lnga ste / / +rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu la sogs pa'o // / +theg pa bla na med pa zhes bya ba  ni 'dis 'gro bas theg pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920831#920843#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3875;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3876# byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa 'dor du bcug kyang spyod pa mi gtong ba dang  mu stegs pas rnam pa sna tshogs bshad de gzhan du bsgyur bar brtsams kyang lta ba mi 'gyur ba ni mi 'phrogs pa zhes bya ste / /

column3: de ni theg pa yang yin la bla na med pa yang yin pas theg pa bla na med pa'o // / +de yang rnam pa gsum ste / / +bsgrub pa bla na med pa la sogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920844#920852#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3875;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3876;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3877;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3878# byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa 'dor du bcug kyang spyod pa mi gtong ba dang  mu stegs pas rnam pa sna tshogs bshad de gzhan du bsgyur bar brtsams kyang lta ba mi 'gyur ba ni mi 'phrogs pa zhes bya ste / / +de    lta bur gyur na yongs su smin pa'i mtshan nyid yin no // / +yan lag dang ldan pa zhes bya ba la / /

column3: don bdun pa zhes bya ba ni / / +nges pa'i don dang go rims kyi don du smos pa ste / / +don 'di rnams  'dir bshad kyi de las gzhan ma yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920854#920866#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3878;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3879;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3880# nam yongs su smin par gyur ba de ni spong ba'i yan lag lnga dang ldan te / / +spong ba'i yan lag lnga ni dad pa dang  gyo med pa dang  sgyu med pa dang  nad med pa dang  gnas  mthu dang ldan pa ste / /

column3: yang go rims 'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes dang mthun pa'i phyir te / / +'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' mos pas spyod pa la gnas pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920867#920876#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3880;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3881# de lnga'i don zhib tu ni 'og nas 'chad do // /

column3: tshul khrims la rab tu gnas pas / / +thog mar kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par  byang ba la mkhas par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920877#920885#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3881;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3882;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3883# rab ces bya ba ni gang du bshad pa'i chos dgu po kun kyang shas chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: de'i 'og tu dge ba'i chos rnams kyi gang gis sgrib pa gang yin pa de shes par bya ste / / +de ma spangs na rnam par grol mi srid la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920883#920900#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3881;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3882;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3883;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3884# rab ces bya ba ni gang du bshad pa'i chos dgu po kun kyang shas chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i don to // / +de ni rgyal sras yongs su smin pa'i mtshan // /

column3: rnam par mi shes na yang nyes pa ma mthong bas spong mi nus so // / +de'i 'og tu sgrib pa de las dmigs pa gang gis  sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba de ni de kho na yin par khong du chud par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920900#920913#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3883;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3884;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3885;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3886# zhes bya ba ni gong du bshad pa'i chos dgu po de dag ni byang  chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su smin pa'i mtshan nyid de / / +de dgu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' de yongs su smin pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922372#922372#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4076;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4077# stobs rnyed pa yongs su smin pa'i mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba ni stobs kyi rgyu dang  rang bzhin dang  las  gsum dang ldan na stobs yongs su smin pa rnyed do zhes bya ba'i don to // / +mi 'phrogs pa yongs su smin pa las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la / /

column3: de'i 'og tu dmigs pa des sgrib pa de sbyor ba gang gis zad par 'gyur ba de gnyen po bsgom par shes par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920914#920924#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3885;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3886;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3887# dga' ba yongs su smin pa las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la / / +gong du chos  rnam pa dgu zhig glengs pa las dga' ba'i sems ji tsam zhig thob na / /

column3: de'i 'og tu gnyen po bsgom pa ni de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs 'bri ba dang gnyen po     // / +'phel ba la gnas skabs su shes par bya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900383#900384#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1395;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1396# khas blangs pa'i don rgya cher bshad pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920925#920934#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3886;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3887;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3888# gong du chos  rnam pa dgu zhig glengs pa las dga' ba'i sems ji tsam zhig thob na / / +dga' ba smin par gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column6: 0.013#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2894819#2894819#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3788# byang chub sems dpa' rnams su thugs rje dang ldan pa'i thugs kyis sbyin pa btang ba'i 'bras bu de dag pas longs spyod khyad par can 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column7: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912955#912958#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2836;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2837# gong du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do zhes bshad pa ji ltar na bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column8: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924254#924254#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4299# de yang tshul khrims ci 'dra bas sems can ji ltar smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column9: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921525#921526#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3965;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3966# sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong na sems can sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir 'jug pa ni snying rje ste sems kyi brtse ba ji tsam zhig skyes na snying rje yongs su smin pa yin pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column10: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922396#922398#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4079;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4080# mu stegs pa la sogs pas kyang lta ba bsgyur bar mi nus pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column11: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925285#925285#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4426# bsam gtan ci 'dra bas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column12: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925471#925471#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4454# de yang shes rab ji lta bus sems can ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column13: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912825#912825#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2820# ji ltar bdag la de ltar sgrub pa de bzhin du sems can gzhan la yang de dang 'dra bar sgrub par  byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column14: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#919666#919666#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3716# da ni mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa rnams sangs rgyas  kyi zhing rnam pa gnyis dag par byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column15: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924892#924892#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4374# de yang bzod pa 'di 'dra bas sems can 'di ltar smin par byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column16: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925103#925103#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4405# de yang brtson 'grus ji lta bus  sems can 'di 'dra bar yongs su smin par byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column17: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906651#906652#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2073# nyan thos kyi rigs dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyis rang rang gi 'bras bu thob pa bas byang chub sems dpa'i rigs kyis byang  chub chen po'i 'bras bu thob pa khyad zhugs par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column18: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#905350#905352#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1932;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1933# byang chub sems dpa'i rigs 'di yang yon tan rnam pa bzhi'i gzhi dang rten byed pas gser chen po'i rigs dang 'dra bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column19: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914117#914117#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2997# sems dpa'i sgrub pa 'phags so zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column20: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914541#914542#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3047# spyod yul ni lus kyi sgo nas spyod lam bzhi  la spyod ba dang  mig gi dbang po nas yid kyi dbang po'i bar du dbang po drug gis so so'i yul mthong ba dang thos pa la sogs ba byas pa rnams sems can gyi don du bsngo bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column21: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917896#917897#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3478;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3479# ye shes de'i che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa dang  che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'i sgo nas mthar thug pa'i lam yang bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column22: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#943294#943294#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6852# mis thob par mi 'gyur ro snyam nas zhum pa dang mis thob nas yang bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis thob pas sgrub dka'o snyam nas  zhum pa dang  de ltar dus ring du bsgoms kyang la las thob kyi kun gyis mi thob bo snyam nas zhum pa de dag la rgyu rnam pa gsum gyis na zhum par mi rigs par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column23: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#981740#981740#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11700# byang chub sems  dpa' sems can gyi don byed pa na zhe sdang gi sgo nas byas pa rnams ni nyes pa dang ltung bar 'gyur gyi 'dod chags kyi sgo nas byas pa rnams ni nyes pa dang ltung bar mi 'gyur bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column24: 0.021#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2889762#2889762#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3096# nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa yang ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column25: 0.021#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2892211#2892213#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3460# des 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad zil gyis gnon cing 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad las 'phags par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column26: 0.021#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2893156#2893156#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3587# sems can gzhan bde  na byang chub sems dpa' ci'ang mi bdog kyang bde bar 'gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column27: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#928754#928754#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4916# da ni gnas yongs su gyur pa'i don bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa drug rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: rigs kyi gnas skabs la sogs pa'o // / +de'i 'og tu 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mngon du gyur pa ni 'bras bu rnams te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920935#920942#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3888;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3889# de yang don rnam pa gsum gyis bstan te / / +dga' ba yongs su smin par byed pa'i rgyu dang  dga' ba yongs su  smin pa'i rang bzhin dang  dga' ba yongs su smin pa'i las dang gsum mo // /

column3: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sogs par shes par bya'o // / +de dag thams cad kyang bla ma dang bcas pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang nyan thos la sogs pa dang thun mong ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920943#920957#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3889;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3890;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3891;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3892# dga' ba yongs su smin par byed pa'i rgyu dang  dga' ba yongs su  smin pa'i rang bzhin dang  dga' ba yongs su smin pa'i las dang gsum mo // /

column3: mdo las ji skad du / / +rab tu byung ba de nyan thos kyi bslab pa dang  cho ga dang spyod yul dang  yang dag par spyod pa la yang slob po // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920956#920968#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3891;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3892;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3893# grogs ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bya ste / / +dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa dang  dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang  mnyan nas chos kyi  don phyin ci ma log par yid la byed pa ni grogs mchog la sogs pa gsum zhes bya ste / /

column3: rang sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa  dang  cho ga dang  spyod yul dang  yang dag par spyod pa la slob po // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920969#920976#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3892;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3893;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3894;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3895# dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa dang  dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang  mnyan nas chos kyi  don phyin ci ma log par yid la byed pa ni grogs mchog la sogs pa gsum zhes bya ste / / +'di ni dga' ba yongs su smin pa'i rgyu yin no // /

column3: byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa dang  cho ga dang  spyod yul dang  yang dag par spyod pa la yang slob po zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920977#920986#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3894;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3895;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3896# brtson 'grus che zhes bya ba la / / +theg pa chen po'i chos nyan pa dang  sems pa dang  bsgom pa la res 'ga' 'jug la res  'ga' mi 'jug pa ma yin gyi / /

column3: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ni bla na med pa thun mong ma yin pa ste  don bdun pa bla na med pa'o // / +gzhan na re kun nas nyon mongs pa dang  rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid la mkhas par bya ba bskyed pa'i phyir thog mar mtshan nyid do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920987#920994#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3895;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3896;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3897;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3898# theg pa chen po'i chos nyan pa dang  sems pa dang  bsgom pa la res 'ga' 'jug la res  'ga' mi 'jug pa ma yin gyi / / +rgyun mi 'chad par 'jug pas na brtson 'grus che ba zhes bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920995#921002#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3896;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3897;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3898# rgyun mi 'chad par 'jug pas na brtson 'grus che ba zhes bya'o // / +dam pa'i mthar phyin zhes bya ba la / / +bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas bzhi la the tshom dang som nyi med pa ni dam pa'i chos mthar phyin pa zhes bya ste / /

column3: de la kun nas nyon mongs pa gang yin pa de ni / / +sgrib pa'o // / +rnam par byang ba gang yin pa de ni de kho na'o // / +de kho na nyid  khong du chud pas sgrib pa spong bar 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921001#921013#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3898;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3899;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3900;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3901# bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas bzhi la the tshom dang som nyi med pa ni dam pa'i chos mthar phyin pa zhes bya ste / /

column3: de'i phyir sgrib pa dang de kho na'o // / +de spang ba'i thabs bstan pa'i phyir // / +de'i 'og tu gnyen po 'khor dang bcas pa ni lam mo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921012#921024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3901# sems can gyi las rnam pa sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang  sman dang sngags kyi mthu bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang  rnal 'byor pa'i spyod yul bsam gyis  mi khyab pa ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#973179#973180#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10641# phyi'i dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'grub par byed pa'i las bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang  rnal 'byor pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul bsam gyis mi  khyab pa dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang  sman dang sngags kyi mthu bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste / /

column3: lam de'i thog ma dang bar ma dang tha mal chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po rab tu dbye bar bstan pa'i phyir de'i gnas skabs  so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921025#921043#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3901;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3902;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3903;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3904;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3905# sems can gyi las rnam pa sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang  sman dang sngags kyi mthu bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang  rnal 'byor pa'i spyod yul bsam gyis  mi khyab pa ste / / +brtson 'grus che ba dang  dam pa'i mthar phyin pa dang  gnyis kyis dga' ba yongs su smin pa'i rang bzhin bstan to // /

column3: gnas skabs dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu thob par byed pas / / +de'i 'og tu 'bras bu'o // / +de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' dang  nyan thos la sogs pa dang thun mong ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921044#921059#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3904;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3905;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3906# mchog gi chos ni theg pa chen po'i chos te / / +sdud ces bya ba ni theg pa chen po'i chos  'jig rten la ring du gnas shing mi nub par bya ba'i phyir srung bar byed de / /

column3: de bas na thun mong ma yin pa dang theg pa chen po'i tshul rab tu bstan pa'i phyir bla na med pa  zhes bya'o zer ro // /
column4: 0.010#TD4035E.TXT.r#164959#164961#TD4035E.TXT.r_7028;TD4035E.TXT.r_7029# de la nye bar spyod pa'i dga' bas dga' bar mi byed pa'i phyir ro // / +ji ltar mos par mi byed ce na / /
column5: 0.010#TD4043E.TXT.r#367619#367620#TD4043E.TXT.r_1564;TD4043E.TXT.r_1565# rgud pa zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pa'i bar de dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur bas na byang chub sems dpa' de dag de la skyo bar bya ba'i phyir ston par byed do // / +rab tu byung bas yang ji ltar rab tu byung ba'i don rnams yang dag  par sgrub par byed pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ston par byed de / /
column6: 0.011#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2603091#2603091#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_8396# yang ji ltar na nyon mongs pas 'jigs pas yongs su mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir spel bar byed ce na / /
column7: 0.015#TD4035E.TXT.r#174006#174008#TD4035E.TXT.r_8674;TD4035E.TXT.r_8675;TD4035E.TXT.r_8676# dran par mi byed cing / / +yid la mi byed pa'i phyir te / / +ji ltar dran par mi byed cing  yid la mi byed par byed ce na / /
column8: 0.018#TD4062E.TXT.r#2963630#2963630#TD4062E.TXT.r_399# de yang yang srid par nying mtshams sbyor bar byed pa dag na lus nye bar len pa'i phyir len pa'i rnam par  shes pa zhes bya'o // /
column9: 0.019#TD4035E.TXT.r#192999#192999#TD4035E.TXT.r_11897# de dag la mkhas pa ga la zhig mngon par chags par byed ces bstan pa'i phyir ro //// /
column10: 0.020#TD4036E.TXT.r#38979#38979#TD4036E.TXT.r_5841;TD4036E.TXT.r_5842# bskyod du zin kyang log par bsgrub pa'i phyir / / +des ni 'phags pa'i lam skyed par mi byed do // /
column11: 0.020#TD4069E.TXT.r#642104#642104#TD4069E.TXT.r_2739;TD4069E.TXT.r_2740# zhum pa dang  rgod pa'i gnyen po bsgom pa nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni zhum pa'i gnyen po bsgom pa'i phyir sems rab tu 'dzin par byed do // / +rgod pa'i gnyen po bsgom pa'i phyir sems rab tu 'jog par byed do zhes bya bar sbyar ro // /
column12: 0.021#TD4037E.TXT.r#1335454#1335454#TD4037E.TXT.r_2700;TD4037E.TXT.r_2701# gzhan dag la tshul 'chos pa'i phyir yang sbyin par mi byed pa'i phyir ro // / +bkren pa'i tshul du sbyin pa sbyin par yang mi byed de / /
column13: 0.021#TD4018E.TXT.r#3010332#3010333#TD4018E.TXT.r_842;TD4018E.TXT.r_843# de dag yod pa nyid de 'bras bur 'brel bar byed pa  nges pa'i phyir ro // / +de dag don dam par yod pa ma yin par ji ltar yid ches par bya zhes 'dri ba la / /
column14: 0.021#TD4036E.TXT.r#12232#12232#TD4036E.TXT.r_1777;TD4036E.TXT.r_1778# don mdor bsdu ba gzhan yang gnyen pos yongs su zin pa dang  'dod pa'i bsod snyoms kyi mtha' rnam par sbang pa dang  bdag nyid dub pa'i mtha' rnam par spangs pa dang  tshangs par spyad pa la phan par bya ba'i phyir yongs su longs spyod par byed pa yin no // / +ji ltar ji  ltar na gnyen pos yongs su zin pa yin zhe na / /
column15: 0.022#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3125702#3125703#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4741;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4742# des  kyang de byed la / / +mi byed na yang le los yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // /
column16: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#685682#685682#TD4083E.TXT.r_183# thabs mkhas pas kyang ston par byed pa de bzhin du ser sna can rnams kyi ser sna spong bar byed pa dang  tshe 'di la yang yang dag pa dang  tshegs chung ngus longs spyod  rnams bsgrub pa dang  bsrung ba dang  bstan pa 'di la sdang ba rnams dad pa thob par bya ba dang  mthong ba thob par bya ba dang  lta ba rnam par dag pas ngan song las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba dang  kun tu sbyor ba thams cad mthar thug pas sdug bsngal ba thams cad las yang dag  par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston pa'am thabs mkhas pas kyang ston par byed do // /
column17: 0.023#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1409667#1409667#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_1068;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_1069# 'byung ba chen po de rnams chen por gnas shing chen por bkod pa'i phyir ro // / +'byung ba rgyas par byed bas na 'byung ba dag yin no // /
column18: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2380218#2380218#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8285;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8286# skur par yang mi byed de yang dag pa ma yin pa tsam du yod pa'i  phyir ro // / +yongs su grub pa la ni sgro 'dogs par mi byed de yang dag par yod pa'i phyir ro // /
column19: 0.023#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2603045#2603045#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_8391;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_8392# gsum pa ni rnam par grol ba'i lam lta bu yin no zhes bya ba ni zag pa med pa'o // / +dbang po rtul po rnams ni nyon mongs pas kyang 'jigs pa'i phyir spel bar byed de / /
column20: 0.023#TD4036E.TXT.r#12746#12747#TD4036E.TXT.r_1859;TD4036E.TXT.r_1860# de dag de la gzhol ba dang  de la bab pa dang  de la 'bab pa de'i sems kyi rgyud la 'jug par byed de / / +des na des bde ba la reg par gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // /
column21: 0.024#TD4032E.TXT.r#1959951#1959951#TD4032E.TXT.r_6266;TD4032E.TXT.r_6267# rang bzhin gyis 'byung ba med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro // / +ngo bo nyid med par shes pas shes bya'i ngo bo nyid med par mi byed de / /
column22: 0.024#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#1999308#1999308#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_3076# dka' thub drag po'i lung 'bogs pa na  don ma yin pa 'dod pa ltar de la phan par 'dod pa'i ston pa'am gzhan yang sdig pa dang 'brel bar 'gyur ro de dag gsung de shi na zhes bya ba ni gcer bu pa gsung de shi na de la gnod pa bya ba'i phyir dug dang bcas pa'i zas sbyin par byed pa ltar de la phan par bya ba'i phyir sbyin par byed pa bsod nams 'dod pa yang  kha na ma tho ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro // /
column23: 0.024#TD4032E.TXT.r#1925715#1925715#TD4032E.TXT.r_970# de ltar sgrib pa'i phyir ma rig pas 'gro ba nyon mongs par byed do // /
column24: 0.024#TD4036E.TXT.r#48496#48497#TD4036E.TXT.r_7398# ji ltar bsams pa'i don yang dag par 'grub pa'i phyir 'gro bar yang 'gyur ro // /
column25: 0.024#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2914484#2914484#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_6541;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_6542# de yang mi rung bar ston to // / +ji ltar mi rung bar rigs pa bstan pa'i phyir / /
column26: 0.025#TD4046E.TXT.r#2196244#2196244#TD4046E.TXT.r_48;TD4046E.TXT.r_49;TD4046E.TXT.r_50# bdag nyid la ltos nas nyams par mi byed do // / +brgyal bag med pa'am / / +brjed ngas pa'am / /
column27: 0.025#TD4036E.TXT.r#12515#12515#TD4036E.TXT.r_1819;TD4036E.TXT.r_1820# de la zas ran par yongs su longs spyod par byed cing / / +zas ran pa ma yin pas yongs su longs spyod par mi byed pas na // /
column28: 0.026#TD4036E.TXT.r#36401#36401#TD4036E.TXT.r_5488;TD4036E.TXT.r_5489# sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams dang po nyid nas mi skyed pa'i phyir spro ba skyed par byed / / +smon lam 'debs par byed cing dang du len par mi 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed  pa'i phyir 'dun pa yin no // /
column29: 0.026#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3125657#3125657#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4736# des kyang de byed la mi byed na yang ma mos pas yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // /
column30: 0.027#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1722612#1722612#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_3328# de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'di snyam du ston pa'i mdun du yang bdag gis bshad pa la dge slong  'di phyir zlog par byed khong khro bar byed cing tshangs par mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyang bdag gis bshad pa la / /
column31: 0.028#TD4046E.TXT.r#2199123#2199123#TD4046E.TXT.r_432;TD4046E.TXT.r_433# bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi ngo bo nyid kyang ma yin na ni gzhan gyi sems bsrung ba'i phyir te gtong bar byed do // / +de las bzlog pa ni gtong bar mi byed do // /
column32: 0.028#TD4047E.TXT.r#1172881#1172881#TD4047E.TXT.r_7562;TD4047E.TXT.r_7563# bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi ngo bo nyid kyang ma yin na ni gzhan gyi sems bsrung ba'i phyir de gtong bar byed do // / +de las bzlog pa ni  gtong bar mi byed de // /
column33: 0.029#TD4046E.TXT.r#2199093#2199093#TD4046E.TXT.r_428# gzhan gyi sems dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir ji skad bstan pa'i mtshan nyid la mthun par 'jug par yang mi byed la / /
column34: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1172852#1172852#TD4047E.TXT.r_7557# de bzhin du gzhan gyi sbyor ba la yang gzhan gyi sems dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir ji skad bstan pa'i mtshan nyid la mthun par 'jug par yang mi byed la / /

column3: gzhan dag na re yod pa dang med pa'i mtshan nyid shes par bya ba'i phyir thog mar mtshan nyid bshad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921058#921067#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3905;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3906;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3907# sdud ces bya ba ni theg pa chen po'i chos  'jig rten la ring du gnas shing mi NUB PAR BYA BA'I PHYIR SRUNG bar byed de / / +de yang ji ltar srung bar byed ce na / /
column5: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2324270#2324270#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1631;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1632# ji ltar thos pa bzhin du sgra'i rjes su mngon par zhen par gyur pa bstan pa dang  de dag gi lta ba'i rjes su 'brang bar mi byed cing / / +mngon par  yid mi ches pa'i gang zag bstan pa'o // /
column6: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2324416#2324417#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1645;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1646# gal te sems can  gang dag de'i lta ba'i rjes su 'brang bar mi byed pa dag ni de dag las chos rnams thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa dang  skye ba med pa dang  'gag pa med pa dang  gzod ma nas zhi ba dang  rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes thos na skrag  cing dngang la zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de dag gi lta ba'i rjes su 'brang bar mi byed cing / / +mngon par yid mi ches pa'i gang zag bsten pa'o // /
column7: 0.027#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2738570#2738570#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_5389;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_5390# ci mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa ni cig car ram rim gyis sam ji ltar spong bar byed ce na / / +mthong ba'i lam la yang dag par zhugs pa'i 'phags pa'i gang zag gis shes pa'i spyod pa ni mtshan ma med pa yin te / /
column8: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#915752#915752#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3206;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3207# de bas na ji tsam bdag tu  lta ba yod pa de tsam du gang zag la bdag med pa ma rtogs pas / / +gang zag bdag med par rtogs par 'dod bas bdag tu 'dod pa spongs shig ces bstan pa dang  gang zag la bdag med pa'i don gtan la dbab pa'i phyir / /

column3: mtshan nyid shes nas sgrib pa spang bar bya ba dang  de kho na mngon sum du bya bas de'i 'og tu sgrib pa dang de kho na'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921068#921077#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3907# ji tsam du theg pa chen po'i chos 'chad pa'i gang zag dang  nyan pa'i gang zag yod pa de tsam du theg pa chen po'i chos ma nub pa yin par khong du chud pas theg  pa chen po'i chos 'chad pa yin ba dang  nyan pa'i gang zag rnams la 'tshe ba dang gnod pa byed pa rnams kyi skyabs byed cing yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis ston par byed pa'o // /

column3: de gnyis spang ba dang mngon du bya ba'i thabs    ni 'di yin te / / +gnyen po bsgom pa'o // / +de'i 'bring dang mchog ni gnas skabs kyi khyad par ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921076#921088#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3907;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3908# ji tsam du theg pa chen po'i chos 'chad pa'i gang zag dang  nyan pa'i gang zag yod pa de tsam du theg pa chen po'i chos ma nub pa yin par khong du chud pas theg  pa chen po'i chos 'chad pa yin ba dang  nyan pa'i gang zag rnams la 'tshe ba dang gnod pa byed pa rnams kyi skyabs byed cing yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis ston par byed pa'o // /

column3: des spang bar bya ba ni 'bras bu'o // / +de'i 'og tu theg pa bla na med pa'o zhes bya bar rab tu bstan pa'i phyir 'di ni go rims so zhes zer ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921089#921101#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3907;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3908;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3909;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3910;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3911# ji tsam du theg pa chen po'i chos 'chad pa'i gang zag dang  nyan pa'i gang zag yod pa de tsam du theg pa chen po'i chos ma nub pa yin par khong du chud pas theg  pa chen po'i chos 'chad pa yin ba dang  nyan pa'i gang zag rnams la 'tshe ba dang gnod pa byed pa rnams kyi skyabs byed cing yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis ston par byed pa'o // / +'dis ni yongs su smin pa'i las bstan to // / +dam chos cher gsung phyir ni snying rje can // /

column3: gzhan yang sems pa yod pa dang  med pa'i chos la rmongs nas / / +skur pa 'debs pa dang  sgro 'dogs pa spang ba'i phyir mtshan nyid bshad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921099#921113#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3909;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3910;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3911;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3912# dam chos cher gsung phyir ni snying rje can // / +yang dag  yongs su smin pa'i mtshan nyid 'dod // / +ces bya ba ni dga' ba yongs su smin pa bstan pa de yang / /

column3: rmongs pa spangs nas sgrib pa la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir sgrib pa'o // / +des de kho na bsgribs pas de kho na la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir de'i 'og tu de kho na'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921114#921128#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3912;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3913;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3914# snying rje dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams theg pa chen po'i chos gzung zhing 'jig rten du ring du GNAS PAR BYA BA'I PHYIR DGA' ba yongs su smin par bya ba la 'jug ste / /

column3: de kho  na rab tu rtogs pa bsgoms pas sgrib pa spong bar 'gyur bas de kho na'i 'og tu gnyen po bsgom pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921126#921136#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3913;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3914;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3915# gong  du bshad pa de dag ni dga' ba yongs su smin pa'i mtshan nyin yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // / +byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa yongs su smin pa'i mtshan nyid de ni theg pa chen po'i chos gzungs su gzung ba'i dbang du byas par rig par bya'o // /
column5: 0.015#TD4054E.TXT.r#1037816#1037818#TD4054E.TXT.r_7508;TD4054E.TXT.r_7509# bden pa mngon par rtogs pa yang ma nges pa dang  nges pa dang  tshe rabs de nyid kyi dang ldan pa'i phyir go rims  bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +de la bden pa'i dbang du byas pa'i chos ni mos pa dang dad pa'i mtshan nyid kyi thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams te / /
column6: 0.020#TD4053E.TXT.r#2993208#2993210#TD4053E.TXT.r_3826;TD4053E.TXT.r_3827# de yang nges pa dang ma nges pa dang  tshe rabs de nyid kyi dus dang ldan pa'i phyir go rims bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +'di la bden pa'i dbang du byas pa'i chos la mos pa dang  dad pa'i mtshan nyid kyi  thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams te / /

column3: de'i dbye ba la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir gnas skabs so // / +gnas skabs kyis 'bras bu rab tu phye bas de la mkhas par bya ba bskyed pa'i phyir gnas skabs kyi 'og tu 'bras  bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921135#921144#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3914;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3915# byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa yongs su smin pa'i mtshan nyid de ni theg pa chen po'i chos gzungs su gzung ba'i dbang du byas par rig par bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921145#921153#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3915;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3916# byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba yongs  su smin pa yang theg pa chen po'i chos 'jig rten du yun ring du gnas pa'i don du smin par byed do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /

column3: de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la brten pas theg pa bla na med pa tha mar bshad do snyam mo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921151#921161#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3915;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3916;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3917# byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba yongs  su smin PA YANG THEG PA CHEN PO'I chos 'jig rten du yun ring du gnas pa'i don du smin par byed do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +dad pa yongs su smin pa las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la / /

column3: de la mtshan nyid las brtsams nas / / +yang dag ma yin kun rtog yod // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921160#921170#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3917;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3918# dad pa'i cha ji tsam zhig sems la skyes na dad pa yongs su smin pa zhes bya ba bstan pa'i    phyir tshigs su bcad ba rtsom ste / /

column3: de la gnyis po yod ma yin // / +stong pa nyid ni 'di la yod // / +de la yang ni de yod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921168#921178#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3917;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3918;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3919;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3920# dad pa'i cha ji tsam zhig sems la skyes na dad pa yongs su smin pa zhes bya ba bstan pa'i    phyir tshigs su bcad ba rtsom ste / /

column3: zhes bya bar  gsungs so zhes bya ba la / / +de la zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid dang  sgrib pa la sogs pa dngos po bdun smos pa dag gi nang nas mtshan nyid las brtsams nas de'i dbang du mdzad de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921175#921197#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3918;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3919;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3920;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3921;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3922;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3923;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3924;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3925# de yang don du na / / +dad pa'i rgyu yang bsags / / +dad pa'i rang bzhin yang phun sum tshogs / /
column5: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922921#922921#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4152# dgu pos bdag sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i chos dgu po de nyid yon tan dang  bdag nyid chen po bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column6: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922005#922005#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4033# de yang yid rno ba zhes bya ba'i rgyu dang  rang bzhin dang  las gsum dang ldan na yid rno ba yongs su smin pa  yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column7: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906653#906653#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2073;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2074# nyan thos kyi rigs dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyis rang rang gi 'bras bu thob pa bas byang chub sems dpa'i rigs kyis byang  chub chen po'i 'bras bu thob pa khyad zhugs par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // / +shin tu yangs pa'i yon tan byang chub shing skyes pas // /
column8: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#919976#919976#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3750# ldan pa'i don bstan nas mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa'i sems can byang chub sems dpa' rnams mthu rnam pa  drug gis sems can gyi don la ji skad 'jug pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: de'i phyir / / +yang dag ma yin kun rtog yod // / +ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so // / +ji ltar bstan  pa de bzhin du bshad de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921195#921207#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3922;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3924;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3925;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3926;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3927# dad pa yongs su smin to zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // / +shes dang zhes bya ba la / / +yon tan shes pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yon tan khong du chud pa ste / /

column3: thog mar mtshan nyid bstan pas de'i phyir lhag ma rnams pas de nyid bshad pa sngar brtsam mo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4018E.TXT.r#3078206#3078211#TD4018E.TXT.r_9667;TD4018E.TXT.r_9668;TD4018E.TXT.r_9669# bcom ldan 'das gang gis bdag dang  byang chub sems dpa' gzhan rnams zhes bya ba  la sogs pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byas pa'am / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921208#921218#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3926;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3927;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3928# de yang ji ltar khong du chud ce na / / +ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la  sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan par khong du chud pa'o // /
column6: 0.012#TD4094.2E.TXT.r#1915703#1915705#TD4094.2E.TXT.r_4065# gang yang 'das pa'i dus na byung bar gyur pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang chos nyid la bkur stir bya ba dang  bla mar bya ba  dang ; /
column7: 0.013#TD4087E.TXT.r#1558328#1558331#TD4087E.TXT.r_45;TD4087E.TXT.r_46# gal te khyim par 'dug cing khyim na gnas na ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rgyal ba zhes bya ba nas / / +rgyas par 'jig rten 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi  bar du 'gyur te / /
column8: 0.015#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2895862#2895864#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3922;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3923# de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la / / +sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i yon tan  dang ldan par shes nas sems dad pa dang  dad pa bskyed de dngos po chen pos rtag tu mchod pa dang gus pas rtag tu mchod na grub pa kun thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar sbyar ro // /
column9: 0.016#TD4041E.TXT.r#1272530#1272531#TD4041E.TXT.r_554;TD4041E.TXT.r_555;TD4041E.TXT.r_556# bcom ldan 'das ni byang chub kyi snying por sdig pa can gyi chos dang  bdud kyi  gyul gyi stobs thams cad bcom pa'o // / +de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni mdor bstan pa'o // / +'di ltar dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa las rnam par grol ba'o // /
column10: 0.017#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1795564#1795564#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_12070# de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la sbyin pa sbyin par byed na gang zag so so yon gnas yin no // /
column11: 0.017#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1742790#1742790#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_5685# ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes 'jig rten du mngon par grags par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to // /
column12: 0.018#TD4025E.TXT.r#2167065#2167067#TD4025E.TXT.r_189# 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang gyo bar mi mdzad / /
column13: 0.018#TD4035E.TXT.r#197322#197322#TD4035E.TXT.r_12664;TD4035E.TXT.r_12665# de de ltar sems shin tu rnam par grol bas / / +de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur te / /
column14: 0.020#TD4010E.TXT.r#2243553#2243553#TD4010E.TXT.r_1607# ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas rab tu dad pa'i sems kyis rab tu byung ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang  de dge ba'i rtsa ba des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don legs par bsams pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / /
