column11: 0.028#TD4019E.TXT.r#2486010#2486010#TD4019E.TXT.r_10302;TD4019E.TXT.r_10303# gzugs ni gzhig cing gzhom du rung ba'i mtshan nyid de / / +de ni mtshan nyid med par de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa dang 'gal lo zhe na / /
column12: 0.028#TD4012E.TXT.r#1590001#1590001#TD4012E.TXT.r_288;TD4012E.TXT.r_289# de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod cing dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i bsam pa ni / / +'das pa'i  sangs rgyas rnams dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // /
column13: 0.028#TD4054E.TXT.r#1003448#1003448#TD4054E.TXT.r_2053;TD4054E.TXT.r_2054# rang gi dang gis te dge  ba'i bshes gnyen la sogs pa'i stobs kyis ni ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to // / +'dod pas kun du gnas pa'o zhes bya ba ni / /
column14: 0.028#TD4051E.TXT.r#1242904#1242904#TD4051E.TXT.r_1455;TD4051E.TXT.r_1456# yang DAG PA MA YIN PA'I KUN tu rtog pas bsdus pa zhes bya ba ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos por rnam par 'jog pa'o // / +yod PA MA YIN PA DANG nor ba'i don snang ba'i gnas zhes bya ba ni / /
column15: 0.028#TD4050E.TXT.r#1106236#1106236#TD4050E.TXT.r_1269;TD4050E.TXT.r_1270;TD4050E.TXT.r_1271# rnam par shes pa mi mthun pa rnams kyi rgyu mtshan ni don yin no // / +shes par  byed pas na shes pa'o // / +dmigs pa med pa'i rnam par rig pa dmigs pas zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa med par yang rnam par shes pa 'byung ba ni lta ba ste / /
column16: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1228409#1228409#TD4047E.TXT.r_15226;TD4047E.TXT.r_15227# rang gis zhes  bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis zhes bya ba'i don to // / +mngon par shes pa drug pas zhes bya ba ni zag pa zad pa'i mngon par shes pas zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa yin no // /

column3: sems 'ba' zhig ni ma yin no // / +de dag kyang khams gsum pa'i ngo bo nyid de / / +'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa tha dad pas khams gsum pa rnams so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924745#924755#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4358;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4359;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4360# 'tshe ba med pa'i rdzogs pa ni lhag par mi 'tshe ba'o zhes bya ba la / / +lhag par mi 'tshe ba'i don 'chad de / /

column3: de la yang dag pa ma yin pa kun tu rtog pa de las sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa nyi shu gang dag 'byung ba de ni 'dod pa'i khams so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924756#924769#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4360;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4361;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4362;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4363# mi dge ba bcu rmi lam na yang mi byed par rdzogs na lhag par mi 'tshe ba zhes bya ba'i don to // / +ji ltar  na yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshul khrims su 'gyur zhe na / /

column3: tshangs rigs la sogs pa'i rnam pa bcu bdun gang yin pa de dag ni gzugs kyi khams so // / +nam mkha' mtha' yas la sogs  pa'i rnam pa bzhi po gang yin pa de dag ni gzugs med pa'i khams so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924770#924784#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4363;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4364;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4365# dge ba bcu'i las rmi lam na yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba smos te / / +dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs nas mi dge ba bcu rmi lam na yang byed par mi rmi na yongs su rdzogs pa'i  tshul khrims yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: gzhan na re 'dod pa la 'dod chags ma spangs pa dang gzugs kyi 'du shes dang ma bral ba rnams ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'o // / +'dod pa la 'dod chags spangs la gzugs kyi 'du shes dang ma bral ba rnams ni     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924785#924794#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4364;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4365;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4366# dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs nas mi dge ba bcu rmi lam na yang byed par mi rmi na yongs su rdzogs pa'i  tshul khrims yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // / +rmi lam na yang mi dge ba bcu mi byed pa ni sa bcu las sa gnyis kyi tshe na mi 'byung ste / /

column3: gzugs kyi khams so // / +'dod pa dang gzugs la 'dod chags spangs shing gzugs kyi 'du shes dang yang bral ba rnams ni gzugs med pa na spyod pa'o zhes zer ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924795#924805#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4365;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4366# rmi lam na yang mi dge ba bcu mi byed pa ni sa bcu las sa gnyis kyi tshe na mi 'byung ste / / +de bas na sa bcu pa'i sa gnyis las kyang kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' sa gnyis pa 'di la gnas pa rnams ni dbyig pa  spangs mtshon cha spangs zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so // /

column3: gzhan dag ni 'dod pa la 'dod chags rgyas par gyur pa rnams ni 'dod pa'i khams so //// / +gzugs la 'dod chags rgyas par gyur pa rnams ni gzugs kyi khams so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924804#924817#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4366;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4367;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4368# de bas na sa bcu pa'i sa gnyis las kyang kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' sa gnyis pa 'di la gnas pa rnams ni dbyig pa  spangs mtshon cha spangs zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so // /
column5: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#693870#693872#TD4083E.TXT.r_1139;TD4083E.TXT.r_1140# de'i 'og tu yongs su rdzogs kyi bar du sems can gyi don  bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi dbang du byas par rig par bya'o // / +dgos pa'i grogs su 'gro ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / /
column6: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271124#271125#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7180;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7181# bdag nyid la brten pa'i sems med  pa'i phyir dang  gzhan la brten pa'i sems yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni bzhi pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par bshad pa'o // / +de la bdag nyid la brten pa'i sems zhes bya ba ni lta ba'i rnam pa'i sems te / /

column3: gzugs med pa la 'dod chags rgyas par gyur pa rnams ni / / +gzugs med pa'i khams so zhes smra'o // / +kha cig ni rtag tu gyeng ba dang sems las byung ba'i sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa'i gnas su gyur pa  rnams ni 'dod pa'i khams so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924815#924828#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4367;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4368# bdag nyid de la dga' bas lhag par rtogs pa'i tshul khrims zhes bya ba la / /

column3: mnyam par gzhag pa la sems las byung ba'i sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa dang bral ba rnams ni gzugs kyi khams so // / +mnyam par gzhag la bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa spangs pa rnams ni / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924488#924492#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4326# ngag gi sgo nas smra bar bya ba ma yin pa mi smra ba dang  lus kyi sgo nas 'gro bar bya ba ma yin pa'i gnas dag tu mi 'gro ba dang  yid kyi sgo nas bsam par bya ba  ma yin pa'i chos dag mi sems pa ni bag yod pa zhes bya ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924829#924839#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4368;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4369;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4370# sa dang po'i chos kyi dbyings kun du 'gro ba'i mtshan nyid rtogs pa na bden pa mthong bas mi dge ba mi byed pa dang dge ba byed pa la rang gi  dang gis dga' zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column6: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924460#924463#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4324# ngag gi sgo nas smra bar bya ba ma yin pa dag smra ba dang  lus kyi sgo nas 'gro bar bya ba ma yin pa dag gi gnas su 'gro ba dang  yid kyi sgo nas bsam par bya ba ma yin pa'i chos  dag sems pa ni bag med ba zhes bya ste / /

column3: gzugs med pa'i khams so zhes smra'o // / +kha cig ni dri dang ro dang de dag tu snang ba'i rnam par shes pa ma spangs pa rnams ni 'dod pa'i khams so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924840#924849#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4370# ngag gi sgo nas smra bar bya ba ma yin pa mi smra ba dang  lus kyi sgo nas 'gro bar bya ba ma yin pa dag tu mi 'gro ba dang  sems kyi sgo nas bsam par bya ba ma yin pa dag mi bsam pa ni bag yod pa zhes  bya'o ; / /

column3: dri dang ro dang de dag tu snang ba'i rnam par shes pa spangs pa rnams ni gzugs kyi khams so // / +khams bco lngar snang ba spangs pa rnams ni gzugs med pa'i khams so zhes smra'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924848#924862#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4370;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4371# ngag gi sgo nas smra bar bya ba ma yin pa mi smra ba dang  lus kyi sgo nas 'gro bar bya ba ma yin pa dag tu mi 'gro ba dang  sems kyi sgo nas bsam par bya ba ma yin pa dag mi bsam pa ni bag yod pa zhes  bya'o ; / /

column3: bshad pa de dag thams cad la de dag gang yin zhe na / / +thog mar bshad pa las brjod pa nyid bshad par bya ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924861#924872#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4371;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4372# bag yod pa rnams las rtag tu ltung ba dang nyes byas mi 'byung bas de nyid la 'khrul pa med pa'i tshul khrims zhes bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925082#925087#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4402;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4403;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4400;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4401;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4404# brtson 'grus ji lta bus ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams te / /
column6: 0.019#TD4026E.TXT.r#282866#282868#TD4026E.TXT.r_1356# sbyin pa ji lta bus sems can rnams ji ltar  yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa / /
column7: 0.019#TD4026E.TXT.r#283102#283102#TD4026E.TXT.r_1389# brtson 'grus ji lta bus sems can ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa / /
column8: 0.019#TD4026E.TXT.r#283166#283166#TD4026E.TXT.r_1399# bsam gtan ji lta bus sems can rnams ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa / /
column9: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924235#924235#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4297# de lta bu'i tshul khrims kyis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya    ba la / /

column3: de ltar na bshad pa 'di dag ni ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid do // / +yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pa'i skabs yin bzhin du yang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924873#924893#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4372;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4373;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4374# bzod pa ji lta bus sems can yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la / / +da ni bzod pa'i pha rol  tu phyin pas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa bstan te / /

column3: yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pa  smos pa ni mi dmigs pas bar du bcad pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912823#912825#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2820# ji ltar bdag la de ltar sgrub pa de bzhin du sems can gzhan la yang de dang 'dra bar sgrub par  byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912953#912957#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2836# gong du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do zhes bshad pa ji ltar na bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#919665#919667#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3716# da ni mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa rnams sangs rgyas  kyi zhing rnam pa gnyis dag par byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column7: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925100#925111#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4405;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4406# de yang brtson 'grus ji lta bus  sems can 'di 'dra bar yongs su smin par byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column8: 0.010#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925285#925285#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4426# bsam gtan ci 'dra bas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column9: 0.010#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925468#925473#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4454# de yang shes rab ji lta bus sems can ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column10: 0.016#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2894819#2894819#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3788# byang chub sems dpa' rnams su thugs rje dang ldan pa'i thugs kyis sbyin pa btang ba'i 'bras bu de dag pas longs spyod khyad par can 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column11: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924254#924254#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4299# de yang tshul khrims ci 'dra bas sems can ji ltar smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column12: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920927#920927#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3887# dga' ba smin par gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column13: 0.020#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2895056#2895056#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3817;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3818;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3819# sbyin pa la sogs pa byed du bcug pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa la snying brtse ba zhes bya ste // / +de bstan par bya ba'i phyir // / +tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column14: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921525#921525#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3965# sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong na sems can sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir 'jug pa ni snying rje ste sems kyi brtse ba ji tsam zhig skyes na snying rje yongs su smin pa yin pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column15: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922397#922397#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4079# mu stegs pa la sogs pas kyang lta ba bsgyur bar mi nus pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column16: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#905351#905352#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1932;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1933# byang chub sems dpa'i rigs 'di yang yon tan rnam pa bzhi'i gzhi dang rten byed pas gser chen po'i rigs dang 'dra bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column17: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914117#914117#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2997# sems dpa'i sgrub pa 'phags so zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column18: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914542#914542#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3047# spyod yul ni lus kyi sgo nas spyod lam bzhi  la spyod ba dang  mig gi dbang po nas yid kyi dbang po'i bar du dbang po drug gis so so'i yul mthong ba dang thos pa la sogs ba byas pa rnams sems can gyi don du bsngo bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column19: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917896#917897#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3478;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3479# ye shes de'i che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa dang  che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'i sgo nas mthar thug pa'i lam yang bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column20: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#943294#943294#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6852# mis thob par mi 'gyur ro snyam nas zhum pa dang mis thob nas yang bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis thob pas sgrub dka'o snyam nas  zhum pa dang  de ltar dus ring du bsgoms kyang la las thob kyi kun gyis mi thob bo snyam nas zhum pa de dag la rgyu rnam pa gsum gyis na zhum par mi rigs par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column21: 0.022#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2892212#2892213#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3460# des 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad zil gyis gnon cing 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad las 'phags par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column22: 0.022#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2893156#2893156#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3587# sems can gzhan bde  na byang chub sems dpa' ci'ang mi bdog kyang bde bar 'gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column23: 0.028#TD4026E.TXT.r#283022#283023#TD4026E.TXT.r_1378;TD4026E.TXT.r_1379# de'i rnam par smin pa dang rgyu mthun ba dag phan tshun mthun pas rgyun MI 'CHAD PA'I PHYIR RO // / +bzod pa ji lta bus sems can rnams ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams nas tshigs su bcad pa / /

column3: rnam grangs kyi mtshan nyid kyang ston te zhes bya ba ni / / +sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kyi bye brag rab tu bstan pas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924893#924900#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4374;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4375;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4376# de yang bzod pa 'di 'dra bas sems can 'di ltar smin par byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921723#921726#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3996;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3997# sdug bsngal ci tsam zhig nyams su len par nus na bzod pa yongs su smin par gyur pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rtsom  mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column6: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959052#959053#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8905# mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta bur yin pa brtag par bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column7: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912956#912957#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2836# gong du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do zhes bshad pa ji ltar na bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column8: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924254#924254#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4299# de yang tshul khrims ci 'dra bas sems can ji ltar smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column9: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#981741#981741#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11700# byang chub sems  dpa' sems can gyi don byed pa na zhe sdang gi sgo nas byas pa rnams ni nyes pa dang ltung bar 'gyur gyi 'dod chags kyi sgo nas byas pa rnams ni nyes pa dang ltung bar mi 'gyur bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column10: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906651#906652#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2073# nyan thos kyi rigs dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyis rang rang gi 'bras bu thob pa bas byang chub sems dpa'i rigs kyis byang  chub chen po'i 'bras bu thob pa khyad zhugs par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column11: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925685#925685#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4482# sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i skabs su pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis sems can yongs su smin par byed do zhes rgya cher bstan nas da don de nyid mjug bsdu zhing ji  ltar sems can yongs su smin par byas pa'i don mdor bsdus te bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column12: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900383#900383#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1395# khas blangs pa'i don rgya cher bshad pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pa'i rnam grangs kyi mtshan nyid kyang ston to // / +ji lta zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924901#924909#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4375;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4376;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4377;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4378# bzod pa ci 'dra bas sems can yongs su smin par byed ce na / / +de'i phyir / / +pha rol gnod par byed pa phan byed blo // /

column3: sems dang sems  las byung ba rnams yang dag pa ma yi pa kun rtog pa'i dngos po'i rang bzhin dang  khyad par la rtog par zhugs pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924910#924923#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4377;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4378;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4379;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4380# pha rol gnod par byed pa phan byed blo // / +nyes pa byas pa drag po rab tu bzod // /

column3: don gyi rang gi ngo bo dang bye brag mthong ba sems dang sems las byung ba rnams dang  yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pa zhes bya ba ni rnam grangs su gtogs pa    ste ; /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924922#924937#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4380;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4381# sems can gzhan gyi srog dang srid dang longs spyod la sogs pa med par byed pa ni pha rol gnod pa byed pa zhes bya ste / /
column5: 0.026#TD4051E.TXT.r#1260527#1260527#TD4051E.TXT.r_4114# byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas nas de las gzhan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams bsgoms pas yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes 'byong ngo // /

column3: don la ni khyad par med do // / +de la don tsam mthong ba ni rnam par shes pa'o zhes bya ba la tsam zhes bya ba'i sgra ni / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924938#924949#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4381;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4382;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4383# gnod par byed pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa'  gnod pa la klan kar snyad mi dgos te gnod par byas pa 'di dag la bzod par byas na bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.025#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1716380#1716380#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_2528# dge slong dag dbang po'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas 'bras bu'i pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu shes par 'gyur ro // /

column3: khyad par sel ba'i phyir te khyad par mi 'dzin gyi dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo tsam dmigs so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924950#924962#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4383;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4384;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4385;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4386# bla na med pa'i byang chub thob pas 'di ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen  yin no snyam du sems shing smra ba ni / /

column3: don gyi khyad par mthong ba ni sems las byung ba rnams te  tshor ba la sogs pa'o zhes bya ba ni khyad par gyi ngo bo de dang des der mngon par 'jug pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924963#924978#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4385;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4386;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4387;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4388# zhes bya ba'o // / +srog dang srid la 'bab pa'i nyes pa byas na yang zhe sdang mi ldang zhing nyams su mi len na / /

column3: de la gang dngos po de'i khyad par sim pa dang  gdung ba nyid yid bde ba la sogs pa'i gnas pa gang yin pa de 'dzin pa ni tshor ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924979#924991#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4387;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4388;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4389;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4390;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4391;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4392# slar gnod pa'i len mi ldon pa ni nyes par byed pa drag po bzod pa zhes bya'o // / +ji ltar yongs  su smin par byed ce na / /

column3: bud med dang skyes pa la sogs par tha snyad gdags pa'i  mtshan ma don gyi khyad par gang yin pa de 'dzin pa ni 'du shes so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924992#925002#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4391;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4392;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4393;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4394# gnod par byed pa dag ni dge la bkod // / +ces bya ba smos te / / +gnod par byed pa rnams la / /

column3: de bzhin du gzhan yang ci rigs su sbyar bar bya'o // / +de ltar de dag kyang gnas pa dang dmigs pa dang  dus dang rdzas mtshungs pa nyid kyis mtshungs par ldan pa yin gyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925003#925016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4394;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4395;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4396;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4397# 'di ni phan 'dogs pa yin no snyam du sems shing tshig tu de skad smras pa nyid thabs shes pa  zhes bya'o // / +phan 'dogs pa yang rnam pa gnyis te / /

column3: rnam par shes pa dang khyad par med par thal  bar 'gyur bas rnam par mtshungs pas ni ma yin no // / +kha cig ni 'dir sems kyi bye brag nyid sems las byung bar dgongs par shes te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925017#925030#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4397;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4398;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4399# tshe 'dir phan 'dogs pa ni nyes pa drag po byas pa rnams la yang gnod pa drag po dag bzod do // / +slar gnod pa'i lan ma glan pas na tshe  'dir phan 'dogs so // /

column3: rma bya'i mdongs ltar rnam par shes pa de nyid / / +de lta bu'i ngo bo la sogs par snang ba sna tshogs su 'byung ngo zhe'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925029#925042#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4398;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4399;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4400# slar gnod pa'i lan ma glan pas na tshe  'dir phan 'dogs so // / +tshe rabs gzhan du phan 'dogs pa'i thabs shes pa'i sems kyis gnod par byed pa rnams la phan 'dogs so snyam du sems shing khyod kyis phan 'dogs so zhes smras pas gzhan dag 'di snyam du sems te / /

column3: ji ltar na gcig pu yang yin la sna tshogs  kyang yin / / +gcig pu du ma'i ngo bo nyid du 'gyur du 'ong zhes / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925041#925050#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4399;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4400# tshe rabs gzhan du phan 'dogs pa'i thabs shes pa'i sems kyis gnod par byed pa rnams la phan 'dogs so snyam du sems shing khyod kyis phan 'dogs so zhes smras pas gzhan dag 'di snyam du sems te / /

column3: 'jig rten ni gcig la mi mthun pa'i mtshan nyid sna tshogs su mi 'dod do zhe na / / +gal te chos kyi ngo bo nyid yongs su grub par gyur na ni / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925049#925060#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4400# bdag gis gnod par byas na yang  slar phan 'dogs so zhes smras pa dang sbyar na sems can 'di ni sems can chen po zhig ste snyam nas de la dad pa skye zhing de'i dbang du gyur pa dang  tshe 'dir dge ba byed pa la bkod de tshe rabs gzhan du mtho ris dang mya ngan las 'das pa thob par byas pa ni tshe gzhan du phan     // /

column3: 'di yang nyes par 'gyur ro // / +nor pa tsam la ni nyes pa 'di med de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925061#925069#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4400# bdag gis gnod par byas na yang  slar phan 'dogs so zhes smras pa dang sbyar na sems can 'di ni sems can chen po zhig ste snyam nas de la dad pa skye zhing de'i dbang du gyur pa dang  tshe 'dir dge ba byed pa la bkod de tshe rabs gzhan du mtho ris dang mya ngan las 'das pa thob par byas pa ni tshe gzhan du phan     // /
column5: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#923768#923768#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4240# ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' snying rje dang ldan pa rnams sems can la tshe 'dir zang zing sna tshogs kyis phan btags nas dge ba la 'god pas bde ba la bkod  pa dang tshe rabs gzhan du mtho ris dang mya ngan las 'das pa thob par byas pas phan pa la bkod de sems can la byams par dgongs pa'i dgongs pa mnga' ba ltar / /

column3: de bzhin ma yin  ye med min // / +zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro // / +de ni de lta ma yin te / / +mdo las tshor ba gang yin pa dang  'du shes gang yin pa dang  sems gang yin pa dang  rnam par shes pa gang yin pa ste chos 'di rnams ni 'dres pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925098#925108#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4405;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4404;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4406# de yang brtson 'grus ji lta bus  sems can 'di 'dra bar yongs su smin par byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.009#TD4037E.TXT.r#1348753#1348754#TD4037E.TXT.r_4466;TD4037E.TXT.r_4467# de la  byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus shes pa rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ni thos pa dang  bsam pa dang  bsgom pa las byung ba'i shes rab yang dag par 'grub pa dang  rnam par 'phel BAR BYED PA GANG YIN pa'o // / +de la byang chub sems dpa'i skyes bu dam pa'i brtson 'grus gang zhe na /// /
column6: 0.015#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924870#924872#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4372# bzod pa ji lta bus sems can yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la / /
column7: 0.020#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2907863#2907865#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_5601# yang na dad pa'i dbang pos yid ches par bya ba'i chos de la brtson 'grus kyi dbang pos sgrub par byed de // /
column8: 0.021#TD4039E.TXT.r#1836088#1836088#TD4039E.TXT.r_2610;TD4039E.TXT.r_2611# gnas pa'i rgyun du byed cing byang BAR BYED PA GANG YIN pa'o // / +brtson 'grus brtsams pa de yang rnam pa lngar rig par bya ste / /
column9: 0.022#TD4047E.TXT.r#1223230#1223231#TD4047E.TXT.r_14468;TD4047E.TXT.r_14469# mi 'byung    ba dang rgyun mi 'chad pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o / / +de ltar brtson 'grus brtsams pa ni bag yod pas mthar thug par 'gro ba'i phyir / /
column10: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925451#925453#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4452# shes rab ji lta bus ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya  ba la ; /
column11: 0.022#TD4035E.TXT.r#198080#198080#TD4035E.TXT.r_12782# brtson 'grus brtsams pa de la gnas pas 'dod pa la  'dun pa'i kun nas dkris pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas par mi byed la / /
column12: 0.022#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2785500#2785503#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_11747;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_11748# mi nyal ba ni rtag tu byed pa dang  gus par byed pa'i sbyor ba dag gis brtson 'grus brtsams pa nyid kyis phun sum tshogs par rig par bya'o // /
column13: 0.022#TD4026E.TXT.r#283099#283102#TD4026E.TXT.r_1388;TD4026E.TXT.r_1389# gnod pa byed pa la mi mjed pa'i phyir tshe 'di la phan 'dogs pa dang  thabs shes pa gnod pa byed pa la mi mjed pa de  dag gis gnod pa byed pa rnams dang par byas nas dge ba yang dag par len du 'jug pa'i phyir tshe phyi ma la phan 'dogs pas so // / +brtson 'grus ji lta bus sems can ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa / /
column14: 0.023#TD4037E.TXT.r#1317382#1317385#TD4037E.TXT.r_171;TD4037E.TXT.r_172# de ltar 'di lta bu dang mthun pa  rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rigs kyi rtags yin par rig par bya'o // / +de la byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rigs kyi rtags ni 'di dag yin te / /
column15: 0.023#TD4037E.TXT.r#1317478#1317479#TD4037E.TXT.r_187# de ltar 'di lta bu dang mthun pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rigs kyi rtags yin par rig par bya'o // /
column16: 0.023#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925267#925267#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4424# bsam gtan ji lta bus ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa  las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la / /
column17: 0.024#TD4044E.TXT.r#382570#382571#TD4044E.TXT.r_213;TD4044E.TXT.r_214# so sor brtags nas brtson pa de'i bya ba de mngon par rdzogs par  byed ces bya ba'o // / +sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus kyis so sor brtags nas sbyor ba nyid ni sbyor ba zhes bya ste / /
column18: 0.025#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2907910#2907910#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_5607# yang na brtson 'grus kyi dbang pos bsgrubs pa'i chos la dran pa'i dbang pos mi brjed par byed pa ni dran pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o // /
column19: 0.025#TD4041E.TXT.r#1269351#1269351#TD4041E.TXT.r_60# mngon par spro ba ni snga phyi'i khyad par shes nas gong ma'i khyad par thob par bya ba la yid ches pa skyes pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa'o // /
column20: 0.026#TD4026E.TXT.r#283166#283166#TD4026E.TXT.r_1399# bsam gtan ji lta bus sems can rnams ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa / /
column21: 0.026#TD4047E.TXT.r#1145762#1145763#TD4047E.TXT.r_3578# phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis bzlogs kyang mi zlogs pas brtson 'grus brtsams pa  mi 'dor bar 'gyur ro // /
column22: 0.026#TD4026E.TXT.r#283221#283222#TD4026E.TXT.r_1406# shes rab ji lta bus ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa / /
column23: 0.026#TD4047E.TXT.r#1205739#1205740#TD4047E.TXT.r_12011;TD4047E.TXT.r_12012# bzod pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas gnyi ga'i don byed par 'gyur ro // / +brtson 'grus brtan po'i go bgos pas yang dag par rtsom pa brtan par 'gyur te / /
column24: 0.026#TD4018E.TXT.r#3034503#3034506#TD4018E.TXT.r_3989# de la rim zhes bya ba ni 'jungs pa'i gnyen por sbyin pa dang  ngang tshul ngan pa'i gnyen por tshul khrims dang  ngan  du smra ba la sogs pa khro ba'i gnyen por ji mi snyam zhing bzod pa dang  le lo'i gnyen por brtson 'grus dang  mnyam par mi 'jog pa'i gnyen por bsam gtan dang  ma rig pa'i gnyen por shes rab dang  thabs med pa'i gnyen por shes rab kyis thabs la mkhas pa dang  smon  pa med pa'i gnyen por bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam dang  rnal 'byor gyi lam gyi stobs chung ba'i gnyen por stobs dang  nyon mongs pa dang  nyon mongs pa med pa'i mi shes pa thams cad kyi gnyen por ye shes te / /
column25: 0.027#TD4032E.TXT.r#1954061#1954061#TD4032E.TXT.r_5295;TD4032E.TXT.r_5296# des gzhan dag gis gsod pa dang 'ching ba dang rdeg pa la sogs pa byas pa la slar gnod pa mi byed pas ji mi snyam par byed pa'o // / +brtson 'grus kyis ni yon tan rnams  'phel bar byed do zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa la sogs pa'i phyir spro ba ni brtson 'grus te / /
column26: 0.027#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2946613#2946613#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_10898;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_10899# shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyang 'khor ba na gnas kyang 'khor ba'i nyes pas gos par mi 'gyur ro // / +brtson 'grus ni chen por 'gyur ba'i rgyu yin pas / /
column27: 0.028#TD4054E.TXT.r#1026873#1026875#TD4054E.TXT.r_5931;TD4054E.TXT.r_5932# le lo'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i gnyen por brtson 'grus bsgom pa'o // /
column28: 0.029#TD4037E.TXT.r#1348971#1348971#TD4037E.TXT.r_4480# sems  kun nas dkris pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa de spang ba'i phyir mgo la me 'bar ba gsod pa lta bu'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus khyad par can dang  rig pa'i gnas thams cad yongs su tshol ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus tshol ba dang   yongs su btsal ba'i chos de dag nyid la ji ltar mthun pa dang  ji ltar 'os par chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos nan tan gyis bsgrub pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i brtson 'grus dang  byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol gyi don byed pa'i brtson 'grus ni snga ma bzhin du rnam  pa bcu gcig tu blta bar bya'o // /
column29: 0.029#TD4010E.TXT.r#2230994#2230994#TD4010E.TXT.r_148;TD4010E.TXT.r_149# brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab kyi mthar thug pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa bstan pa'i phyir / / +bskal pa grangs med par yid mi skyo ba'i brtson 'grus che ba zhes bya ba gsungs te / /
column30: 0.029#TD4039E.TXT.r#1860576#1860576#TD4039E.TXT.r_5291;TD4039E.TXT.r_5292# la sbyar bar bya ba dang  lhag pa'i sems la bag yod par bya ba dang  lhag pa'i shes rab la ston pa'i bstan pa la brtson par bya ba'i phyir snying tshim par brtson 'grus brtsams te gnas par bya'o // / +gal te le los gnas par byed na ni de la nyes  dmigs gnyis su 'gyur bar shes par bya ste / /

column3: ma yin no zhes 'byung ba dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro // / +'dres pa  zhes bya ba ni yod pa rnams cig car phrad par 'gyur ba la bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925088#925098#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4403;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4404;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4405# tshigs su bcad PA ZHES BYA BA LA / / +da ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can smin par byed pa ston te / /

column3: gang chos kyi ngo bo nyid yongs su ma grub par 'dod pa de la / / +mdo de ni don 'dir khungs su mi rung ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912823#912825#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2820# ji ltar bdag la de ltar sgrub pa de bzhin du sems can gzhan la yang de dang 'dra bar sgrub par  byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912953#912957#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2836# gong du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do zhes bshad pa ji ltar na bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#919665#919667#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3716# da ni mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa rnams sangs rgyas  kyi zhing rnam pa gnyis dag par byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column7: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925244#925245#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4421;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4422;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4419;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4420# byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyis sems can rnams la tshe 'dir phan btags pa dang tshe rabs gzhan du phan btags pas sems can yongs su smin par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // / +de la brtson    'grus kyis tshe 'dir dge ba'i sems gcig la bkod pa ni tshe 'dir phan btags pa'o // /
column8: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925283#925289#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4426;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4425;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4427# bsam gtan ci 'dra bas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column9: 0.010#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925468#925471#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4454# de yang shes rab ji lta bus sems can ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column10: 0.016#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2894819#2894819#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3788# byang chub sems dpa' rnams su thugs rje dang ldan pa'i thugs kyis sbyin pa btang ba'i 'bras bu de dag pas longs spyod khyad par can 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column11: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924254#924258#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4299;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4300# de yang tshul khrims ci 'dra bas sems can ji ltar smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column12: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920927#920927#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3887# dga' ba smin par gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column13: 0.020#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2895056#2895056#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3817;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3818;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3819# sbyin pa la sogs pa byed du bcug pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa la snying brtse ba zhes bya ste // / +de bstan par bya ba'i phyir // / +tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column14: 0.021#TD4044E.TXT.r#382570#382571#TD4044E.TXT.r_213;TD4044E.TXT.r_214# so sor brtags nas brtson pa de'i bya ba de mngon par rdzogs par  byed ces bya ba'o // / +sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus kyis so sor brtags nas sbyor ba nyid ni sbyor ba zhes bya ste / /
column15: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921525#921525#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3965# sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong na sems can sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir 'jug pa ni snying rje ste sems kyi brtse ba ji tsam zhig skyes na snying rje yongs su smin pa yin pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column16: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922397#922397#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4079# mu stegs pa la sogs pas kyang lta ba bsgyur bar mi nus pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column17: 0.021#TD4032E.TXT.r#1954061#1954061#TD4032E.TXT.r_5295;TD4032E.TXT.r_5296# des gzhan dag gis gsod pa dang 'ching ba dang rdeg pa la sogs pa byas pa la slar gnod pa mi byed pas ji mi snyam par byed pa'o // / +brtson 'grus kyis ni yon tan rnams  'phel bar byed do zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa la sogs pa'i phyir spro ba ni brtson 'grus te / /
column18: 0.022#TD4026E.TXT.r#283099#283100#TD4026E.TXT.r_1388;TD4026E.TXT.r_1389# gnod pa byed pa la mi mjed pa'i phyir tshe 'di la phan 'dogs pa dang  thabs shes pa gnod pa byed pa la mi mjed pa de  dag gis gnod pa byed pa rnams dang par byas nas dge ba yang dag par len du 'jug pa'i phyir tshe phyi ma la phan 'dogs pas so // / +brtson 'grus ji lta bus sems can ji ltar yongs su smin PAR BYED PA DE LAS brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa / /
column19: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896432#896432#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_926# de'i phyir mtshan  nyid dang mi 'gal bar tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la de ltar rgol ba rnams la theg pa chen po 'di sangs rgyas kyi bka'i mtshan nyid dang mi 'gal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column20: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#905351#905352#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1932;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1933# byang chub sems dpa'i rigs 'di yang yon tan rnam pa bzhi'i gzhi dang rten byed pas gser chen po'i rigs dang 'dra bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column21: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914117#914117#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2997# sems dpa'i sgrub pa 'phags so zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column22: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914542#914542#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3047# spyod yul ni lus kyi sgo nas spyod lam bzhi  la spyod ba dang  mig gi dbang po nas yid kyi dbang po'i bar du dbang po drug gis so so'i yul mthong ba dang thos pa la sogs ba byas pa rnams sems can gyi don du bsngo bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column23: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917896#917896#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3478# ye shes de'i che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa dang  che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'i sgo nas mthar thug pa'i lam yang bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column24: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#943294#943294#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6852# mis thob par mi 'gyur ro snyam nas zhum pa dang mis thob nas yang bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis thob pas sgrub dka'o snyam nas  zhum pa dang  de ltar dus ring du bsgoms kyang la las thob kyi kun gyis mi thob bo snyam nas zhum pa de dag la rgyu rnam pa gsum gyis na zhum par mi rigs par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column25: 0.022#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2892211#2892213#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3460# des 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad zil gyis gnon cing 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad las 'phags par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column26: 0.022#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2893156#2893156#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3587# sems can gzhan bde  na byang chub sems dpa' ci'ang mi bdog kyang bde bar 'gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column27: 0.023#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925079#925082#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4401;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4402# 'degs pa'o // / +brtson 'grus ji lta bus ji ltar yongs su smin PAR BYED PA DE LAS brtsams te / /
column28: 0.023#TD4037E.TXT.r#1348753#1348753#TD4037E.TXT.r_4466;TD4037E.TXT.r_4467# de la  byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus shes pa rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ni thos pa dang  bsam pa dang  bsgom pa las byung ba'i shes rab yang dag par 'grub pa dang  rnam par 'phel bar byed pa gang yin pa'o // / +de la byang chub sems dpa'i skyes bu dam pa'i brtson 'grus gang zhe na /// /
column29: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911264#911265#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2623;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2624# sems  can gyi don gyi phyir dka' ba rnam pa sna tshogs spyod pas / / +skyo ba'i 'jigs pa med par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo // /
column30: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#981740#981740#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11700# byang chub sems  dpa' sems can gyi don byed pa na zhe sdang gi sgo nas byas pa rnams ni nyes pa dang ltung bar 'gyur gyi 'dod chags kyi sgo nas byas pa rnams ni nyes pa dang ltung bar mi 'gyur bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column31: 0.024#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2889762#2889762#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3096# nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa yang ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column32: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#904921#904921#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1899# byang chub sems dpa'i rigs yod kyang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa bzhi'i skyon dang ldan na skyon des bsgribs pas sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i  spyod pa la 'jug par mi nus par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo // /
column33: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#934809#934809#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5782;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5783# chos kyi dbyings la skye 'gag med pa'i phyir ro // / +tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'i bsdus pa'i don ni sems can yongs su smin par byed pa la / /
column34: 0.027#TD4019E.TXT.r#2414790#2414790#TD4019E.TXT.r_974;TD4019E.TXT.r_975# don dam par sems can yang mi dmigs la /// / +rtag tu sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i brtson pa yang byed do // /
column35: 0.029#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2907934#2907934#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_5610# chos gang brtson  'grus kyi dbang pos yang dag par bsgrub pa'i chos de dag gi dran pa'i dbang pos chud mi gson te / /

column3: yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pa tsam du zad la gzhan yang med pas rgyu dang 'bras bu rab tu dbye ba rnam par mi shes pas     // /

column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925141#925142#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4411;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4412;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4410# brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan par 'gyur te byang chub sems dpa' de yang zhes bya ba'i don to // / +go cha'i brtson 'grus dang  sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang  ma zhum  pa'i brtson 'grus dang  ma 'khrugs pa'i brtson 'grus dang  chog mi shes pa'i brtson 'grus la gnas shing brtson 'grus de dag kyang 'khor ba'i mtha'i bar du gtong bar mi byed pa ni nan tan mchog la gnas pa zhes bya'o // /
column6: 0.013#TD4037E.TXT.r#1348825#1348834#TD4037E.TXT.r_4473;TD4037E.TXT.r_4474# rgyun du sbyor ba'i phyir rtag pa'i brtson 'grus  dang ; / +lhur sbyor ba'i phyir gus pa'i brtson 'grus dang  sngon gyi rgyu'i stobs kyis bskyed pa'i phyir rgyu mthun pa'i brtson 'grus dang  so sor brtags shing brtags shing dge ba'i phyogs la sbyor ba'i phyir sbyor ba las byung ba'i brtson 'grus dang  sdug bsngal gyi gnod pa thams  cad kyis mi 'khrugs shing gzhan du bsgyur du med pa'i phyir mi 'khrugs pa'i brtson 'grus dang  khyad par thob pa chung ngu dang  ngan don tsam gyis chog mi shes pa'i phyir chog mi shes pa'i brtson 'grus so // /
column7: 0.016#TD4044E.TXT.r#382474#382474#TD4044E.TXT.r_200;TD4044E.TXT.r_201# zhes bya ba'i don to // / +brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rigs kyi rtags rnams kyi bsdus pa'i don ni rnam pa drug ste / /

column11: 0.027#TD4037E.TXT.r#1348492#1348492#TD4037E.TXT.r_4438# nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang  phas kyi rgol ba dang  sdug bsngal gyi gnod pa thams cad kyis mi gyos pa'i phyir mi gyo ba dang  gus par sbyor ba can yin pa'i phyir brtan pa dang  rig pa'i gnas thams cad yang dag par 'grub par nye bar gnas pa'i  phyir dpag tu med pa dang  thob par bya ba'i don gyi lam phyin ci ma log pa dang ldan pa'i phyir dang  mnyam pa nyid khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir thabs dang ldan pa dang  thob par bya ba'i don dang ldan pa thob par smon pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus dang  rtag tu sbyor ba can yin pa'i phyir  rgyas pa dang  brtson 'grus rtsom pa des mtho bar sems pa med pa'i phyir nga rgyal med pa ste / /
column12: 0.027#TD4051E.TXT.r#1253881#1253881#TD4051E.TXT.r_3089# brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas bya ba byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni de dag la phan 'dogs pa'i phyir dang  gnod pa mi byed pa'i phyir ro // /
column13: 0.027#TD4047E.TXT.r#1182960#1182960#TD4047E.TXT.r_8885;TD4047E.TXT.r_8886# mnyam pa nyid rab tu rtogs pas nyon mongs pa nyid dang bral ba'i phyir  yang thabs dang ldan pa'o // / +don chen po la sbyor ba'i phyir yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus zhes bya'o // /

column12: 0.013#TD4037E.TXT.r#1348720#1348720#TD4037E.TXT.r_4464;TD4037E.TXT.r_4465# de la byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus dkar po'i chos sgrub par byed pa ni dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa dang  skyes pa rnams gnas par byed pa dang  mi nyams par byed pa dang  'phel zhing rgyas  par byed pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa'o // / +de la byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus las yongs su dag par byed pa ni las rnam pa gsum po lus kyi las dang  ngag gi las dang  yid kyi las dge ba rnam par dag par byed pa dang  sdud par byed pa gang yin pa'o // /
column13: 0.013#TD4037E.TXT.r#1348903#1348903#TD4037E.TXT.r_4477# rnam pa bdun ni phyi phyir zhing bla na med pa yang dag par  rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu shas cher 'dun pa dang  smon pa rjes su 'phel bar byed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus 'dun pa dang ldan pa dang  brtson 'grus gang gis byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos rnams la mthun zhing rnal 'byor du gnas par 'gyur la / /
column14: 0.013#TD4047E.TXT.r#1183411#1183414#TD4047E.TXT.r_8939# khyad par can gyi brtson 'grus kyi  sbyor ba'i rgyu mthun pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i phyir rgyu mthun pa'i brtson 'grus zhes bya'o // /

column16: 0.015#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2881443#2881447#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_1903;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_1904# bzod pa'i dngos po ni gnod pa nyams su len pa'i bzod pa dang  sdug bsngal la ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa dang  chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa'o // / +brtson 'grus kyi dngos po ni go cha'i brtson 'grus dang  sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus la sogs pa'o // /
