column18: 0.027#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2600776#2600776#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_8131;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_8132# mngon par brtson pa dang  lam ngang gis 'byung ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni mngon par brtson pa ste / / +brtson 'grus med pa'i phyir dang  lam ngang gis 'byung ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column19: 0.028#TD4047E.TXT.r#1183568#1183568#TD4047E.TXT.r_8953# mngon par mos pa dang  'dun pa sngon du 'gro ba dang  gnyen po'i phyogs dang  mi mthun pa'i phyogs 'thob pa dang spong ba'i brtson 'grus dang  lung dang rtogs pa'i chos la nan tan byed pa'i brtson 'grus dang  sems can gyi don la nan tan byed pa'i brtson 'grus  dang  bslab pa rjes su srung ba'i brtson 'grus te / /
column20: 0.028#TD4069E.TXT.r#623359#623359#TD4069E.TXT.r_197# yang dag par zhugs pa rnams ni zhes bya ba rgya cher 'byung ba ni yang dag par zhugs pa rnams ni phyin ci ma log pa'i brtson 'grus sgrub pa dang ldan pa'i phyir dang  mnyam pa'i brtson 'grus  sgrub pa dang ldan pa'i phyir te / /
column21: 0.029#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2877856#2877856#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_1441;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_1442# go cha'i sgras ni go cha'i brtson 'grus bstan / / +sbyor ba'i sgras kyang sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus bstan to zhes bya ba ni rtsom pa bya ste / /

column3: de'i dbang gis da ltar byung ba'i nye bar spyod pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang  tshe rabs gzhan du 'jug ste / / +de'i dbang gis tshe phyi ma'i nyon mongs pa dang las dang tshe'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925143#925157#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4411;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4412# brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan par 'gyur te byang chub sems dpa' de yang zhes bya ba'i don to // / +go cha'i brtson 'grus dang  sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang  ma zhum  pa'i brtson 'grus dang  ma 'khrugs pa'i brtson 'grus dang  chog mi shes pa'i brtson 'grus la gnas shing brtson 'grus de dag kyang 'khor ba'i mtha'i bar du gtong bar mi byed pa ni nan tan mchog la gnas pa zhes bya'o // /
column5: 0.008#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#964531#964532#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9582;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9583# dge ba la sems spro ba ni brtson 'grus kyi brtson 'grus so // / +le los sems  ma gyengs pa ni brtson 'grus kyi bsam gtan zhes bya'o // /
column6: 0.010#TD4080E.TXT.r#592#595#TD4080E.TXT.r_63# dge ba'i las rnams la sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang  go cha'i brtson 'grus dang  brtsams pa mthar phyin pa'i brtson 'grus te / /
column7: 0.010#TD4048E.TXT.r#1693205#1693206#TD4048E.TXT.r_1323# chos kyi sbyin pa dang  zang zing gi sbyin pa dang  mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa dang  sdom pa'i tshul  khrims dang  dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dang  sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims dang  gnod pa byed pa la ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa dang  sdug bsngal dang du len pa'i bzod pa dang  chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa dang  go cha'i brtson 'grus dang  sbyor ba'i  brtson 'grus dang  mi zhum zhing mi 'khrugs pa la chog par mi 'dzin pa'i brtson 'grus dang  gnas pa dang  mngon par sgrub pa dang  bya ba sgrub pa'i bsam gtan dang  rnam par mi rtog par sbyor ba dang  rnam par mi rtog pa dang  rnam par mi rtog pa'i rjes la thob pa'i shes rab    po ; /
column8: 0.012#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2881446#2881446#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_1904# brtson 'grus kyi dngos po ni go cha'i brtson 'grus dang  sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus la sogs pa'o // /
column9: 0.013#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227652#227653#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1759;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1760# 'di lta ste / / +go cha'i brtson 'grus dang  sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang  mi zhum zhing mi 'khrugs la chog par mi 'dzin pa'i brtson 'grus so zhes 'chad do // /
column10: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#968801#968801#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10081# chos tshol ba'i tshe 'bad pa dang rtsol ba dang zhum pa dang  'khrug pa med pa'i brtson 'grus la gnas pas na brtson 'grus mchog  thob pa zhes bya ste / /
column11: 0.026#TD4051E.TXT.r#1268782#1268783#TD4051E.TXT.r_5407# so so rang brtson 'grus mi 'dor bas zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams brtson 'grus 'dor pa yongs su spang ba'i  phyir te / /
column12: 0.026#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1732146#1732146#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_4396;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_4397# 'di la dge slong dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus brtsams zhing gnas te / / +stobs dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus dang   spro ba dang  brtan pa dang pha rol gnon pa khur mi 'dor ba gang gis pags pa dang  rtsa rgyus dang  rus pa tsam zhig lus shing lus kyi sha dang  khrag skams kyang dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus rtsom pa gang dang  stobs dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus dang  spro ba dang  brtan  pa dang  pha rol gnon pa dang  khur mi 'dor ba gang gis thob par bya ba ma thob pa de srid du brtson 'grus rtsom par 'gyur te / /
column13: 0.028#TD4047E.TXT.r#1125252#1125252#TD4047E.TXT.r_559;TD4047E.TXT.r_560# dus kun du sbyor ba nyid ni rtag tu byed pa'i brtson 'grus te / / +des sbyor ba'i  brtson 'grus la gnas par 'gyur ro // /
column14: 0.029#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2600505#2600505#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_8100# mngon par brtson pa dang  lam ngang gis 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba la mngon par brtson pa ni brtson 'grus dang    ldan pa ste / /

column3: 'dir ni skad cig brgyud mar 'jug pa 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid du bshad pa'o // / +tshe rabs  gzhan du 'jug pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid du 'og nas 'chad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925153#925171#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4412;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4413# go cha'i brtson 'grus dang  sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang  ma zhum  pa'i brtson 'grus dang  ma 'khrugs pa'i brtson 'grus dang  chog mi shes pa'i brtson 'grus la gnas shing brtson 'grus de dag kyang 'khor ba'i mtha'i bar du gtong bar mi byed pa ni nan tan mchog la gnas pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: gcig ni rkyen gyi rnam par shes // / +zhes rgya cher 'byung ba de la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925172#925181#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4413;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4414# brtson 'grus de lta bu la brten nas byang chub sems  dpa' sems can mtha' yas pa rnams yongs su smin par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: gcig ces bya ba de ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ste / / +rnam par shes pa lhag ma bdun rnams kyi rgyu'i rkyen gyi dngos po'i rgyu yin pas rkyen gyi  rnam par shes pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925179#925194#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4413;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4414;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4415;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4416;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4417# brtson 'grus de lta bu la brten nas byang chub sems  dpa' sems can mtha' yas pa rnams yongs su smin par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // / +da ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925393#925398#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4441;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4442;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4443;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4444# ting nge 'dzin thams cad bsgrubs pa dang  rdzu 'phrul bsgrubs pa dag kyang sems can gzhan gyis mchod pa dang  bkur sti'i phyir bsgrubs pa ni ma yin gyi zang zing med pa'i sems can gyis mchod pa dang bkur sti byed par 'gyur ba la chags  pa spangs nas sems can yongs su smin par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // / +ji ltar yongs su smin par byed ce na / /
column6: 0.009#TD4018E.TXT.r#3044932#3044934#TD4018E.TXT.r_5316;TD4018E.TXT.r_5317;TD4018E.TXT.r_5318# ston par byed de de tshig dang / / +brjod pa'i  don chud par byed la / / +byed pa dang byed pa por mngon par 'brel par yang chud par byed do // /
column7: 0.012#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925766#925767#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4494;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4495;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4496# sangs rgyas kyi rigs can ni theg pa chen po la yongs su smin par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // / +su dag yongs su smin par byed ce na / /
column8: 0.012#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#965271#965273#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9675;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9676# byed pa dang yongs su rdzogs par byed pa la 'jug par byed do zhes bya ba'i  don to // /
column9: 0.014#TD4036E.TXT.r#43330#43333#TD4036E.TXT.r_6566;TD4036E.TXT.r_6567;TD4036E.TXT.r_6568# 'di ni rul ba dang  dri mi zhim pa dang  dri da ba yin no zhes des rnam pa de dag dang  de lta bu dang  mthun pa gang dag gis mi sdug pa'i dbang du byas pa'i chos sngon thos pa de nyid kyi don so sor rtog par byed de / / +de ltar mi sdug pa nyid kyi don yongs su tshol bar byed do // /
column10: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924577#924577#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4335;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4336# bdag nyid tshul khrims rnam pa lnga la gnas pa bzhin du sems can gzhan yang tshul khrims rnam pa lnga la bkod    de de dang ldan par byas pas yongs su smin par byed do // / +ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa yang de ltar yang cung zad kyi gzhan yang yod par bstan pa'i phyir / /
column11: 0.017#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2726358#2726358#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_3625;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_3626# legs par gsungs pa dang nyes par bshad pa'i don kyang shes par  yang byed do // / +mngon par brjod pas tha snyad 'dogs par yang byed do // /
column12: 0.017#TD4095E.TXT.r#93470#93470#TD4095E.TXT.r_5929;TD4095E.TXT.r_5930# de'i 'og tu bden pa mthong ba dang mthun pa'i chos thos pa 'dzin pa'am don nyan par byed do // / +thos pas phyin ci ma log par sems par byed do // /
column13: 0.018#TD4043E.TXT.r#367620#367621#TD4043E.TXT.r_1564;TD4043E.TXT.r_1565# rgud pa zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pa'i bar de dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur bas na byang chub sems dpa' de dag de la skyo bar bya ba'i phyir ston par byed do // / +rab tu byung bas yang ji ltar rab tu byung ba'i don rnams yang dag  par sgrub par byed pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ston par byed de / /
column14: 0.019#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#776095#776095#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_1540;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_1541# 'dis dngos po rnams sgrogs PAR BYED PA STE / / +gcod par byed ces bya ba'i don to // /
column15: 0.021#TD4036E.TXT.r#36924#36924#TD4036E.TXT.r_5550;TD4036E.TXT.r_5551# rab tu 'dzin pa'i mtshan ma dang bar 'gyur ba gang yang rung bas rab tu 'dzin par byed cing rab tu dga' BAR BYED PA STE / / +de ni sems rab tu 'dzin par byed pa yin no // /
column16: 0.021#TD4047E.TXT.r#1136841#1136841#TD4047E.TXT.r_2244;TD4047E.TXT.r_2245# don che ba yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni don rnam pa sna tshogs pa mang po byed mi nus pa'o // / +don khyad par can byed pa med pa'i phyir mthun pa ma yin pa'o // /
column17: 0.023#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#879165#879165#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_18108# btang snyoms su byed  kyi gtod par mi byed do zhes bya ba'i don gang yin pa'o // /
column18: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2349629#2349630#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4465;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4466;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4467# 'di ltar da ltar byung ba'i dus na 'di lta bu zhig da ltar yod do zhes de ltar dus yongs su tshol bar byed do // / +ji ltar rigs pa yongs su tshol bar byed ce na / /
column19: 0.023#TD4036E.TXT.r#43133#43134#TD4036E.TXT.r_6526;TD4036E.TXT.r_6527;TD4036E.TXT.r_6528# 'di ltar da lta byung ba'i dus na 'di lta bu zhig da ltar yod do zhes de ltar dus yongs su tshol bar byed do // / +ji ltar rigs pa yongs su tshol bar byed ce na / /
column20: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#473314#473314#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3116;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3117# 'di ltar thos nas mi brjed par 'dzin par byed do // / +don phyin ci ma log par 'dzin pa'i phyir ro // /
column21: 0.023#TD4047E.TXT.r#1198230#1198230#TD4047E.TXT.r_10944# byed 'dod pa'i sems kyis rab tu 'jug pa nyid la rab tu sbyor bar byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir gang ci yang rung ba'i rnam pas don de bsgrub par bya'o zhes nges par byed pa nyid ni byed 'dod pa nyid do // /
column22: 0.024#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#877857#877857#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_17911# nye bar rgyu bar byed pa yang ma yin pas zhes bya  ba ni yang dag par rtog par byed pa ma yin zhes bya ba'i don te / /
column23: 0.024#TD4018E.TXT.r#3024045#3024045#TD4018E.TXT.r_2697;TD4018E.TXT.r_2698# gsung ba'i tshig dang  gzung  ba med pa'i tshig ni shes pa 'di sa chud par byed de / / +rtogs par byed 'dzin par skyed pas na gzung ba'i tshig go // /
column24: 0.024#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2072431#2072431#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_13666;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_13667# 'dis 'byor par byed pas so // / +'byor par byed pa ni sgrub par byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column25: 0.024#TD4087E.TXT.r#1570172#1570172#TD4087E.TXT.r_1766;TD4087E.TXT.r_1767# de 'khor los sgyur pa'i rgyal po'i thang du song nas tshe 'di'i don la yang 'dzud par byed / / +tshe phyi ma'i don la yang 'dzud par byed / /
column26: 0.025#TD4047E.TXT.r#1221506#1221506#TD4047E.TXT.r_14210;TD4047E.TXT.r_14211# dman pa la sogs pa rnams la rang gi don la sbyor bar bstan pa'i phyir / / +de dag gis ma rtogs pa'i don yang rtogs par byed la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / /
column27: 0.025#TD4043E.TXT.r#367590#367590#TD4043E.TXT.r_1563# de la khyim ba ni rigs kyi 'du shes la sogs pa de dag gis don rnams ji ltar yang dag par sgrub par byed pa dang  pha dang ma la sogs pa dag yongs su gzung ba'i phyir gang gi don du yang dag par sgrub pa dang  de yongs su  gzung ba'i nyes pa 'khor ba yun ring du skye ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas / /
column28: 0.025#TD4047E.TXT.r#1123922#1123922#TD4047E.TXT.r_361# dor mi byed do zhes bya ba ni 'phrog par mi byed cing co 'dri bar  mi byed pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column29: 0.025#TD4037E.TXT.r#1333250#1333250#TD4037E.TXT.r_2391;TD4037E.TXT.r_2392# byang chub sems  dpa' bsam par bya ba ma yin pa spong ba na rmongs pa dang sems gyengs par mi 'gyur ro // / +rtag tu gus par byed pa'i sbyor bas rgyun du sems par byed na sngon ma rtogs pa'i don khong du chud cing thob par 'gyur la / /
column30: 0.025#TD4035E.TXT.r#174006#174006#TD4035E.TXT.r_8674;TD4035E.TXT.r_8675;TD4035E.TXT.r_8676# dran par mi byed cing / / +yid la mi byed pa'i phyir te / / +ji ltar dran par mi byed cing  yid la mi byed par byed ce na / /
column31: 0.027#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2565034#2565035#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_3649# de yang srid pa mngon par 'grub par bya ba'i phyir skyed par  byed do zhes bya ba'i don te / /
column32: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#945380#945380#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_7122;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_7123# mngon pa'i chos la mkhas na mdo sde rnams kyi don rtogs par 'gyur te / / +mdo sde'i don rtogs par byed ba'i phyir mngon pa'i chos zhes bya'o // /
column33: 0.029#TD4026E.TXT.r#280276#280276#TD4026E.TXT.r_932# rjes su bstan pa dang  kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul dag gis legs par ston pa dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis mgu bar byed pa dang  bstan  pa khas len du gzhug pa'i phyir 'jug pa dang  zhugs pa rnams kyi the tshom gtsod pa'i phyir don la rnam par nges par byed dang  dge ba'i rtsab yongs su smin par byed pa dang  'doms pa dang  sems gnas par byed pa dang  shes rab rnam par grol bar byed pa dang  mngon bar shes  pa la sogs pa yon tan khyad par can rnams yang dag par 'grub par byed pa dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skye ba dang  sa brgyad pa la lung bstan pa dang  sa bcu pa la dbang bskur ba dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'o // /
column34: 0.029#TD4054E.TXT.r#1030242#1030242#TD4054E.TXT.r_6466;TD4054E.TXT.r_6467;TD4054E.TXT.r_6468# dpe dang bcas pa gsungs pa'o // / +des don  gsal bar byed pa'i phyir ste / / +mngon par gsal bar byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go // /

column3: gnyis pa nye bar spyod pa can zhes bya ba ni / / +rnam par shes pa zhes bya bar snyegs te / / +de'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba tshig gi lhag ma'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925195#925206#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4416;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4417;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4418# bskal pa bye ba stong du skyo mi 'gyur // / +zhes smos te / / +sems can gcig gi sems  kyi rgyud kyi skad cig ma gcig la sbyin pa la sogs pa'i dge ba gcig bskyed pa'i phyir / /

column3: de yang rnam pa bdun no // / +nye bar spyod pa ni 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa'i dgos pa yin pas nye bar spyod pa can no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925207#925216#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4418;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4419# sems can gcig gi sems  kyi rgyud kyi skad cig ma gcig la sbyin pa la sogs pa'i dge ba gcig bskyed pa'i phyir / / +dge pa bskyed par nus pa'i skabs gzigs na 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang gshegs shing bskal pa bye ba brgya stong grangs med par yang sems can gyi don mdzad cing gshegs pa  la skyo ba mi mnga'o zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: rnam par shes pa de la  sems las byung ba nye bar spyod pa dang  yongs su gcod pa dang 'jug par byed pa gang yin pa dag kyang de'i 'bras bu zhes bya bar sbyar te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925217#925228#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4419;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4420# dge pa bskyed par nus pa'i skabs gzigs na 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang gshegs shing bskal pa bye ba brgya stong grangs med par yang sems can gyi don mdzad cing gshegs pa  la skyo ba mi mnga'o zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: rnam par shes pa dang  grub pa dang bde ba gcig pa'i phyir ro // / +kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa gzhan dag ni rgyu'i rkyen yin pas rkyen gyi rnam  par shes pa'o zhes bya ba la / /
column4: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#963512#963514#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9462;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9463# sems can yongs su smin par byed pas na / / +yang sems can la phan btags pa dag gnod par byed  pa dang  nyes pa med par yang nyes par byed la / /
column5: 0.022#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2898623#2898624#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_4296;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_4297# de bas na lhun gyis grub pa rnam pa gsum la byang chub sems dpa'i brtan pa yin par shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to // / +de la brtson 'grus  lhun gyis grub pas na zhum pa'i 'jigs pa med do // /
column6: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924204#924205#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4293;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4294# phan pa la bkod pa dang  tshe rabs  gzhan du phan btags te bde ba la bkod pas sems can yongs su smin par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column7: 0.027#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2874904#2874904#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_1001;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_1002# brtson 'grus kyi rang bzhin dang  rgyu dang  'bras bu la sogs pa gong du bshad pa lta bu'i yin par shes nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin du sgrub par byed do zhes  bya ba'i don to // / +ji ltar brtson 'grus brtsams pas sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos dang ma 'dres shing bde ba la reg par spyod ces bya ba la gsungs so // /
column8: 0.028#TD4037E.TXT.r#1349212#1349212#TD4037E.TXT.r_4508;TD4037E.TXT.r_4509# yang byang chub  sems dpa' zhi gnas dang  rab tu 'dzin pa dang  btang snyoms kyi mtshan ma rnams dang ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa dang  ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa dang  ldang ba'i mtshan ma rnams shes pa dang  mi brjed pa dang  rtogs par bya ba'i phyir rtag tu byed cing / / +gus par byed pa 'di ni    byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan mar rtogs pa'i brtson 'grus zhes bya'o // /
column9: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924036#924036#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4266;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4267# tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // / +de la  sbyin pa ci 'dra bas sems can yongs su smin par byed ce na / /

column3: zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos thams cad der 'bras bu'i dngos por sbyor ba dang  de yang de dag la rgyu'i dngos por sbyor bas kun gzhi'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925243#925254#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4421;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4422;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4423# byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyis sems can rnams la tshe 'dir phan btags pa dang tshe rabs gzhan du phan btags pas sems can yongs su smin par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // / +de la brtson    'grus kyis tshe 'dir dge ba'i sems gcig la bkod pa ni tshe 'dir phan btags pa'o // /

column3: sems can dang snod kyi 'jig rten de ltar snang bas rnam par rig par byed pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925255#925263#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4422;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4423;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4424# de la brtson    'grus kyis tshe 'dir dge ba'i sems gcig la bkod pa ni tshe 'dir phan btags pa'o // / +de'i rgyus tshe rabs gzhan du mtho ris dang mya ngan las 'das pa thob par byas pa ni tshe rabs gzhan du phan btags pa'o // /

column3: de yang cig tu  rnam par smin pas lung du ma bstan pa nyid do // / +zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos thams cad kyi sa bon rjes su 'brel ba dang  'jug pa ni rnam par shes pa gzhan dag gi rgyu'i rkyen yin pas rkyen gyi rnam par shes pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925262#925285#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4423;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4424;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4425;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4426# de'i rgyus tshe rabs gzhan du mtho ris dang mya ngan las 'das pa thob par byas pa ni tshe rabs gzhan du phan btags pa'o // / +bsam gtan ji lta bus ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa  las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la / /
column5: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#919647#919647#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3714# zhing yongs su dag par byed pa las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba las / /
column6: 0.024#TD4026E.TXT.r#283165#283166#TD4026E.TXT.r_1399# bsam gtan ji lta bus sems can rnams ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa / /
column7: 0.027#TD4047E.TXT.r#1184120#1184120#TD4047E.TXT.r_9028;TD4047E.TXT.r_9029# bsam gtan la brten nas de'i stobs kyis sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don bdag gi lus sprul pa dus gcig tu spros pas sdug bsngal ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal sel ba dang  phan pa byas pa rnams la lan du phan 'dogs pa'i phyir du byed pa dang  'jigs pa  rnams las srung ba dang  sdug bsngal bar gnas pa rnams kyi mya ngan sel ba dang  skrag par byed pa'i bar du'o // / +de lta bu'i bsam gtan gyi sems can rnams kyi bya ba sgrub par byed pa ni sems can gyi don byed pa'i bsam gtan zhes bya'o / /

column3: de las byung ba 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa ni nye bar spyod pa can no zhes bya ba ni / / +kun gzhi rnam par shes pa de las byung ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925469#925478#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4454;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4455# de yang shes rab ji lta bus sems can ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.010#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912823#912825#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2820# ji ltar bdag la de ltar sgrub pa de bzhin du sems can gzhan la yang de dang 'dra bar sgrub par  byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column6: 0.010#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912955#912957#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2836# gong du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do zhes bshad pa ji ltar na bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column7: 0.010#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#919666#919666#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3716# da ni mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa rnams sangs rgyas  kyi zhing rnam pa gnyis dag par byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column8: 0.010#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924892#924894#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4374# de yang bzod pa 'di 'dra bas sems can 'di ltar smin par byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column9: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924254#924254#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4299# de yang tshul khrims ci 'dra bas sems can ji ltar smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column10: 0.016#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2894819#2894819#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3788# byang chub sems dpa' rnams su thugs rje dang ldan pa'i thugs kyis sbyin pa btang ba'i 'bras bu de dag pas longs spyod khyad par can 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column11: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921525#921525#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3965# sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong na sems can sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir 'jug pa ni snying rje ste sems kyi brtse ba ji tsam zhig skyes na snying rje yongs su smin pa yin pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column12: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922395#922397#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4079# mu stegs pa la sogs pas kyang lta ba bsgyur bar mi nus pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column13: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#905350#905352#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1932;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1933# byang chub sems dpa'i rigs 'di yang yon tan rnam pa bzhi'i gzhi dang rten byed pas gser chen po'i rigs dang 'dra bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column14: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914117#914117#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2997# sems dpa'i sgrub pa 'phags so zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column15: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914540#914542#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3047# spyod yul ni lus kyi sgo nas spyod lam bzhi  la spyod ba dang  mig gi dbang po nas yid kyi dbang po'i bar du dbang po drug gis so so'i yul mthong ba dang thos pa la sogs ba byas pa rnams sems can gyi don du bsngo bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column16: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917896#917897#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3478;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3479# ye shes de'i che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa dang  che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'i sgo nas mthar thug pa'i lam yang bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column17: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#943294#943294#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6852# mis thob par mi 'gyur ro snyam nas zhum pa dang mis thob nas yang bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis thob pas sgrub dka'o snyam nas  zhum pa dang  de ltar dus ring du bsgoms kyang la las thob kyi kun gyis mi thob bo snyam nas zhum pa de dag la rgyu rnam pa gsum gyis na zhum par mi rigs par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column18: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#981740#981742#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11700# byang chub sems  dpa' sems can gyi don byed pa na zhe sdang gi sgo nas byas pa rnams ni nyes pa dang ltung bar 'gyur gyi 'dod chags kyi sgo nas byas pa rnams ni nyes pa dang ltung bar mi 'gyur bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column19: 0.020#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2889762#2889762#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3096# nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa yang ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column20: 0.020#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2892211#2892213#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3460# des 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad zil gyis gnon cing 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad las 'phags par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column21: 0.020#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2893155#2893156#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3587# sems can gzhan bde  na byang chub sems dpa' ci'ang mi bdog kyang bde bar 'gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column22: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920927#920927#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3887# dga' ba smin par gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column23: 0.020#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2895056#2895056#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3817;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3818;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3819# sbyin pa la sogs pa byed du bcug pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa la snying brtse ba zhes bya ste // / +de bstan par bya ba'i phyir // / +tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: de'i rkyen gyis skye zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +ji ltar 'byung zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925290#925298#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4426;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4427;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4428# bsam gtan ci 'dra bas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // / +bsam  gtan ji lta bus sems can yongs su smin par byed ce na de'i phyir / /

column3: 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba na de dang rigs gcig pa 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa ma byung ba 'byung bar byed pa'i sa bon kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la brtas par byed de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925299#925313#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4427;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4428;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4429;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4430;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4431;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4432# bsam  gtan ji lta bus sems can yongs su smin par byed ce na de'i phyir / / +yid kyis bla na med pa'i dbang bskur nas // /
column5: 0.022#TD4066E.TXT.r#2114292#2114293#TD4066E.TXT.r_1715;TD4066E.TXT.r_1716;TD4066E.TXT.r_1717;TD4066E.TXT.r_1718# de'i rnam grangs bstan pa'i phyir / / +sems dang yid kyang de yin te // / +zhes bya ba smos te / / +rnam par shes pa de ni sems zhes  kyang bya / /

column3: sa  bon brtas nas 'gyur ba'i bye brag rnyed pa de las yang de dang rigs gcig la 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925312#925325#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4431;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4432;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4433;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4434# sems KYANG RNAM PAR SHES PA KUN la mi bya'i yid KYI RNAM PAR SHES PA la bya'o // / +dbang ni ting nge 'dzin la bya  ste ; /
column5: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#985448#985448#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_12215# dang po rnal 'byor pas ting nge 'dzin gyis dmigs par bya ba'i yul la sems rtse gcig tu bzhag ste / /

column3: de ltar na de'i rkyen gyis 'jug pa'i rnam par shes par 'gyur ro // / +bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba'i nye bar spyod pa'i gnas su gyur pa dang  kun  kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la bag chags bsgo ba'i phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925324#925343#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4434;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4435;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4436;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4437;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4438# ting nge 'dzin gyis sems mi gyeng bar rtse gcig tu 'jog par byed pas na ting nge 'dzin la dbang zhes bya ste / /
column5: 0.019#TD4039E.TXT.r#1879363#1879363#TD4039E.TXT.r_7529;TD4039E.TXT.r_7530# 'on kyang rgyud la yod pa'i legs par ma  brtsams pa'i brtson 'grus lhod pa gang yin pa de ni le lo dang ldan pa zhes bya ste / / +de ni ting nge 'dzin 'dod pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir rnam pa lngas rnam pa thams cad du bsgom par rig par bya'o // /
column6: 0.021#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2899581#2899581#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_4446;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_4447# gzungs kyis zin cing gzungs dang 'brel pa'o // / +de la ting nge 'dzin ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa ste / /
column7: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#905767#905768#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1970;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1971# byang chub sems dpa'i rigs 'di yang 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin  dang ; / +dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang  nam mkha'i mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin la SOGS PA'I GNAS SU GYUR BAS na rin po che chen po'i rigs dang 'dra'o // /
column8: 0.029#TD4018E.TXT.r#3083223#3083223#TD4018E.TXT.r_10296;TD4018E.TXT.r_10297;TD4018E.TXT.r_10298# nga dang gzhan gyis bshad pa'o //// / +zhes pa 'di ni dbu ma'i ting nge 'dzin to // / +rnam par shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni ji ltar 'dir gsungs pa / /

column3: kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa yang nye bar spyod pa can du 'gyur la / / +'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa yang rkyen gyi rnam par shes par 'gyur bar thal bar mi 'gyur ram / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925344#925357#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4436;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4437;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4438# yid kyis  bla na med pa'i dbang bkur nas // / +zhes bya'o // / +de ltar ting nge 'dzin bsgrubs nas ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus 'phrul gyi mig dang  rna ba la sogs pa rdzu 'phrul rnams kyang sems can gyi don du byed do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /

column3: rkyen gyi dngos po ma gtogs par bag chags bsgo ba gzhan med de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925358#925365#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4438;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4439# de ltar ting nge 'dzin bsgrubs nas ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus 'phrul gyi mig dang  rna ba la sogs pa rdzu 'phrul rnams kyang sems can gyi don du byed do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /

column3: chos mngon pa'i mdo las tshigs su bcad pa las ji skad du / / +phan tshun 'bras bu'i dngos po dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925366#925382#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4439;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4440;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4441# gzhan gyis mchod 'dod thams cad bcom nas  su ; / / +zhes bya ba la / /

column3: rgyu yi dngos por rtog tu yang // / +rnam par shes la chos kun sbyor // /
de yang de bzhin de dag la'o // / +zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o zhe na / / +thal bar mi 'gyur te ci'i phyir zhe na / /
column4: 0.012#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#982160#982160#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11755# de lta bu'i sems can de nyid brdeg btsog la sogs pa byed pa'i sgo nas 'jigs shing dngang bar byed na ni de ni 'gal bar byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.016#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2933328#2933328#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_9005# 'jig rten 'byor ba ma lus dang  zhes bya ba la ji ltar grogs pos grogs po la 'phral du srog dang srid pa bde bar 'gyur ba stobs pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas kyang sems can rnams brgya byin dang  tshangs pa dang  'khor los sgyur ba la sogs  pa'i 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa'i bde ba la sems can 'god par byed cing de lta bu dag sbyin par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column6: 0.018#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#974642#974643#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10796;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10797;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10798# de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'chad pa na don dang tshig gsal bar 'chad par mdzad ces bya ba'i don to // / +ji ltar gsal bar    mdzad ce na / / +de'i phyir gsal bar byed de / /
column7: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#932109#932110#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5390# sprul pas sems can smin par byed la yongs su smin par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column8: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925820#925820#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4507;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4508# byang chub  sems dpas yongs su smin par byed ces bya ba'i don to // / +rnam pa du dang ji lta bus yongs su smin par byed ce na / /
column9: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925800#925801#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4502;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4503# sems can la thugs brtse ba'i rgyus sems can yongs su smin par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // / +sus yongs su smin par byed ce na / /
column10: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925180#925181#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4413;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4414# brtson 'grus de lta bu la brten nas byang chub sems  dpa' sems can mtha' yas pa rnams yongs su smin par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // / +da ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir ro // /
column11: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1141216#1141216#TD4047E.TXT.r_2890;TD4047E.TXT.r_2891# de lta bas na bdag nyid myur du mya ngan las 'da' bar mi byed kyi / / +sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir 'bad par byed sgrub par  byed do // /
column12: 0.029#TD4069E.TXT.r#664094#664094#TD4069E.TXT.r_5821# de lta bas na skye ba'i byed pa po'i byed ces bya ba'i don brjod par bya dgos so zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir byed ces bya ba'i don mang  du snyegs pa de'i phyir skye ba'i byed pa po'i byed ces bya ba'i don brjod par bya dgos so // /
column13: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924204#924204#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4293# phan pa la bkod pa dang  tshe rabs  gzhan du phan btags te bde ba la bkod pas sems can yongs su smin par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column14: 0.029#TD4036E.TXT.r#43032#43032#TD4036E.TXT.r_6508;TD4036E.TXT.r_6509# yongs su btsal nas kyang de dag la so sor rtog par byed do // / +de la ji ltar don yongs su tshol bar byed ce na / /

column3: de'i tshor ba shes  par dka' bas 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa bzhin du nye bar spyod pa can du mi shes sos // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925399#925406#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4442;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4444;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4443;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4445;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4446# ji ltar yongs su smin par byed ce na / / +gzhan yang mchog gi bstan la 'jug par byed // /

column3: yang na nyi ma ltar khyad zhugs par shes par bya ste / / +'di ltar nyes par spyod pa tshor ba rna pa gsum po'i gnas ni 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa nyid yin gyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925405#925423#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4444;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4446;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4445;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4447;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4448# gzhan yang mchog gi bstan la 'jug par byed // / +rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus 'bar pa dang 'phur ba la sogs pa bstan nas /// /

column3: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ni ma yin  no ; / / +'dir ni rgyu'i rkyen du 'dod kyi rkyen tsam du ni ma yin te / / +'di ltar kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ni dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos kyi dbang gis rnam par smin pa dang  rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu'i bag chags dang  lung du ma bstan pa'i chos kyi dbang gis rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu'i bag  chags yongs su 'dzin to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925422#925433#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4447;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4448;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4449;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4450;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4451# sems can gzhan de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan PA LA DGA' BA DANG  mgu pa dang  dad pa skyed par byed ces bya ba'i don to // / +der yang ma zad kyi gzhan yang byed par bstan pa'i phyir / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925433#925446#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4449;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4450;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4451;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4452# de dag dge ba yang dag 'phel bar byed // / +ces bya ba smos te / / +sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dad pa bskyed pa tsam du ma zad kyi dad pa yang bskyed pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod du yang bcug pas dge ba yang 'phel bar byed pa yin no // /
column6: 0.029#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2603075#2603075#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_8395# dbang po rnon po rnams ni gnas gtsang mar skye bar bya ba'i phyir dang  mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas par bya ba kho na'i phyir spel bar byed kyi de dag la yang yongs su nyams pa mi srid pa'i phyir nyon  mongs pas 'jigs pa'i PHYIR NI MA YIN NO // /
column7: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1166207#1166207#TD4047E.TXT.r_6607# rgyal srid las kyang 'byin par byed do zhes bya ba ni bsam pa dge ba yin pa'i phyir ma byin par len par thal bar mi 'gyur ro // /

column3: de'i phyir kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos ma lus pa rnams kyi rgyu'i rkyen to // / +'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i bdag po'i rkyen te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925447#925458#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4451;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4452;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4453# sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dad pa bskyed pa tsam du ma zad kyi dad pa yang bskyed pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod du yang bcug pas dge ba yang 'phel bar byed pa yin no // / +shes rab ji lta bus ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya  ba la ; /
column5: 2.980#TD4026E.TXT.r#283220#283222#TD4026E.TXT.r_1405;TD4026E.TXT.r_1406# gzhan sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la 'dun par  byed pa dang  'dun par byas pa la dge ba'i chos spel ba'i sgo nas yongs su smin par byed do // / +shes rab ji lta bus ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa / /
column6: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925081#925083#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4402;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4403# brtson 'grus ji lta bus ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams te / /
column7: 0.027#TD4026E.TXT.r#282866#282868#TD4026E.TXT.r_1356# sbyin pa ji lta bus sems can rnams ji ltar  yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa / /
column8: 0.029#TD4026E.TXT.r#283102#283102#TD4026E.TXT.r_1389# brtson 'grus ji lta bus sems can ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa / /

column3: rgyu'i rkyen ma yin pas 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rkyen du     // / +thal bar 'gyur ba med do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925459#925467#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4452;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4453;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4454# shes rab ji lta bus ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya  ba la ; / +da ni shes rab kyis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa ston te / /

column3: nye bar spyod pa ni tshor ba'o zhes bya ba la / / +rnam pa gsum char yang nye bar spyod pas nye bar spyod pa ste / / +myong bar byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.010#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912824#912825#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2820# ji ltar bdag la de ltar sgrub pa de bzhin du sems can gzhan la yang de dang 'dra bar sgrub par  byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.010#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912955#912957#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2836# gong du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do zhes bshad pa ji ltar na bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column6: 0.010#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#919666#919666#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3716# da ni mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa rnams sangs rgyas  kyi zhing rnam pa gnyis dag par byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column7: 0.010#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925100#925103#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4405# de yang brtson 'grus ji lta bus  sems can 'di 'dra bar yongs su smin par byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column8: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924029#924029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4265;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4266# de yang sbyin pa ji lta bu btang nas sems can rnams ji ltar smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir / / +tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column9: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924250#924254#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4299# de yang tshul khrims ci 'dra bas sems can ji ltar smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column10: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#905350#905353#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1932;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1933# byang chub sems dpa'i rigs 'di yang yon tan rnam pa bzhi'i gzhi dang rten byed pas gser chen po'i rigs dang 'dra bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column11: 0.016#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2894819#2894819#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3788# byang chub sems dpa' rnams su thugs rje dang ldan pa'i thugs kyis sbyin pa btang ba'i 'bras bu de dag pas longs spyod khyad par can 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column12: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921525#921525#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3965# sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong na sems can sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir 'jug pa ni snying rje ste sems kyi brtse ba ji tsam zhig skyes na snying rje yongs su smin pa yin pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column13: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922395#922397#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4079# mu stegs pa la sogs pas kyang lta ba bsgyur bar mi nus pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column14: 0.018#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911025#911025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2593# dpe'i sgo nas yon tan che bar yang brjod nas byang chub kyi sems dam pa de ma bskyed na skyon yod pa dang bden pa bzhi ma thob par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column15: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914117#914117#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2997# sems dpa'i sgrub pa 'phags so zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column16: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914542#914542#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3047# spyod yul ni lus kyi sgo nas spyod lam bzhi  la spyod ba dang  mig gi dbang po nas yid kyi dbang po'i bar du dbang po drug gis so so'i yul mthong ba dang thos pa la sogs ba byas pa rnams sems can gyi don du bsngo bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column17: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#943294#943294#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6852# mis thob par mi 'gyur ro snyam nas zhum pa dang mis thob nas yang bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis thob pas sgrub dka'o snyam nas  zhum pa dang  de ltar dus ring du bsgoms kyang la las thob kyi kun gyis mi thob bo snyam nas zhum pa de dag la rgyu rnam pa gsum gyis na zhum par mi rigs par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column18: 0.020#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2889762#2889762#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3096# nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa yang ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column19: 0.020#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2892211#2892213#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3460# des 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad zil gyis gnon cing 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad las 'phags par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column20: 0.020#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2893155#2893156#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3587# sems can gzhan bde  na byang chub sems dpa' ci'ang mi bdog kyang bde bar 'gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column21: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920927#920927#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3887# dga' ba smin par gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column22: 0.020#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2895056#2895056#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3817;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3818;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3819# sbyin pa la sogs pa byed du bcug pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa la snying brtse ba zhes bya ste // / +de bstan par bya ba'i phyir // / +tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column23: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#934810#934810#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5782;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5783# chos kyi dbyings la skye 'gag med pa'i phyir ro // / +tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'i bsdus pa'i don ni sems can yongs su smin par byed pa la / /
column24: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#915711#915711#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3202# phyin ci log de skyon yin pas spang dgos bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column25: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#975450#975452#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10944;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10945# de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa dang ldem po dag la phyi nang du yod bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa gnyis rtsom  mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column26: 0.022#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2889222#2889224#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3020;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3021# byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje la phye na du yod pa dang  byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje'i dmigs pa bya ba'i yul gang yin pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa  gnyis rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column27: 0.024#TD4026E.TXT.r#282866#282867#TD4026E.TXT.r_1356# sbyin pa ji lta bus sems can rnams ji ltar  yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa / /
column28: 0.024#TD4026E.TXT.r#283102#283102#TD4026E.TXT.r_1389# brtson 'grus ji lta bus sems can ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa de las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa / /
column29: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896433#896433#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_926# de'i phyir mtshan  nyid dang mi 'gal bar tshigs su bcad PA ZHES BYA BA LA DE ltar rgol ba rnams la theg pa chen po 'di sangs rgyas kyi bka'i mtshan nyid dang mi 'gal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column30: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959054#959054#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8905# mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta bur yin pa brtag par bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column31: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900383#900383#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1395# khas blangs pa'i don rgya cher bshad pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column32: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#904921#904921#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1899# byang chub sems dpa'i rigs yod kyang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa bzhi'i skyon dang ldan na skyon des bsgribs pas sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i  spyod pa la 'jug par mi nus par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo // /
column33: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896716#896716#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_957# da theg pa chen po mu stegs dang rtog ge pa rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: srid pa'i ro bro ba'i snying po 'dra ba ni tshor ba ste / / +de'i phyir byis pa rnams de kun tu myong bar bya ba'i phyir  yul rnams la chags so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925477#925498#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4454;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4455;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4456;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4457;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4458;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4459;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4460# de yang shes rab ji lta bus sems can ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // / +shes rab ji lta bus sems can ji ltar yongs su smin  par byed ce na / /

column3: kha cig na re tshor ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi don la dmigs pa yang nye bar spyod pa zhes bya'o zhes zer te / /
bshad pa las nye bar spyod pa ni tshor ba zhes 'byung ba dang 'gal bas de ni ma yin no // / +don la dmigs pa ni rnam par shes pa las gzhan  ma yin pas de sems las byung bar mi rung ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925499#925512#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4459;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4460;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4461# de nyid kyi tshul la nges pa dang dgongs tshul la nges pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro // / +de la gang zag la bdag med pa dang  chos la bdag ming pa gnyis ni de nyid kyi tshul zhes bya ste / /

column3: bde ba la sogs pa'i bye brag 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid kyi phyir tshor ba yongs su spyod pa ni 'du shes nye bar spyod pa dang  'du shes la rnam par shes pa 'jug par byed pa dag ni 'du byed rnams te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925513#925527#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4461;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4462# byang chub sems dpa' de'i shes rab kyis chos de la the tshom med par byas shing gtan la phab par byas pa ni de nyid kyi tshul la nges par byed pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: sems pa dang yid la byed pa la  sogs pa'o // / +yang na nye bar spyod pa ni tshor ba'o zhes bya ba ni / / +rang gi dmigs pa ji lta ba bzhin du myong ba'am / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925525#925537#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4462;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4463# don gzhan la dgongs pa dang dus gzhan la dgongs ba la sogs pa dgongs pa bzhi dang ldem por dgongs pa bzhi la  ni dgongs pa'i tshul zhes bya'o // /
column5: 0.027#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2948427#2948428#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_11139;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_11140# de la dgongs pa zab mo nges par 'brel  ba'i rang bzhin ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ldan pas / / +de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa bzhi dang  ldem po dgongs pa bzhi la sogs pa phyin ci ma log pa'i bar ma chad par byed pa ste / /

column3: bde ba la sogs pa myong bar 'gyur ba'i las myong ba'i phyir ro // / +de ltar yul dang las la spyod pa ni tshor ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925538#925548#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4462;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4463;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4464# don gzhan la dgongs pa dang dus gzhan la dgongs BA LA SOGS PA DGONGS pa bzhi dang ldem por dgongs pa bzhi la  ni dgongs pa'i tshul zhes bya'o // / +chos de dag la the tshom med par byas pa ni dgongs pa'i tshul la nges pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: de'i phyir nye bar spyod pa zhes bya'o // / +yul gyi don rtags tha  snyad kyi mtshan ma yongs su gcod par byed pas yongs gcod ni 'du shes so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925549#925556#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4464;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4465;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4466;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4467# tshig 'dis bdag nyid kyi ye shes kyi tshogs kyi yon tan la gnas par bstan to // / +ji ltar sems can the tshom bsal nas YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED ce  na ; /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925557#925565#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4465;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4466;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4467;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4468;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4469# ji ltar sems can the tshom bsal nas YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYED ce  na ; / +de'i phyir / / +sems can the tshom shin tu sel bar byed // /

column3: rnam par shes pa dmigs pa gzhan la 'jug par byed pa dag ni 'du byed rnams te / / +de ltar na sems pa la sogs pa'i dbang gis rnam par shes pa dmigs pa gzhan la brten to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925563#925577#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4467;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4468;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4469# sems can the tshom shin tu sel bar byed // / +ces bya ba smos te / / +de ltar bdag nyid the tshom med par byas nas sems can rnams de kho na'i tshig dang  dgongs pa'i tshul la the tshom du gyur pa rnams kyi the tshom bsal nas the tshom med pa la dgod par byed kyi / /
column5: 0.028#TD4097E.TXT.r#2224574#2224574#TD4097E.TXT.r_2943;TD4097E.TXT.r_2944# so sor zhes bya ba'i sgra ni khyab par 'dod pa'i tshig ste / / +sems can sems can zhes so sor gnas pa'o // /

column3: sogs pa'i sgras ni 'dun pa  la sogs pa bsdu'o // / +gang nas ci 'dra gang gi phyir 'jug pa ni bshad zin to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925576#925587#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4469;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4470;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4471# de ltar bdag nyid the tshom med par byas nas sems can rnams de kho na'i tshig dang  dgongs pa'i tshul la the tshom du gyur pa rnams kyi the tshom bsal nas the tshom med pa la dgod par byed kyi / /

column3: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid kyang ston to zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa dang las dang tshe'i kun nas nyon mongs pa rnams ji ltar 'byung ba na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925588#925604#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4470;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4471;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4472;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4473;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4474# de lta    bu'i tshul gyis sems can yongs su smin par byed do // / +'dis ni sems can gzhan dag ye shes kyi tshogs la bkod pa bstan to // /

column3: 'gro ba yongs su nyon mongs par 'gyur ba de ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i  mtshan nyid do // / +de ni bdag med par yang yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pa tsam las 'khor ba rgyas par 'gyur ba / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925605#925613#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4474;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4475;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4476# bdag dang pha rol dge ba'i yon tan 'phel // / +zhes  bya ba smos te / /

column3: rab tu bstan pa'i phyir bshad de / / +sgrib pa'i phyir dang 'debs pa'i phyir // / +khrid pa'i phyir dang kun 'dzin phyir // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925614#925625#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4476;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4477# sems can rnams de nyid kyi tshul dang  dgongs pa'i tshu la the tshom med par byas pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la gus pa dang dad pa dang rim gro bskyed do // /

column3: zhes rgya cher gsungs so // / +rten cing 'brel bar    'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa 'di yang 'jug pa'i phyogs kyi dbang du mdzad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925626#925635#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4477# de bas na byang chub sems dpa' des bdag gi dge ba'i yon tan yang 'phel  bar byas pha rol gyi dge ba'i yon tan yang 'phel bar byas so // /

column3: de la sgrib pa'i phyir te / / +'gro ba nyon mongs par byed do zhes tha mar smos pa ni thams cad dang sbyar ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925636#925645#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4477;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4478;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4479# de bas na byang chub sems dpa' des bdag gi dge ba'i yon tan yang 'phel  bar byas pha rol gyi dge ba'i yon tan yang 'phel bar byas so // / +ji ltar zhe na / /
column5: 0.024#TD4039E.TXT.r#1836807#1836807#TD4039E.TXT.r_2689# nyon mongs pa can gyi sems kyis bdag gi yon tan gleng ba'am brten pa'i tshul kun du spyod pas tshig gi lam 'jam po kun du spyod pa ni kha gsag go // /

column3: gang gis sgrib pa ji ltar sgrib pa'i phyir nyon mongs par byed ce na / / +de'i phyir ma rig pas yang dag pa  ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba la bgegs byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925646#925661#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4479;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4480;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4481;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4482# de nyid dang dgongs pa'i tshul la the tshom med pas na bdag dge ba'i yon tan 'phel bar byas so // / +de nyid dang dgongs pa'i tshul la sems can gzhan the tshom bsal bas pha rol kyang dge  ba'i yon tan la 'phel bar byas so // /

column3: ma rig pa ni mi mthong ba'i bdag nyid yin pas yang dag pa mthong ba'i yul la rab tu sgrib pa'i phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925662#925671#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4481;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4482# mjug bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la / / +sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i skabs su pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis sems can yongs su smin par byed do zhes rgya cher bstan nas da don de nyid mjug bsdu zhing ji  ltar sems can yongs su smin par byas pa'i don mdor bsdus te bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: yang dag pa mthong ba mi skye ste / / +de'i phyir yang dag pa mthong ba skye ba la bgegs byed pas ma rig pa ni  yang dag pa mthong ba la bgegs byed pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900163#900165#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1362# 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i skyabs su song bas 'phags so zhes glengs pa la kun tu 'gro ba'i don rgyas par bshad par bya ba'i  tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925672#925690#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4482;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4483# sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i skabs su pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis sems can yongs su smin par byed do zhes rgya cher bstan nas da don de nyid mjug bsdu zhing ji  ltar sems can yongs su smin par byas pa'i don mdor bsdus te bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column6: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914117#914117#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2997# sems dpa'i sgrub pa 'phags so zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column7: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914542#914542#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3047# spyod yul ni lus kyi sgo nas spyod lam bzhi  la spyod ba dang  mig gi dbang po nas yid kyi dbang po'i bar du dbang po drug gis so so'i yul mthong ba dang thos pa la sogs ba byas pa rnams sems can gyi don du bsngo bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column8: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917896#917896#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3478# ye shes de'i che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa dang  che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'i sgo nas mthar thug pa'i lam yang bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column9: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#943294#943294#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6852# mis thob par mi 'gyur ro snyam nas zhum pa dang mis thob nas yang bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis thob pas sgrub dka'o snyam nas  zhum pa dang  de ltar dus ring du bsgoms kyang la las thob kyi kun gyis mi thob bo snyam nas zhum pa de dag la rgyu rnam pa gsum gyis na zhum par mi rigs par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column10: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#981740#981740#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11700# byang chub sems  dpa' sems can gyi don byed pa na zhe sdang gi sgo nas byas pa rnams ni nyes pa dang ltung bar 'gyur gyi 'dod chags kyi sgo nas byas pa rnams ni nyes pa dang ltung bar mi 'gyur bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column11: 0.017#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2889762#2889762#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3096# nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa yang ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column12: 0.017#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2892211#2892213#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3460# des 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad zil gyis gnon cing 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad las 'phags par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column13: 0.017#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2893156#2893156#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3587# sems can gzhan bde  na byang chub sems dpa' ci'ang mi bdog kyang bde bar 'gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column14: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#935343#935343#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5861;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5862# mi nyams la gyo ba'i mtshan nyid kyi phrin las de dag thams cad kyang mdzad do zhes bya ba'i don to // / +tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa'i bsdus pa'i don ni sems can smin par sbyor zhing mdzad pa'i  rgyu zag pa med pa'i dbyings rtog pa dang mngon par 'du byed pa med pa de ston te / /
column15: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924254#924254#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4299# de yang tshul khrims ci 'dra bas sems can ji ltar smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column16: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912957#912957#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2836# gong du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do zhes bshad pa ji ltar na bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: yang dag pa mthong ba yang dngos su ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab po // / +de'i rjes las byung ba'i phyir de'i rjes las thob pa dang  de'i rtogs pa'i phyir de sbyong bar byed pa thos pa dang  sems pa dang bsgom pa las byung ba yang yang dag pa  mthong ba zhes bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925690#925703#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4482;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4483;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4484;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4485;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4486;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4487# sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i skabs su pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis sems can yongs su smin par byed do zhes rgya cher bstan nas da don de nyid mjug bsdu zhing ji  ltar sems can yongs su smin par byas pa'i don mdor bsdus te bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // / +sems can gang du 'dul zhing smin par byed ce na / /
column5: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914117#914117#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2997# sems dpa'i sgrub pa 'phags so zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom zhes bya ba'i don to // /
