column13: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900383#900383#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1395# khas blangs pa'i don rgya cher bshad pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column14: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#943660#943660#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6891;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6892# de ltar theg pa chen po'i chos la mos pa bsod nams che bar bstan nas spyir ni theg pa chen po'i chos  la mos pa'i 'bras bu dpag tu med pas 'khor ba'i mtha'i bar du brjod kyang zad par mi 'gyur mod kyi mdor bsdus na 'di dag 'thob po zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to / / +tshigs su bcad pa 'di'i bsdus pa'i don ni gang du mos pa dang  gang gis mas  pa dang  ji lta bus mos pa dang  mos pa'i 'bras bus gang yongs su 'dzin pa de ston to // /
column15: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#935091#935091#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5830;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5831# bu bla na med pa'i byang chub nyid thob pa ni ngo mtshar chen por bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // / +tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa'i bsdus pa'i don ni dus gcig sgo mang po nas yongs su smin par bya ba'i thabs kyi rgyud du ma yod par ston to // /
column16: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924254#924254#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4299# de yang tshul khrims ci 'dra bas sems can ji ltar smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column17: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#935343#935343#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5861;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5862# mi nyams la gyo ba'i mtshan nyid kyi phrin las de dag thams cad kyang mdzad do zhes bya ba'i don to // / +tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa'i bsdus pa'i don ni sems can smin par sbyor zhing mdzad pa'i  rgyu zag pa med pa'i dbyings rtog pa dang mngon par 'du byed pa med pa de ston te / /
column18: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912957#912957#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2836# gong du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do zhes bshad pa ji ltar na bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column19: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924896#924896#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4374;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4375# de yang bzod pa 'di 'dra bas sems can 'di ltar smin par byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // / +bzod pa ci 'dra bas sems can yongs su smin par byed ce na / /
column20: 0.029#TD4079E.TXT.r#760309#760310#TD4079E.TXT.r_639;TD4079E.TXT.r_640# de dag ni rnam par rtog pa las ma 'das pa'i rnal 'byor pa la smad ba ste tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa'i don to // / +de las 'das pa'i bsngags pa ni tshigs su bcad pa bzhi ba'i don to // /
column21: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#929962#929962#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5067;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5068# snod chag pa lta bu'i sems can ngan pas bdag la sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yod kyang mi mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i don to // / +tshigs su bcad pa drug pa'i bsdus pa'i don ni sangs rgyas mthong bar     // /

column3: yang dag pa mthong ba'i bgegs su gyur pas / / +ma rig pa ni 'du byed rnams kyi rkyen zhes bya ste / / +de ltar sgrib pa'i phyir ma rig pas 'gro ba nyon mongs par byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925704#925717#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4486;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4487;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4488# zhes bya ba smos te / / +ji ltar zhes bya  ba ni gong du bshad pa ltar na gong du byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongs su smin par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: 'debs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba yang 'gro ba nyon mongs par byed ces bya ba dang sbyar ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925716#925727#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4487;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4488;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4489# ji ltar zhes bya  ba ni gong du bshad pa ltar na gong du byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongs su smin par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // / +gang zag rigs med pa rnams ni dge ba bcu spyod du bcug cing lha dang mi'i bde 'gro'i gnas su bkod cing yongs su smin par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: gang gis gang du ci 'dabs  she na ; / +de'i phyir 'du byed rnams kyis rnam par shes pa la las kyi bag chags zhes bya ba smos so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925725#925736#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4488;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4489;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4490# gang zag rigs med pa rnams ni dge ba bcu spyod du bcug cing lha dang mi'i bde 'gro'i gnas su bkod cing yongs su smin par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: de la 'du byed rnams ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las bsod nams dang  bsod nams ma yin pa dang  mi gyo ba'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925737#925750#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4489;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4490;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4491;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4492# gang zag nyan thos kyi rigs can nam rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs can nam / / +sangs rgyas kyi rigs can dag ni dge ba la bkod par byed de dge ba gsum ni theg pa gsum la bya ste / /

column3: de ni yang srid pa mngon par 'du byed pas 'du  byed de / / +ma btab pa 'debs zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925749#925758#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4491;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4492;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4493;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4494# de la nyan thos kyi rigs can ni nyan thos kyi theg par bkod cing yongs su smin par byed / /

column3: de nyid du 'du byed kyi sgrar bshad kyi thams cad ni ma yin no // / +de yang ma rig pa'i dbang gis yang srid pa 'debs nus par 'gyur gyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925756#925769#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4493;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4494;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4495;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4496;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4497# sangs rgyas kyi rigs can ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la bkod cing yongs su smin par byed / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925819#925825#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4507;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4508;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4509;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4510# byang chub  sems dpas yongs su smin par byed ces bya ba'i don to // / +rnam pa du dang ji lta bus yongs su smin par byed ce na / /
column6: 0.012#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925393#925393#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4441;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4442# ting nge 'dzin thams cad bsgrubs pa dang  rdzu 'phrul bsgrubs pa dag kyang sems can gzhan gyis mchod pa dang  bkur sti'i phyir bsgrubs pa ni ma yin gyi zang zing med pa'i sems can gyis mchod pa dang bkur sti byed par 'gyur ba la chags  pa spangs nas sems can yongs su smin par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // / +ji ltar yongs su smin par byed ce na / /
column7: 0.016#TD4047E.TXT.r#1123922#1123922#TD4047E.TXT.r_361# dor mi byed do zhes bya ba ni 'phrog par mi byed cing co 'dri bar  mi byed pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column8: 0.018#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2726355#2726359#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_3624;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_3625;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_3626# rna ba ni sgra sna tshogs dag nyan par byed do // / +legs par gsungs pa dang nyes par bshad pa'i don kyang shes par  yang byed do // /
column9: 0.018#TD4095E.TXT.r#93470#93471#TD4095E.TXT.r_5929;TD4095E.TXT.r_5930# de'i 'og tu bden pa mthong ba dang mthun pa'i chos thos pa 'dzin pa'am don nyan par byed do // / +thos pas phyin ci ma log par sems par byed do // /
column10: 0.018#TD4087E.TXT.r#1570172#1570172#TD4087E.TXT.r_1766;TD4087E.TXT.r_1767# de 'khor los sgyur pa'i rgyal po'i thang du song nas tshe 'di'i don la yang 'dzud par byed / / +tshe phyi ma'i don la yang 'dzud par byed / /
column11: 0.019#TD4069E.TXT.r#664093#664094#TD4069E.TXT.r_5821# de lta bas na skye ba'i byed pa po'i byed ces bya ba'i don brjod par bya dgos so zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir byed ces bya ba'i don mang  du snyegs pa de'i phyir skye ba'i byed pa po'i byed ces bya ba'i don brjod par bya dgos so // /
column12: 0.019#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#879165#879165#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_18108# btang snyoms su byed  kyi gtod par mi byed do zhes bya ba'i don gang yin pa'o // /
column13: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925180#925180#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4413;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4414# brtson 'grus de lta bu la brten nas byang chub sems  dpa' sems can mtha' yas pa rnams yongs su smin par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // / +da ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir ro // /
column14: 0.021#TD4018E.TXT.r#3044933#3044937#TD4018E.TXT.r_5317;TD4018E.TXT.r_5318# brjod pa'i  don chud par byed la / / +byed pa dang byed pa por mngon par 'brel par yang chud par byed do // /
column15: 0.023#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#965271#965272#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9675# byed pa dang yongs su rdzogs par byed pa la 'jug par byed do zhes bya ba'i  don to // /
column16: 0.023#TD4018E.TXT.r#3032516#3032516#TD4018E.TXT.r_3742# ri bong gi rva med pa dang  sbom po'i phyi'i rdzas ba glang gi rva yod do snyam du rtog pa blo gros chen po de dag yod pa dang med pa'i mtha' gnyis kyi  lta bar lhung zhing rang gi sems kyi khams kyi yul du rnam par rtog pa gang yod pa des dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i tha snyad rnams brtas par byed de 'phel bar byed ces bya ba'i don to // /
column17: 0.024#TD4061E.TXT.r#1538032#1538032#TD4061E.TXT.r_3448;TD4061E.TXT.r_3449;TD4061E.TXT.r_3450# mi mthun par mi byed / / +sbyor bar byed / / +gnod par mi byed / /
column18: 0.024#TD4070E.TXT.r#2818483#2818483#TD4070E.TXT.r_2560;TD4070E.TXT.r_2561# 'dzin pa gnyis kyi bag chags med par las kyi bag chags 'ba' zhig gis rnam par smin pa skyed mi nus so zhes bya bar 'gyur  ro ;; / +de'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni don de nyid bstan par byed do // /
column19: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#891070#891070#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_288;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_289# gang la brgyan par byed ce na / / +theg pa chen po'i mdo sde'i don dang  tshig la brgyan par byed do // /
column20: 0.024#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2564984#2564984#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_3642;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_3643# rgyud gnas par byed do zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa'i rgyun brgyud pas gnas par byed do zhes  bya ba'i don to // / +zhing du sgrub par byed do zhes bya ba ni las bdag nyid skye ba dang mthun par byed do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column21: 0.025#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#776095#776095#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_1540;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_1541# 'dis dngos po rnams sgrogs par byed pa ste / / +gcod par byed ces bya ba'i don to // /
column22: 0.026#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3125703#3125703#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4741;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4742# des  kyang de byed la / / +mi byed na yang le los yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // /
column23: 0.026#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1722612#1722612#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_3328# de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'di snyam du ston pa'i mdun du yang bdag gis bshad pa la dge slong  'di phyir zlog par byed khong khro bar byed cing tshangs par mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyang bdag gis bshad pa la / /
column24: 0.027#TD4036E.TXT.r#43330#43330#TD4036E.TXT.r_6566;TD4036E.TXT.r_6567# 'di ni rul ba dang  dri mi zhim pa dang  dri da ba yin no zhes des rnam pa de dag dang  de lta bu dang  mthun pa gang dag gis mi sdug pa'i dbang du byas pa'i chos sngon thos pa de nyid kyi don so sor rtog par byed de / / +de ltar mi sdug pa nyid kyi don yongs su tshol bar byed do // /

column3: yod pa tsam gyis ni ma yin pas / / +ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925770#925787#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4495;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4496;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4497;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4498;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4499;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4500# su dag yongs su smin par byed ce na / / +de'i phyir / / +'gro bam  lus zhes bya ba smos te / /

column3: 'di ltar ma rig  pa ma skyes na de dag yang srid pa 'du byed kyi / / +rig pa skyes na ni ma yin no // /
column4: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#891526#891526#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_353;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_354# ci'i phyir brgyan par byed / / +rgyu gang gis brgyan par byed / /

column3: bdag po tsam gyis ni ma rig pa 'du byed kyi rkyen zhes mi bya'i // / +spyi'i rkyen yin pas kun nas 'byung ba na yang yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925786#925799#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4498;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4499;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4500;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4501;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4502# rigs med pa dang  nyan thos kyi rigs can dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs can la sogs pa sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // / +rgyu gang gis yongs su smin par byed ce na / /

column3: 'di ltar ma rig pa ni nyon mongs pa thams cad dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir / / +ji ltar nyon     // / +mongs pa kun nas 'byung ba rnams kyi spyi'i rkyen yin pa de bzhin du de las byung ba'i sems pa rnams kyi yang yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925800#925816#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4502;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4503;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4504;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4505;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4506;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4507# sems can la thugs brtse ba'i rgyus sems can yongs su smin par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // / +sus yongs su smin par byed ce na / /
column5: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#982160#982160#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11755# de lta bu'i sems can de nyid brdeg btsog la sogs pa byed pa'i sgo nas 'jigs shing dngang bar byed na ni de ni 'gal bar byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column6: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925392#925393#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4441;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4442# ting nge 'dzin thams cad bsgrubs pa dang  rdzu 'phrul bsgrubs pa dag kyang sems can gzhan gyis mchod pa dang  bkur sti'i phyir bsgrubs pa ni ma yin gyi zang zing med pa'i sems can gyis mchod pa dang bkur sti byed par 'gyur ba la chags  pa spangs nas sems can yongs su smin par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // / +ji ltar yongs su smin par byed ce na / /
column7: 0.026#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2933328#2933328#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_9005# 'jig rten 'byor ba ma lus dang  zhes bya ba la ji ltar grogs pos grogs po la 'phral du srog dang srid pa bde bar 'gyur ba stobs pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas kyang sems can rnams brgya byin dang  tshangs pa dang  'khor los sgyur ba la sogs  pa'i 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa'i bde ba la sems can 'god par byed cing de lta bu dag sbyin par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: bsod nams kyi 'du byed srid pa dang longs spyod bye brag can la smon pa'i rjes su 'gro ba rnams kyi yang yin te / /
column4: 0.020#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2726358#2726359#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_3625;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_3626# legs par gsungs pa dang nyes par bshad pa'i don kyang shes par  yang byed do // / +mngon par brjod pas tha snyad 'dogs par yang byed do // /
column5: 0.020#TD4095E.TXT.r#93470#93471#TD4095E.TXT.r_5929;TD4095E.TXT.r_5930# de'i 'og tu bden pa mthong ba dang mthun pa'i chos thos pa 'dzin pa'am don nyan par byed do // / +thos pas phyin ci ma log par sems par byed do // /
column6: 0.020#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2564984#2564984#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_3642;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_3643# rgyud gnas par byed do zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa'i rgyun brgyud pas gnas par byed do zhes  bya ba'i don to // / +zhing du sgrub par byed do zhes bya ba ni las bdag nyid skye ba dang mthun par byed do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column7: 0.021#TD4061E.TXT.r#1538032#1538032#TD4061E.TXT.r_3448;TD4061E.TXT.r_3449;TD4061E.TXT.r_3450# mi mthun par mi byed / / +sbyor bar byed / / +gnod par mi byed / /
column8: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925393#925393#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4441;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4442# ting nge 'dzin thams cad bsgrubs pa dang  rdzu 'phrul bsgrubs pa dag kyang sems can gzhan gyis mchod pa dang  bkur sti'i phyir bsgrubs pa ni ma yin gyi zang zing med pa'i sems can gyis mchod pa dang bkur sti byed par 'gyur ba la chags  pa spangs nas sems can yongs su smin par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // / +ji ltar yongs su smin par byed ce na / /
column9: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925766#925767#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4494;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4495;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4496# sangs rgyas kyi rigs can ni theg pa chen po la yongs su smin par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // / +su dag yongs su smin par byed ce na / /
column10: 0.023#TD4087E.TXT.r#1570172#1570172#TD4087E.TXT.r_1766;TD4087E.TXT.r_1767# de 'khor los sgyur pa'i rgyal po'i thang du song nas tshe 'di'i don la yang 'dzud par byed / / +tshe phyi ma'i don la yang 'dzud par byed / /
column11: 0.023#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#879165#879165#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_18108# btang snyoms su byed  kyi gtod par mi byed do zhes bya ba'i don gang yin pa'o // /
column12: 0.024#TD4047E.TXT.r#1123922#1123922#TD4047E.TXT.r_361# dor mi byed do zhes bya ba ni 'phrog par mi byed cing co 'dri bar  mi byed pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column13: 0.025#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2028265#2028265#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_7271;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_7272# 'di ltar des ni khams de mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa dag tu rnam par sun 'byin par byed cing / / +rnam par gtong bar byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column14: 0.027#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#830513#830513#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_10596;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_10597# rga bas ni rgas par byed do zhes  bya bas ni stobs chung bar byed de / / +'jig pa la mngon du phyogs par gnas par byed ces bya ba'i don to // /
column15: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#891070#891070#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_288;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_289# gang la brgyan par byed ce na / / +theg pa chen po'i mdo sde'i don dang  tshig la brgyan par byed do // /
column16: 0.028#TD4036E.TXT.r#43414#43414#TD4036E.TXT.r_6579;TD4036E.TXT.r_6580# phyi rol la yang phyi rol du gtogs pa'i rnam par bsngos pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa dag gis mi sdug pa nyid du mos par byed de / / +de la rnam par bsngos par  mos par byed pa ni / /
column17: 0.028#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#1994494#1994494#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_2279;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_2280# 'dir tshogs par byed pas na tshogs pa yin te / / +skyed par byed ces bya ba'i don to // /
column18: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925180#925180#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4413;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4414# brtson 'grus de lta bu la brten nas byang chub sems  dpa' sems can mtha' yas pa rnams yongs su smin par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // / +da ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir ro // /
column19: 0.029#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2063411#2063411#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_12357;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_12358# gtod par byed dam zhes bya ba'i don to // / +de dang bcas pa'i dmigs pa dang bcas pas 'dzin par byed ces bya ba 'dis ga las she na / /

column3: kun nas 'byung ba ni de dang lhan cig  'byung ba'i ma rig pa ni spyi'i rkyen yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925826#925833#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4508;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4510;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4509;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4511;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4512# rnam pa du dang ji lta bus yongs su smin par byed ce na / / +chung dang mchog dang 'bring gi rnam pa yis // /

column3: mi gyo ba de la nges par 'byung bar lta ba kun 'byung ba rnams kyi yang yin te / / +de dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i ma rig pa ni spyi'i rkyen yin pas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925834#925843#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4512;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4513# mos pas spyod pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gzung  'dzin ma spangs pa dang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs shas chung bas bdag nyid kyang chung ba zhes bya bas / /

column3: 'du byed kyi rkyen zhes bshad do // / +rnam par shes pa la zhes bya ba ni / / +'dir kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la  dgongs pa yin gyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925844#925854#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4512;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4513# mos pas spyod pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gzung  'dzin ma spangs pa dang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs shas chung bas bdag nyid kyang chung BA ZHES BYA BAS / / +gzhan mos pas spyod pa'i sar bkod nas gzung 'dzin ma spangs pa dang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chung du la bzhag pas chung du'i rnam pas yongs su  smin par byed pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma yin te / / +rgyun chad pa dang 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pas skye ba'i gnas su khrid mi srid pa dang  dge ba dang nyon mongs pa can gnyis 'grogs mi srid pas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925853#925866#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4513;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4514# gzhan mos pas spyod pa'i sar bkod nas gzung 'dzin ma spangs pa dang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chung du la bzhag pas chung du'i rnam pas yongs su  smin par byed pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: 'du byed rnams kyis de la las kyi bag chags gzhom mi srid pa'i  phyir ro // / +las kyi bag chags zhes bya ba la las kyi bag chags zhes bya ba 'di gang yin zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925867#925882#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4514;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4515;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4516# byang chub sems dpa' rnams sa brgyad pa dang dgu pa dang bcu pa la gnas pa la gnas pa'i dus na bdag nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa'i lhun gyis grub pa rnyed nas / /

column3: ma 'ongs pa'i sa bon te rgyu'i dngos po'o // / +dper na 'bru'i 'bras bu sa dang thal ba dang  lung la sogs pa rkyen gyi bye brag la ltos te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925883#925894#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4515;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4516;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4517# bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po la gnas la gzhan yang sa  de gsum la bkod na / / +rnam par mi rtog pa lhun gyis grub pa thob par byas pa dang  bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po la bzhag pas mchog gi rnam pas yongs su smin pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: 'gyur ba las myu gu 'byung ba'i rgyu'i dngos po ni sa bon  zhes bya ba lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925893#925909#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4516;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4517# rnam par mi rtog pa lhun gyis grub pa thob par byas pa dang  bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po la bzhag pas mchog gi rnam pas yongs su smin pa zhes bya'o // / +nam byang chub sems dpa' sa dang po nas bdun pa man chad la gnas pa'i    dus na bdag nyid kyang 'bad rtsol dang bcas pa'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs la gnas la / /

column3: 'jog pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni 'debs pa nyid kyi rnam grangs gzhan bshad pa'o // / +'jog pa yang rnam par shes pa'i rgyud 'di la des thog ma kho na'i sa bon de rgyas par byed pa yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925910#925927#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4517;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4518# nam byang chub sems dpa' sa dang po nas bdun pa man chad la gnas pa'i    dus na bdag nyid kyang 'bad rtsol dang bcas pa'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs la gnas la / /

column3: zag pa med pa'i ltar zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos ni 'ga' tsam gyis kyang sa bon sngon ma  bskyed pa med de / /
'di ltar 'du byed rnams kyis rnam par shes pa la yang srid pa'i sa bon skyed pa'i phyir 'gro ba nyon mongs par byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925928#925937#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4518;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4519;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4520;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4521# sems can gzhan dag kyang sa de dag la bkod na 'bad rtsol dang bcas pa'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi  tshogs la bkod pa 'bring gi rnam pas sems can yongs su smin pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: khrid pa'i phyir 'gro ba nyon mongs par byed do zhes bya ba gang gis gang du gang khrid pa mi shes nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925938#925948#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4519;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4520;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4521;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4522;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4523# dus ji srid cig tu sems can yongs su smin par byed ce na / / +de'i phyir / / +'jig rten yod dang mnyam par 'jug pas 'dul // /

column3: de'i phyir rnam par shes pas skye ba'i gnas su phyin  par byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925949#925964#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4523;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4524;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4525# nam mkha'i mtha' ji srid du yod par sems  can gyi khams kyang nge srid du yod do // /

column3: las kyis yongs su bsgos pa'i rnam par shes pa rgyun chags su 'jug pas 'chi'o // / +gnas nas skye ba'i gnas su yang srid pa'i sa bon du gyur ba'i bag chags phyin par byed / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925965#925975#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4525;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4526;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4527;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4528# sems can gyi khams yod kyi bar du sems can yongs su smin par byed pas na / /

column3: khrid par byed do // / +de ltar byas na nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam    par shes pa'i rkyen ni 'du byed ma yin gyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918189#918192#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3522;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3523;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3524# myur du bla na med pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te zhes bya ba'i don to // / +de kho na'i skabs bshad pa  rdzogs so //// /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925973#925985#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4526;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4527;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4528;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4529;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4530# 'jig rten yod dang mnyam par 'jug pas 'dul // / +zhes bya'o // / +yongs su smin pa'i skabs bshad pa rdzogs so //// /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926166#926176#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4554;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4555;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4556;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4553# de'i rjes la yongs su smin pa'i skabs kyi rjes la / / +rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // /
column7: 2.384#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#978175#978179#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11252;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11253;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11254# chos bshad pa'i skabs bshad pa rdzogs so //// /
column8: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#943866#943867#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6920;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6921;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6922# tshig de dag gis ni mos pa'i 'bras bus gang yongs su 'dzin pa bstan to // / +mos pa'i skabs bshad pa rdzogs so //// /
column9: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912359#912363#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2754;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2755# bskyed pa lhag par bya ba'i skabs rdzogs so //// /
column10: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#915092#915093#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3123;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3124;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3125# bam po dang po'i 'grel pa rdzogs so //// / +sgrub pa'i skabs bshad pa'i rjes la / /
column11: 0.019#TD4029E.TXT.r#2141544#2141546#TD4029E.TXT.r_2728;TD4029E.TXT.r_2729;TD4029E.TXT.r_2730# 'di skad du kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i chos la mkhas pa dang  don dam pa'i bden pa'i chos la mkhas pa zhes bshad pa yin no // / +chos yongs su tshol ba'i skabs rdzogs so //// /
column12: 0.021#TD4029E.TXT.r#2151112#2151114#TD4029E.TXT.r_3984;TD4029E.TXT.r_3985;TD4029E.TXT.r_3986# de bzhin du brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan dang shes rab kyang sbyar bar bya'o // / +pha rol tu phyin pa'i skabs rdzogs so //// /
column13: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920422#920424#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3823;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3824# mthu'i skabs bshad pa rdzogs so //// / +mthu'i skabs bshad pa'i  rjes la / /
column14: 0.023#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906908#906910#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2097;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2098;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2099# rigs kyi skabs bshad pa rdzogs so //// / +rigs kyi skabs kyi rjes la / /
column15: 0.024#TD4029E.TXT.r#2154314#2154314#TD4029E.TXT.r_4421;TD4029E.TXT.r_4422# mchod pa dang brten pa dang tshad med pa'i skabs rdzogs so //// / +tshad med pa'i 'og tu ngo tsha ba'i skabs te // /
column16: 0.029#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2905841#2905841#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_5314;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_5315# rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam par dbye ba la tshigs su bcad pa  lnga ste zhes bya ba la / / +yang dag pa'i spong ba'i skabs kyi rjes la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i skabs bshad pa 'brel ba ci yod ce na / /
column17: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#951518#951518#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_7863# de kho na tshol ba'i skabs kyi rjes la de kho na la sgyu ma lta bur yongs su tshol ba'i skabs bshad par 'brel ba ci yod ce na / /
column18: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#951600#951600#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_7874# de'i phyir de kho na nyid tshol ba'i skabs kyi rjes la de kho na nyid la sgyu ma lta bur yongs su tshol ba'i skabs bshad par  'brel to // /
column19: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#946198#946198#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_7203# dmigs pa yongs su tshol ba'i skabs kyi rjes la dmigs pa rnyed pa'i skabs bshad par 'brel pa ci yod ce na / /

column3: sngon gyi dus kyi srid pa'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyi rkyen 'du byed yin par rab tu bstan pa yin te / / +rgyu zhig pa las 'bras bu 'byung bar mi rung ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925986#925999#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4530;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4531# rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i skabs bshad par 'brel pa ci yod ce na / /
column5: 0.022#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2899472#2899472#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_4425;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_4426# skyo ba med pa'i skabs kyi 'og tu gtsug lag shes pa'i skabs bshad par 'brel pa ci yod ce na / / +de ltar skyo ba med par gyur pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' de dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa dang  dam pa'i chos nyan pa la sogs pa gdon mi za bar  byed do // /

column3: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnyed pa rnams ni gang shi ba de nyid du skye bas gzugs med  pa rnams su ji ltar skye ba'i gnas su phyin par byed ce na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926000#926013#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4531;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4532;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4533# de ltar byang chub sems dbas sems can gyi rgyud la'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin  par byas / / +bdag gi sems kyi rgyud la'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par byas pa de / /

column3: de ni ci rigs par shes par bya ste / / +ming dang gzugs bzhin no // / +kun 'dzin phyir 'gro ba nyon mongs par byed do zhes bya ba gang gis gang du gang yongs su 'dzin zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926014#926023#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4533;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4534# myur du bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par byas pa des na yongs su smin pa'i skabs kyi 'og tu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926022#926033#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4533;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4534;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4535# myur du bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par byas pa des na yongs su smin pa'i skabs kyi 'og tu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // / +yang na bdag dang gzhan gyi don dang  de kho na'i don dang  mthu dang  yongs su smin pa dang  bla na med pa'i byang chub ste / /

column3: de'i phyir ming dang gzugs kyi lus so zhes bya ba smos te / / +ming  dang gzugs ni phung po lnga'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926031#926048#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4534;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4535;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4536;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4537;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4538# yang na bdag dang gzhan gyi don dang  de kho na'i don dang  mthu dang  yongs su smin pa dang  bla na med pa'i byang chub ste / / +dngos po lnga ni byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i dmigs par byas pa yin no // /
column5: 0.029#TD4009E.TXT.r#328940#328940#TD4009E.TXT.r_1271;TD4009E.TXT.r_1272# byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni zad zing med pa'i sems kyis byang chub 'thob pa'i dbang du byas pa'o // / +de ltar yang  dag par sgrub pa'i rab tu byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyi khyad par brjod pa'i phyir dpe bstan pa mdzad do // /

column3: de dag kyang nying mtshams sbyor ba nas bzung ste / / +nur nur po dang mer mer po dang  nar nar po dang gor gor po dang  rkang lag 'gyus pa'i dus dang  skye mched drug ma dod kyi bar du rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs zhes bya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926049#926059#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4537;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4538;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4539;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4540# byang chub  thob par bya ba yang ci dgos she na / / +bdag dang gzhan gyi don yongs su rdzogs par dgos te / /

column3: 'di ltar de la  bsgos pa'i bye brag gis rigs mthun pa gzhan dag tu de bye brag can du grub po // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926060#926069#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4539;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4540;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4542# de bas na de'i rjes la bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi skabs bshad do // / +bdag dang gzhan gyi don la zhugs pa des kyang bdag nyid kun nas nyon mongs pas ma gos par byas pa yin te / /

column3: de skyes nas kyang mi dang dud 'gro la sogs pa'i rigs mthun pa tha dad pa'i phyir lus kyang tha dad pas ming dang gzugs kyis lus yongs su 'dzin zhes bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926070#926085#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4542;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4543;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4544# bas na kun nas nyon mongs pas mi gos ba'i thabs de kho na'i skabs bshad do // / +kun nas nyon mongs pas kyang ma gos kyang mthu med na sems can gyi don la skyo bar 'gyur te / /

column3: yang na 'chi ba la thug gi bar du lus  thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa ste / / +de thog ma kho nar thams cad kyi rgyu'i dngos por rnam par gnas pa'i phyir // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926083#926096#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4544;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4545;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4546# de bas na sems can gdul bar bya ba'i don la mi skyo ba'i thabs mthu'i  skabs bshad do // /

column3: yang na dbyer med kyang ming gzugs kyis lus yongs su 'dzin to zhes 'di tha dad par ston to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926097#926107#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4545;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4546;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4547;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4548# de ltar de kho na'i dang  mthu gnyis kyis byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su smin pa dang  sems can yongs su smin par byed de / / +ji lta zhe na / /

column3: dper na 'dus byas thams cad phung po lnga rnams kyis kun bsdus so  zhes bya ba lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926108#926117#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4548# byang chub sems dpa' de kho na khong du chud na bdag nyid kyi rgyud la dga' ba  la sogs pa'i chos dgu shas cher myur du 'grub cing thob par 'gyur gyi de kho na'i khong du ma chud na ni mi 'gyur te / /

column3: rdzus te skye ba rnams ni rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis skye mched drug nyid do // / +de'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs ci rigs par shes par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926118#926131#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4548;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4549;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4550# byang chub sems dpa' de kho na khong du chud na bdag nyid kyi rgyud la dga' ba  la sogs pa'i chos dgu shas cher myur du 'grub cing thob par 'gyur gyi de kho na'i khong du ma chud na ni mi 'gyur te / /

column3: rdzogs byed phyir 'gro ba nyon mongs par byed do zhes bya ba gang gis gang du gang rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926132#926145#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4549;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4550;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4551;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4552;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4553# de bas na de kho na khong du chud pa las bdag sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su smin par 'gyur te / / +mthu dang ldan skyo ba dang gnod pa med par sems can yongs su smin par byed nus  te ; /

column3: skye  mched drug gis ming dang gzugs su bsdus pa'i lus te 'di ltar ming dang gzugs kyi tshe ni / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926146#926154#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4552;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4553# de bas na mi skyo ba'i thabs ni mthu dang ldan pa'i thabs kyis bshad do // / +de ltar bdag dang sems can yongs su smin pa dang ldan pa rnams ni sha thang dang mi bde ba med par tshogs yongs su rdzogs nas bla na med pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur  te ; /

column3: mig la sogs pa'i skye mched med pa'i phyir lus ma rdzogs pa zhes bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926155#926162#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4553;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4554# de ltar bdag dang sems can yongs su smin pa dang ldan pa rnams ni sha thang dang mi bde ba med par tshogs yongs su rdzogs nas bla na med pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur  te ; /
column5: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#962903#962905#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9386# mngon par sangs rgyas par 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni ji ltar ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug  spyad nas bla na med pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column6: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#983305#983309#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11909;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11910# ye shes des sgrub par byed pa dang  bsgrub bar bya ba dang  sgrub pa gsum la mi rtog pa'i tshul du bsgrubs nas sa  bcu rim gyis mnan nas sangs rgyas kyi sar byang chub sems dpa' des sgrub pa mchog thob par 'gyur te / / +bla na med pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column7: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918182#918184#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3522# myur du bla na med pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: de'i tshe na lus kyi skye mched dang yid kyi skye mched yod mod kyi 'on kyang brten pa dang  gnas yongs su rdzogs par med     // /
column4: 0.012#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925981#925983#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4528;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4529;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4530# yongs su smin pa'i skabs bshad pa rdzogs so //// / +yongs su smin pa'i skabs bshad pa'i rjes la / / +rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i skabs bshad par 'brel pa ci yod ce na / /

column3: ba'i phyir yongs su ma rdzogs pa nyid do // / +skye mched drug gi dus na ni mig la sogs pa mngon par grub pas gnas yongs su rdzogs pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926175#926193#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4556;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4557;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4558;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4559;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4560# de la bdag dang gzhan gyi don dang  de kho na'i don dang mthu dang  yongs su smin pa bzhi ni rgyu lta bur dmigs so // /

column3: mig la sogs pa de la brten pa rnams yongs su rdzogs pas lus kyi skye mched kyang yongs su rdzogs pa yin no // /
column4: 0.015#TD4026E.TXT.r#286194#286197#TD4026E.TXT.r_1907# me long lta bu'i ye shes dang   mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang  so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang  bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes so // /
column5: 0.015#TD4029E.TXT.r#2131414#2131417#TD4029E.TXT.r_1471;TD4029E.TXT.r_1472# sangs rgyas kyi sa ni chos lnga po chos kyi dbyings dang  me long lta bu'i ye shes dang  mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes  dang ; / +so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang  bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes kyis bsdus par 'byung bas / /
column6: 0.015#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#933992#933995#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5657# de la ye shes kyi sgras ni me long lta bu'i ye shes dang  mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang  bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes dang  so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes la bya ste / /
column7: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#936181#936183#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5962# chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa dang  me long lta bu'i ye shes dang  mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang  so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes dang  bya ba sgrub  pa'i ye shes so // /
column8: 0.028#TD4029E.TXT.r#2146398#2146398#TD4029E.TXT.r_3376;TD4029E.TXT.r_3377# mi rtog byang chub kyis zhes bya ba ni rtog pa med pa'i ye shes kyis zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste / / +me long lta bu'i ye shes la  sogs pa rtog pa dang bral ba de dag gis so // /

column3: ji ltar mig la  sogs pa la brten zhe na de la rag las te 'byung ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2406617#2406622#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11295# de ni chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa dang  me long lta bu'i ye shes dang  mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang  so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang  bya ba grub pa'i ye shes rdzogs par  longs spyod pas dgongs pa ro gcig pa 'dres pa la sogs pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi gnas dang spyod yul dang bsdus pa yin pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyis zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926191#926203#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4559;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4560# gsum pa ni bshad pa'o zhes bya ba la / / +me long lta bu'i ye shes dang  mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang  so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang  bya ba grub pa'i ye shes dang  chos kyi  dbyings dang lnga las sangs rgyas zhes bya ste / /
column6: 0.014#TD4026E.TXT.r#286192#286197#TD4026E.TXT.r_1906;TD4026E.TXT.r_1907# sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes ni rnam pa bzhi ste / / +me long lta bu'i ye shes dang   mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang  so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang  bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes so // /
column7: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#905450#905453#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1943# byang chub sems dpa'i rigs kyis kyang chos rnams la rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid la phyin ci ma log par shes par byed pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang  so sor kun tu rtog pa'i ye shes dang  bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes gsal zhing 'od dang bcas pa'i  gnas su gyur pas na gser chen po dang 'dra'o // /
column8: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#938189#938195#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6226# me long lta bu'i ye shes la gnas pa'i ye shes gsum ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang  so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes dang  bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes so // /
column9: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#938548#938548#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6265# ye shes kyi 'byung gnas ye shes mang po 'byung ba ltar me long lta bu'i ye shes las kyang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang  so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes dang  bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes rnams 'byung ste / /
column10: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#933793#933793#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5629# de dang lhan cig ces bya ba ni dbang po gcig cing yang yul kun la 'jug pa dang  yon tan brgya rtsa bcu gnyis kyis 'byor pa dang  rnam par rtog    pa'i ye shes dang  de'i rgyab nas thob pa dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes dang rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes la dmigs pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang bcas pas rtag par yang sems can gyi don la 'jug go zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: yid kyi skye mched ni rnam par shes pa drug gis bsdus pa ste / / +de'i tshe gnas ma lus par yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir yongs su rdzogs pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926202#926216#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4560;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4561;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4562# me long lta bu'i ye shes dang  mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang  so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang  bya ba grub pa'i ye shes dang  chos kyi  dbyings dang lnga las sangs rgyas zhes bya ste / /

column3: yan lag dang nyid lag yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir skye mched drug gi dus nyid na / / +gnas yongs su rdzogs pas skye mched drug gis 'gro ba nyon mongs par byed ces bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926215#926228#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4562;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4563# sangs rgyas de'i don tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis ni mdo tsam du bstan pa de tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa bzlas te zhib tu 'chad do zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: gsum gcod phyir 'gro ba nyon mongs par byed do zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926229#926237#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4562;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4563;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4564;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4565# sangs rgyas de'i don tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis ni mdo tsam du bstan pa de tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa bzlas te zhib tu 'chad DO ZHES BYA BA'I DON to // / +de la tshigs    su bcad pa gnyis kyis bsdus pa'i don ni rnam pa gsum ste / /

column3: gsum ni dbang po dang yul dang rnam par shes pa 'dus so // / +bde ba la sogs pa'i tshor ba 'byung ba dang mthun pa dbang po'i  'gyur ba rnam pa gsum gang yin pa de yongs su gcod pa ni reg pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926236#926253#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4563;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4564;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4565;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4566# de la tshigs    su bcad pa gnyis kyis bsdus pa'i don ni rnam pa gsum ste / / +yang dag par 'thob pa dang  rang bzhin dang dpe'o // / +yang dag par thob ba la rnam pa bzhi ste / /

column3: de bas na dbang po'i 'gyur ba gang yin pa de'i rnam pa dang 'dra bar reg par byed pas reg pa zhes bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926254#926263#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4566;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4567;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4568# dga' ba spyod pa brgya phrag ji snyed pa dang  dge ba'i tshogs ji snyed pa dang  dus ji srid cig dang  nyon mongs pa dang   shes bya'i sgrib pa ji tsam spangs pas sangs rgyas thob pa ni yang dag par THOB PA ZHES BYA'O // /

column3: yang na skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa ni bde ba la sogs par tshor ba dang mthun pa dbang po'i 'gyur ba rnam pa gsum skyed  do ; / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926264#926276#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4567;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4568;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4569# dpag med dka' spyod brgya rnams dang / / +zhes bya bas dka' ba spyod pa brgya phrag ji snyed cig bstan te / /

column3: nye bar spyod pa ni tshor bas so zhes bya ba la / / +tshor ba ni srid pas nye bar spyad pa ste / / +ro myong bar byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926277#926286#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4569# sems can gyi don du mgo dang rkang lag la sogs pa dang bu smad btang ba dang   'jig rten gyi khams me ma mur gyis gang bar yang 'bog cing 'gro ba la sogs pa'i dka' ba spyod pa dpag tu med pa brgya phrag grangs med pa zhig kyang spyad ces bya ba'i don to // /

column3: yang na bsod nams la sogs pa'i las la nye bar spyod pas tshor ba ni nye bar spyod pa zhes bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926287#926295#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4569;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4570# sems can gyi don du mgo dang rkang lag la sogs pa dang bu smad btang ba dang   'jig rten gyi khams me ma mur gyis gang bar yang 'bog cing 'gro ba LA SOGS PA'I DKA' BA spyod pa dpag tu med pa brgya phrag grangs med pa zhig kyang spyad ces bya ba'i don to // /

column3: yang na 'dir nye bar spyod pa zhes bya ba ni tshor ba myong ba ste / / +bde ba la sogs pa myong ba na der bde ba la sogs pa rgyas par gyur pa'i phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926296#926310#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4569;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4570;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4571;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4572;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4573# sems can gyi don du mgo dang rkang lag LA SOGS PA DANG BU smad btang ba dang   'jig rten gyi khams me ma mur gyis gang bar yang 'bog cing 'gro ba la sogs pa'i dka' ba spyod pa dpag tu med pa brgya phrag grangs med pa zhig kyang spyad ces bya ba'i don to // / +brgya smos pas ni mtshon pa tsam du zad kyi grangs stong phrag la sogs pa tshad med pa rnams kyi'ang bsdu'o // /

column3: rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba dang gti mug rnams kyis 'gro ba nyon mongs par byed do // / +sdud pa'i phyir zhes bya ba gang gis gang sdud pa mi shes so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926311#926323#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4571;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4572;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4573;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4574;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4575;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4576# dpag med dge ba bsags pa dang / / +zhes bya bas / / +dge ba'i chogs ji snyed pa bstan te / /

column3: de'i phyir las kyis btab pa'i yang srid pa sred pas so zhes bya ba  smos so // / +'du byed rnams kyis yang srid pa'i sa bon rnam par shes pa la gso ba'i phyir btab pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926324#926338#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4574;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4575;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4576;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4577;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4578;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4579# sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang  byang chub kyi phyogs la sogs pa dge ba dpag tu med pa yang bsags zhes bya ba'i don to // / +dpag tu med pa'i dus dang ni // / +zhes bya bas / / +dus ji srid  cig bstan te / /

column3: yang srid par 'gyur ba'i sa bon chu dang 'dra ba'i sred pa / / +'gro ba thams cad du bye brag med par lus 'dod pa zhes bya bas brlan nas yang srid pa 'byung bar nye bar sbyor zhing 'byung ba nges par 'jog    pa gang yin pa de ni sdud pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926337#926353#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4578;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4579;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4580;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4581;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4582# dus kyang bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyi bar du spyod ces bya ba'i don to // / +dpag med sgrib pa zad pa'i phyir // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926354#926361#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4582;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4583;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4584# 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas ma spangs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib  pa yang spangs / / +shes bya'i sgrib pa yang spangs zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: sbyor ba'i phyir zhes bya ba la gang gis gang du gang zhig sbyor ba dri bar bya ba'i skabs su bdag nyid kyis len pa rnams kyis rnam par shas pa skye ba dang  mthun pa 'dod pa la sogs pa rnams su'o zhes bya ba smos so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926362#926373#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4583;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4584;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4585;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4586;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4587# shes bya'i sgrib pa yang spangs zhes bya ba'i don to // / +'di yang chad yang dag par thob pa bstan to // / +rang bzhin yang rnam pa gnyis te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926374#926383#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4587;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4588;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4589# sgrib pa kun gyi dri med pa // / +zhes bya bas spangs  pa phan sum tshogs pa bstan te / /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926613#926615#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4622;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4623;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4624# 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas bsags pa'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang  shes bya'i sgrib pa kun sbangs  zhes bya ba'i don to // / +sgrib pa kun gyi dri med pa // /

column3: mngon par zhan pa dang 'dun pa'i 'dod  chags kyi mtshan nyid nye bar len pa bzhi po dag gis las kyis btab pa'i rnam par shes pa skye ba dang mthun pa 'dod pa dang lta ba dang  tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs dang  bdag tu lta ba dag tu sbyor bar byed 'jog par byed de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926384#926391#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4588;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4589;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4590# zhes bya bas spangs  pa phan sum tshogs pa bstan te / / +sangs rgyas kyi dus na sa bcur gtogs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang  shes bya'i sgrib pa'i bag chags kyang ma lus par spangs pas / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926392#926418#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4589;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4590;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4591;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4592;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4593;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4594;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4595;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4596;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4597# sangs rgyas kyi dus na sa bcur gtogs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang  shes bya'i sgrib pa'i bag chags kyang ma lus par spangs pas / / +sgrib pa kun gyi dri med ces bya'o // /

column3: 'di ltar 'dun pa'i 'dod chags kyi dbang gis rnam par  shes pa der gnas so // /
column4: 0.021#TD4018E.TXT.r#3035787#3035787#TD4018E.TXT.r_4137# nyan thos kyi theg pa mngon par rtogs pa'i lta bas zhes bya ba ni bdag gi don du lta bas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir gzhan gyi  dbang gi rnam pa nyid la mi rtag pa dang  sdug bsngal ba dang  bdag med pa dang  stong pa la sogs pa'i rnam pas 'dod chags dang bral nas / /
column5: 0.028#TD4035E.TXT.r#169486#169486#TD4035E.TXT.r_7848# gang gis smon pa med par 'gyur ba'i mi rtag pa dang  sdug bsngal ba mthong ba de ltar yongs su dag par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // /
column6: 0.029#TD4003E.TXT.r#425915#425915#TD4003E.TXT.r_89# de'i phyir ma rtogs pa rnams la sems can la dmigs pa'i snying rjes de dag gi sdug bsngal ba dang  chos la dmigs pa'i snying rjes chos thams cad mi rtag pa dang     sdug bsngal ba dang  stong pa dang  bdag med par bsgom pa dang  dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje dang stong pa nyid bsgom ste / /

column3: mngon du'i phyir zhes bya ba 'dir yang gzhan gyis yongs su dri bar bya ba'i skabs su bdag nyid kyis las byas pa'i rnam par smin pas yang srid par 'byin par mngon par byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926418#926432#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4596;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4597;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4598;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4599# de la mi rtag pa dang  sdug bsngal ba dang  stong pa dang  bdag med par de lta bur phyin ci ma log par shes pas ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o // / +phung po  dang khams la sogs pa'i chos kun ma lus par mkhyen pas na thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ste / /
column5: 0.023#TD4031E.TXT.r#2958830#2958830#TD4031E.TXT.r_41;TD4031E.TXT.r_42# rin chen snod ni phye ba ltar // / +sangs rgyas nyid ni yang dag bstan // /

column3: ji ltar sngon byas pa'i las rnam par shes pa'i rgyu  yang 'byung bas bag chags kyi dus su gyur pa rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu'i phyir / /

column3: 'jug pa rnyed pas srid pa yod par gyur cing srid pa btab pa 'grub par mngon du gyur pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926445#926453#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4602# dper na rin po che'i sgrom kha phyen kha dog dang dbyibs su ldan  pa'i rin po che sna tshogs snang ba de bzhin du nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa gnyis spangs te / /

column3: de ltar na srid pas mngon du'i phyir 'gro ba nyon mongs par byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926454#926462#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4602;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4603# dper na rin po che'i sgrom kha phyen kha dog dang dbyibs su ldan  pa'i rin po che sna tshogs snang ba de bzhin du nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa gnyis spangs te / /

column3: sdug bsngal phyir ni skye ba dang rga shis 'gro ba nyon  mongs par byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926461#926472#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4603;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4604# sangs rgyas kyis thob pa'i dus na stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang ma 'dres pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos rin po che sna tshogs dag de'i tshe na snang ngo zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: de ltar srid pa las yang srid pa mngon par 'grub pa yod pa thog ma nyid du mngal du zhugs pa na khu ba dang khrag gi nang na rnam par shes pa myos pas nyon mongs par byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926473#926488#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4603;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4604;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4605;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4606;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4607;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4608# sangs rgyas kyis thob pa'i dus na stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang ma 'dres pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos rin po che sna tshogs dag de'i tshe na snang ngo zhes bya ba'i don to // / +dpag med dka'  spyod brgya rnams dang / /

column3: de bzhin du ma'i mngal du zhu ba dang ma zhu ba'i gnas kyi bar na 'gre ldog pas nyon mongs  par byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926489#926499#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4607;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4608# ngal brgyas rmad 'byung dka' spyad ces smos te / / +'bad pa dang  bsgrub pa dang  brtsal ba drag po grangs med pas mgo dang rkang lag dang  bu smad la sogs pas gtang bar spyad pa ni ngal brgyas rmad 'byung ba'i  dka' ba spyad pa zhes bya ste / /

column3: yang de ltar ma'i kha zas dang spyod pa nyam nga ba dang  ya nga ba ma spangs pas kyang nyon mongs par byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926501#926509#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4608;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4609# 'bad pa dang  bsgrub pa dang  brtsal ba drag po grangs med pas mgo dang rkang lag dang  bu smad la sogs pas gtang bar spyad pa ni ngal brgyas rmad 'byung ba'i  dka' ba spyad pa zhes bya ste / /

column3: de bzhin du dog pa mi gtsang ba'i lam nas 'byung bas nyon mongs par byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926510#926517#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4609;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4610# de lta bur dka' ba spyad pa 'jig rten dang  nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la med pas na rmad du byung ba zhes bya'o // /

column3: skyes nas kyang spyi cer dang skra skya ba la sogs pa rga ba'i mtshan nyid dang ming dang gzugs  'jig pa'i 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid dang  lang tsho dang srog phangs pa las nyams pas 'gro ba nyon mongs par byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926518#926527#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4610# de yang mdo dag las sems can gyi don du ngas mig yongs su btang ba bsags na ni ri rab bas kyang mtho la khrag yongs su btang ba  bsags na ni phyogs bzhi'i rgya mtsho bas kyang mang ngo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926527#926539#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4610;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4611;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4612# de yang mdo dag las sems can gyi don du ngas mig yongs su btang ba bsags na ni ri rab bas kyang mtho la khrag yongs su btang ba  bsags na ni phyogs bzhi'i rgya mtsho bas kyang mang ngo zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: 'gro bar byed pas na 'gro ba ste / / +rigs mthun pa'i gnas skabs nas skad cig gi gnas skabs su rab tu 'gro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926536#926550#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4610;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4611;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4612;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4613;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4614# de yang mdo dag las sems can gyi don du ngas mig yongs su btang ba bsags na ni ri rab bas kyang mtho la khrag yongs su btang ba  bsags na ni phyogs bzhi'i rgya mtsho bas kyang mang ngo zhes bya ba'i don to // / +dpag med dge ba bsags pa dang / /

column3: nyon mongs par byed ces bya ba ni /// / +skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba la sogs pas khams gsum du skad cig gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa 'ong zhing 'gro bar gyur pas nyen zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926551#926559#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4614;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4615;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4616# pha rol tu phyin pa dang  sa bcu dang  byang chub kyi phyogs la sogs pa'i  dge ba kun kyang bsags zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926560#926571#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4615;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4616;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4617;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4618# dpag tu med ba'i dus dang ni // / +zhes bya ba'i don rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir / /

column3: kha cig na re rnam par byang ba'i ma yin pas nyon mongs pa zhes bya zhe'o // / +de ltar kun nas  nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa 'di ni sgrib pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa don rnam pa bcu gcig gis rnam par byang ba'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs su 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926572#926580#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4617;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4618# dus ring bskal pa mchog 'gro zhes smos te / / +dus ring gi sgras ni bskal pa chung du dang  par gyi bskal pa tsam du bsgrub pa ma yin gyi bskal pa chen    por bsgrub par ston to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926580#926589#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4618;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4619# dus ring gi sgras ni bskal pa chung du dang  par gyi bskal pa tsam du bsgrub pa ma yin gyi bskal pa chen    por bsgrub par ston to // /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926590#926597#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4619;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4620;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4621# mchog gi sgras ni bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyi bar du bsgrub par ston to // /

column3: ma rig pa la sogs pa'i go rims ni snga ma snga mas phyi ma phyi ma skyed pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926598#926606#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4620;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4621;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4622# dpag med sgrib pa zad pa'i phyir // / +sgrib pa zad ces smos te / /

column3: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa 'dis yang mdor bsdu na nyon mongs pa rnam pa du bstan zhe na / /
column4: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926372#926372#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4586;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4587# spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa dang  ye shes phun sum tshogs pa'o // / +sgrib pa kun gyi dri med pa // /

column3: de'i phyir 'di skad ces rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa / / +de yang rnam gsum rnam gnyis kyang // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926616#926627#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4623;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4624;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4625;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4626# sgrib pa kun gyi dri med pa // / +zhes bya ba'i don rgya cher bstan ni pa'i phyir / /

column3: nyon mongs rnam bdun zhes bya ba smos so // / +kyang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni bsdu ba dang go bsnor ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926628#926638#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4625;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4626# sar gtogs sgrib pa phra BCOM ZHES BYA BA SMOS TE / / +sangs rgyas pa'i dus na sa dang po nas sa bcu yan chad na yod pa'i sgrib pa phra mo dang  shes bya'i sgrib pa phra mo dang yang zhes bya ba'i  don to // /

column3: nyon mongs pa nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa yin pas nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa ste / / +las kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang tshe'i kun nas nyon mongs pa yang de bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926639#926648#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4626;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4627;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4628;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4629# sangs rgyas pa'i dus na sa dang po nas sa bcu yan chad na yod pa'i sgrib pa phra mo dang  shes bya'i sgrib pa phra mo dang yang zhes bya ba'i  don to // /

column3: nyon mongs pa 'byung ba na bdag dang  gzhan la gnod pa byed pa'i phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa ste / / +mdo las kyang ji skad du chags pa'i 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa bdag la yang gnod par sems / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926649#926665#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4628;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4629;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4630;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4631;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4632# zhes bya ba'i don rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir / / +sangs rgyas de zhes bya ba smos te / /

column3: gzhan la yang gnod par sems / / +gnyi ga la yang gnod par sems so // / +de bzhin du zhe sdang  dang rmongs pa yang shes par bya'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926664#926677#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4631;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4632;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4633;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4634;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4635# rin po chen snod nyid phye ba ltar // / +zhes bya ba'i  don rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir / /
column5: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#936066#936066#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5950;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5951# sar gtogs sgrib pa phra bcom sangs rgyas te // / +de ni mthu chen rin chen snod phye bzhin // /
column6: 0.023#TD4020E.TXT.r#2522561#2522561#TD4020E.TXT.r_543# de ni mthu chen rin chen snod phye bzhin // /

column3: las dang tshe'i kun nas nyon mongs pa 'byung ba'i phyir yang kun nas nyon mongs pa ste / / +'di ltar nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis na las kyis tshe 'phen te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926678#926703#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4633;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4634;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4635;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4636# de ni mthu chen rin chen snod phye bzhin // / +zhes bya ba smos te / / +rin po che gang sems can gzhan gyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i rin po che ni mthu chen po'i rin po che zhes bya ste / /

column3: bden pa mthong ba las yod kyang srid pa 'phen pa med pa dang   nyon mongs pa kun tu 'byung bas yang srid pa'i sa bon srid par byed pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa can gyi sems kyang yang srid pa'i nying mtshams sbyor ba'i phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926697#926708#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4636# mthu chen po'i rin po che'i snod kha phye na rin po che chen po sna tshogs snang  zhing bdag dang gzhan gyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sa'i dus na nyon mongs pa dang  shes bya'i sgrib ba ma lus par spangs nas bdag dang gzhan gyi bsam pha yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i chos stobs dang  mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa sna  tshogs snang zhing bdag dang gzhan gyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926732#926732#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4636# mthu chen po'i rin po che'i snod kha phye na rin po che chen po sna tshogs snang  zhing bdag dang gzhan gyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sa'i dus na nyon mongs pa dang  shes bya'i sgrib ba ma lus par spangs nas bdag dang gzhan gyi bsam pha yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i chos stobs dang  mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa sna  tshogs snang zhing bdag dang gzhan gyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: tshe'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu yang yin no // / +de bas na dgra bcom pa la nyon mongs pa can gyi sems med pa'i    phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926709#926718#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4636# mthu chen po'i rin po che'i snod kha phye na rin po che chen po sna tshogs snang  zhing bdag dang gzhan gyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sa'i DUS NA NYON MONGS PA DANG  shes bya'i sgrib ba ma lus par spangs nas bdag dang gzhan gyi bsam pha yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i chos stobs dang  mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa sna  tshogs snang zhing bdag dang gzhan gyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: nyid mtshams sbyor ba med do // / +las kyang dge ba dang mi dge ba ste / / +de nyid kyi tshe na lus dang sems sdug bsngal ba'i rgyur gyur pa dang  ma 'ongs pa na rnam par smin pa yang 'byin pas kun nas nyon mongs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926719#926732#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4636# mthu chen po'i rin po che'i snod kha phye na rin po che chen po sna tshogs snang  zhing bdag dang gzhan gyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sa'i dus na nyon mongs pa dang  shes bya'i sgrib ba ma lus par spangs nas bdag dang gzhan gyi bsam pha yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i chos stobs dang  mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa sna  tshogs snang zhing bdag dang gzhan gyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: tshe yang gnod pa thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pas nyon mongs  pa'o ; / / +rgyu rnam pa gnyis su bye ba'i phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa gsum mo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926733#926745#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4636;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4637;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4638# mthu chen po'i rin po che'i snod kha phye na rin po che chen po sna tshogs snang  zhing bdag dang gzhan gyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sa'i DUS NA NYON MONGS PA dang  shes bya'i sgrib ba ma lus par spangs nas bdag dang gzhan gyi bsam pha yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i chos stobs dang  mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa sna  tshogs snang zhing bdag dang gzhan gyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa ni ma rig pa dang sred pa dang  len pa rnams te / / +gsum char yang nyon mongs pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926746#926755#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4637;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4638;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4639;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4640;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4641# sangs rgyas de'i gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid mthu dang bcas pa LA GNYIS TE / / +gsum pa ni bshad par gyur pa'o zhes bya ba la / /
column5: 0.022#TD4010E.TXT.r#2255033#2255033#TD4010E.TXT.r_3116;TD4010E.TXT.r_3117# de ci'i  phyir zhe na zhes bya ba ni / / +gzugs kyi skus mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa yin la / /

column3: las kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa ni 'du byed  rnams dang srid pa la bya ste / / +gnyi ga yang las kyi bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926756#926772#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4640;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4641;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4642;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4643;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4644# ci'i  phyir zhe na / / +gzung ba dang 'dzin pa ni gnyis zhes bya la / / +sangs rgyas pa'i dus na gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gnyis spangs pas gnyis su med pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: 'di ni bye brag yin te / / +rang gi ngo bor gnas pa'i las ni 'du byed rnams so // /

sa bon du gnas pa ni srid pa'o // / +tshe'i kun nas nyon mongs pa ni / / +rnam par shes pa dang ming dang gzugs dang   skye mched drug dang reg pa dang tshor ba dang  skye ba dang rga shi zhes bya ba yan lag lhag ma rnams te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926773#926788#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4643;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4644;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4645;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4646;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4647;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4648# yang na yod pa dang med pa gnyis la gnyis su zhes bya ste / / +sangs rgyas pa na yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin pas gnyis su med     // /

column3: de dag ni tshe'i nang du 'dus pa'i phyir ro // / +kun nas nyon mongs pa rnam gnyis ni rgyu mi dbye bar byas pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926789#926799#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4647;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4648;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4649;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4650# sangs rgyas pa'i tshe gzung ba dang 'dzin pa kun du brtags pa'i kun brtags kyi mtshan nyid yod pa ma yin pa'o // / +ci zhig med ba ma yin nam zhe na / /

column3: rgyu'i kun nas nyon mongs pa ni nyon mongs pa dang  las kyi ngo bo nyid kyi  yan lag rnams kyis so // / +'bras bu'i kun nas nyon mongs pa ni yan lag lhag ma rnams kyis so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926800#926808#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4649;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4650;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4651# yongs su grub pa yod pa'i mtshan nyid yod pa'i phyir ro // / +mthu ni  gnyis med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi yon tan la bya ste / /

column3: de la las dang nyon mongs pa rnams ni rnam par shes pa la sogs pa tshor ba la thug pa skye pa'i bdag nyid can dang  rga shi'i nyes dmigs can gyi tshe skyed par rab tu zhugs pa'i  phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926809#926817#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4651;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4652# tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis ni gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid dang  mthu mdo tsam du bstan / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926818#926843#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4652;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4653;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4654;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4655;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4656# tshigs su bcad pa gsum pas ni de nyid kyi don bzlas nas rgya cher 'chad do zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: 'bras bu'i kun nas nyon mongs pa ni lhag ma rnam par shes pa la sogs pa rnams kyis te / / +las dang nyon mongs pa'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro // /

rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba de nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa rnam pa bdun zhes bya ste / / +phyin ci log dang 'debs pa dang   nye bar khrid pa dang kun 'dzin pa dang  nye bar spyod pa dang  sdud pa dang  skyo ba'i rgyu'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926844#926857#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4656# chos thams cad la bdag med pa gnyis dang  skye 'gag med par ma khyab pa med cing sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku bdag  med pa gnyis kyi rang bzhin skye 'gag med pa'i rang bzhin dang  chos thams cad kyi bdag med pa gnyis dang  skye 'gag med pa'i rang bzhin du mi 'dra ba cung zad kyang med pas na chos thams cad la sangs rgyas zhes bya'o // /

column3: rgyu bdun po de lta ma rig pa ni phyin ci log gi rgyu'o zhes bya ba la / / +ma rig par gyur pa ni de kho na nyid la rmongs pa'i phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926850#926856#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4656# chos thams cad la bdag med pa gnyis dang  skye 'gag med par ma khyab pa med cing sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku bdag  med pa gnyis kyi rang bzhin skye 'gag med pa'i rang bzhin dang  chos thams cad kyi bdag med pa gnyis dang  skye 'gag med pa'i rang bzhin du mi 'dra ba cung zad kyang med pas na chos thams cad la sangs rgyas zhes bya'o // /
